lineup: Baloji (BE/CD) *live*
information:
Baloji, geboren in Lubumbashi, Kongo (CD), ist ein Multitalent: Rapper, Songwriter, Regisseur, Dichter, Stylist und Schauspieler. Er wuchs im belgischen L√ºttich auf und begann in den 90er Jahren mit dem Rappen im Trio Malfrats Linguistiques, aus dem sp√§ter die weltbekannte Hip-Hop-Gruppe Starflam hervorging.

Musikalisch bewegt sich Baloji zwischen afrikanischer Musik, Rap, franz√∂sicher SingerSongwriter Tradition, afro-amerikanischem Soul, Funk und Jazz. Den Weg dazu hat er √ºber HipHop und die Technik des Samplens gefunden. Inspiriert hat ihn aber auch elektronische Musik. Balojis Ausdauer und Widerstandsf√§higkeit steht im Zentrum seiner Arbeit. So schafft er es, all diese verschiedenen Einfl√ºsse miteinander in Einklang zu bringen und damit seine kreativen Projekte anzureichern.

2008 ver√∂ffentlichte er sein erstes, sehr pers√∂nliches Soloalbum ‚ÄúH√¥tel Impala‚Äú, das mit Gold und zwei Octaves de la Musique ausgezeichnet wurde.  2010 folgte das Album ‚ÄúKinshasa Succursale‚Äú und 2015 die EP ‚Äú64 Bits and Malachite‚Äú. 

Nach seinem dritten Album ‚Äú137 Avenue Kaniama‚Äú von 2018 ist er nun mit einem monumentalen Projekt zur√ºck: ‚ÄûAugure/Omen‚Äú (2023) ist sein erster Spielfilm als Regisseur und erz√§hlt die Geschichte eines Mannes, der aus Belgien in sein kongolesisches Heimatdorf zur√ºckkehrt. Der Film wird von einem gewaltigen Soundtrack begleitet, der aus 4 EPs besteht, die jeweils die Perspektive eines der vier Hauptprotagonisten des Films einnehmen.

Der Soundtrack steckt voller Kollaborationen: Sampa The Great, Dj Lag, Jose James, IDPIzzle, Jamilia Woods, Natalie Bergman und viele andere erschaffen gemeinsam mit Baloji musikalische Welten der Extraklasse. Das Ergebnis ist eine fesselnde Mischung aus Hip-Hop, Afrobeats, Electronica, traditionellem Gesang, kongolesischer Rumba und vielen anderen Stilen.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Kristin Lee Moolman

_____________________________________


Baloji, born in Lubumbashi, Congo (DC), is a rapper, songwriter, director, poet, stylist and actor. He grew up in Li√®ge, Belgium. In the 90s, Baloji began rapping with the trio Malfrats Linguistiques, which went on to become the world-renowned hip-hop group: Starflam.

In 2008, he released his highly personal first solo album: H√¥tel Impala, certified gold and won two Octaves de la Musique awards. In 2010, a second solo album, Kinshasa Succursale.

In 2015, a solo EP, 64 Bits and Malachite.  In 2018, he released his third solo album, 137 Avenue Kaniama, awarded the Octave musiques du monde. In 2023, Baloji's d√©but full-length feature film Augure/Omen received the Prix de la Premi√®re Voix in the Un Certain Regard selection at the Cannes Film Festival, and the Prix de la Mise en Sc√®ne at the Angoul√™me Film Festival.

The film inspired 4 12-track EPs. Each EP takes the point of view of one of the film's four protagonists. Hip-hop, Afrobeats, electro, traditional songs, Congolese rumba, etc. The project takes on multiple incarnations and artistic inspirations. A captivating, deep and powerful aesthetic.

A fascinating variation on the story of the eponymous feature film. The album includes featuring artists with singular universes such as: Sampa The Great, Dj Lag, Jose James, IDPIzzle, Jamilia Woods, Natalie Bergman, Metronomy, Wharola, and many more.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

lineup: Vendex¬†, Cloudy¬†, DTEXX¬†, SIKXTO
information:
EUPHORIK brings Valkh√∏r to Berlin!

Hard techno's most infamous antihero, Vendex, is the mastermind behind Valkh√∏r, a multi-channel concept, brand and creative realm encompassing a record label and worldwide audio-visual shows.

With a dark, pounding signature soundscape ranging from hard techno to EBM and industrial, Valkh√∏r embodies the musical and creative vision of the masked techno sorcerer Vendex, who has built a devoted following since he burst onto the scene in 2018.¬†

VALKH√òR is a fictional world with mythical lore divided into four visually different themed settings characterized by fire, ice, sand and a cyberpunk-inspired environment influenced by futuristic, historical and fantasy elements.

The narrative was created by Vendex himself and brings the label and event concept to life.
Valkh√∏r is where the dark vision of Vendex, the creative force our own world could not contain, finds its full expression.

information:
New Season, New Residency, New Love Story! 

SPOTM Returns home to Aeden with another explosive night alongside friends ACTITUDE & UNISON to celebrate music and communities coming together for a sexy and sweaty session!

We're thrilled to be hosting our long time friends ACTITUDE who've been killing it this summer at FUSION Festival alongside DJ SPOHRT and his new family UNISON which is anchored in the union of creatives, providing a bridge for collectives from different cities and a dance floor for various circles.

lineup: ALWAYS SECRET
information:
EN // DE

‚¨§ ABOUT PARADISE GARAGE ‚¨§
We believe that great musical traditions should never die. Our Paradise Garage party series is a tribute to the legendary New Yorker Paradise Garage club that was the place where House music and Disco bloomed between 1976 and the time of its closure in 1987.

Our Paradise Garage remains 100% loyal to the musical tradition of the New Yorker club and his legendary resident Larry Levan. You will not hear Techno, or any of the common modern interpretations of House music and Disco at the party.

Our Paradise Garage is also defined as a sex-positive party. It requires a dress code (read below), and is a safe space for kinky communities and LGTBQ, escorted by a professional and devoted awareness team.

The dress code is meant to emphasize the border between the everyday and the space we create. We wish to encourage our guests to safely express themselves through fashion and their individual choices of clothes and accessories.


‚¨§ WHAT TO EXPECT ‚¨§
‚äõ A musical homage to Paradise Garage: classic House and old-school Disco.
‚äõ No streetwear! Come colorful, kinky and creative.
‚äõ Secret DJ lineup.
‚äõ Performances and walking acts.
‚äõ Hedonistic space for kinksters.
‚äõ 2 dance floors and several play rooms.
‚äõ Awareness team.

‚¨§ MUST READ ‚¨§
‚äõ The Paradise Garage has a strict no-photo policy. We have a designated photobooth with our photographer, where photos can be taken of those who wish for it.
‚äõ The Paradise Garage is a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, antisemitism, sexism or homophobia will not be tolerated.
‚äõ In addition, you are to respect the personal space of any fellow dancer. In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our awareness team or our staff.
‚äõ DRESS-CODE: * Swimsuits * Costumes * Leather * Latex * Naked * Super Heroes * Lingerie * Colorful Festival Style.
NO CASUAL STREET WEAR SUCH AS JEANS IS ALLOWED.


‚¨§‚¨§


‚¨§ √úBER PARADISE GARAGE ‚¨§
Wir glauben, dass gro√üe musikalische Traditionen niemals sterben sollten. Unsere Paradise Garage-Partyreihe ist eine Hommage an den legend√§ren New Yorker Club Paradise Garage, in dem zwischen 1976 und seiner Schlie√üung 1987 die House- und Disco-Musik bl√ºhte.

Unsere Paradise Garage bleibt der musikalischen Tradition des New Yorker Clubs und seines legend√§ren Residents Larry Levan zu 100% treu. Du wirst auf der Party weder Techno noch eine der g√§ngigen modernen Interpretationen von House und Disco h√∂ren.

Unsere Paradise Garage ist auch als sex-positive Party definiert. Sie erfordert einen Dresscode (siehe unten) und ist ein sicherer Ort f√ºr kinky Communities und LGTBQ, der von einem professionellen und engagierten Awareness-Team begleitet wird.

Der Dresscode soll die Grenze zwischen dem Alltag und dem Raum, den wir schaffen, betonen. Wir m√∂chten unsere G√§ste dazu ermutigen, sich sicher durch Mode und ihre individuelle Wahl von Kleidung und Accessoires auszudr√ºcken.


‚¨§ WAS DICH ERWARTET ‚¨§
‚äõ Eine musikalische Hommage an Paradise Garage: klassischer House und Disco der alten Schule.
‚äõ Keine Stra√üenkleidung! Komm bunt, kinky und kreativ.

‚äõ Bei der Paradise Garage gilt ein striktes Fotoverbot. Wir haben einen Photobooth mit unserer Fotografin, wo Fotos von denjenigen gemacht werden k√∂nnen, die es w√ºnschen.
‚äõ Die Paradise Garage ist ein sicherer Ort f√ºr jede Ethnie, jedes Geschlecht und jede sexuelle Orientierung. Jegliche Anzeichen von Rassismus, Antisemitismus, Sexismus oder Homophobie werden nicht toleriert.
‚äõ Dar√ºber hinaus musst du den pers√∂nlichen Raum eines jeden Mitt√§nzers respektieren. Solltest du das Gef√ºhl haben, dass du ungerecht behandelt oder dein Freiraum verletzt wurde, melde dies bitte unserem Awareness-Team oder unseren Mitarbeitern.

lineup: TBA
information:
That first night, that first sight, that first kiss and the first time in the darkroom... so many things have happened since then and still have the same feeling when looking back to that moment. Such an incredible emotion to remember the first time. It has been 5 years since we first opened our doors, since the first beats flooded the dancefloor, since the first time we met, since we saw you dancing for the first time. 

We want to celebrate with you 5 years of techno, darkness, dance, sweat, love and friendship. For that we have prepared a very special event orchestrated by our DJ residents and some old and new friends to have an unforgettable night, the last one together this season.

We are back to share an orgiastic celebration with you all on a new dark location where we will learn together to play hide and seek, to sweat together and dance in a collaborative manner. Different areas to relax, dance, sweat, drink and talk to each other, meet new people and greet old known ones. Come and enjoy the techno and pleasure, where individuals reconstruct into a mass of bodies which dances, moves and sweats as one on the dancefloor: skin to skin, feeling together, feeling the hard beat, the pounding on their ears and the lights hiding and showing precious human creatures on ecstasy. 
How nice to be all together once again, celebrating another night of hedonism, free sexual expression and joy.

Please remember the Community Guidelines: at our events you are expected to embrace them.

NO: Racism, Sexism, LGTBIQ+phobia, Hate, Violence, Agephobia, Bodyshaming or Fascism.

YES: Kindness, Peace, Equality, Love and Hedonism.

We have an awareness team on site to help you. If you feel someone at the event does not follow our community guidelines, please speak to them or to any of our staff members. If you feel unwell or you see someone not feeling well, please let our awareness team or staff know. If you need help with any other thing, please let us know, we are there to help you and ensure you are having a good time.

Early Bird tickets: Entry until Midnight just 15Euro, 17.50 Euro after Midnight
Regular tickets: Entry until Midnight 17.50 Euro, 20 Euro after Midnight

Join us early to get the full flavor of the XTROB experience

lineup: Barry Can't Swim
information:
Barry Can't Swim

Astra | 18.10.2024

Einlass: 19:00 | Beginn: 20:00

Der schottische Musikproduzent, DJ und Live-Act Barry Can‚Äôt Swim kommt im Oktober f√ºr sein einziges Deutschlandkonzert nach Berlin in das Astra Kulturhaus!

Als einer der aufregendsten K√ºnstler:innen der elektronischen Musik machte Barry Can't Swim zun√§chst mit einer Reihe von Ver√∂ffentlichungen im Jahr 2020 (u.a. bei Shall Not Fade) auf sich aufmerksam, bevor er 2022 beim Ninja Tune-Sublabel Technicolour f√ºr seine sensationelle EP, ‚ÄûMore Content‚Äú (die bis heute √ºber 20 Millionen Streams erreicht hat) unterschrieb. Im Jahr 2023 erschien Barrys Deb√ºtalbum, ‚ÄûWhen Will We Land?‚Äú, das bei seiner Ver√∂ffentlichung auf Platz 12 der britischen Albumcharts und Platz 1 in den britischen Dance-Albumcharts einstieg und sein bisher umfangreichstes und vielf√§ltigstes Projekt darstellt. Das 11-Track-Album, das von BBC Radio 1 zum Dance-Album des Jahres gew√§hlt wurde, bewegte sich zwischen Deep House und Jazz und wurde von Mixmag, DJ Mag, The Times, Evening Standard, NME, Billboard, Clash und vielen anderen gelobt. Barry wurde au√üerdem bei den DJ Mag Awards als ‚ÄûBreakthrough Producer‚Äú ausgezeichnet und bei den BRIT Awards 2024 in der Kategorie ‚ÄûDance Act‚Äú gegen Becky Hill, Calvin Harris, Fred Again... und Romy nominiert.

Bereits im M√§rz spielte Barry Can‚Äôt Swim eine restlos ausverkaufte Live-Show im Berliner S√§√§lchen. Im Herbst geht der schottische Live-Act nun erneut auf Tour und macht dabei auch Halt in Berlin!

information:
Limousine Dream kommen zu ihrer zweiten Party in die Panorama Bar, mit vielen first timers, einem Back2Back-Set von Labelbesitzer Gene On Earth und Dyed Soundorom sowie einem Live-Set des Chicagoer House Heads Garrett David. Letzterer zog als Teenager in die Windy City, wo er zum Eink√§ufer des legend√§ren Plattenladens Gramaphone Records und Resident-DJ in der Smartbar wurde. Seine Musik, die er mittlerweile haupts√§chlich auf seinem Label Global Swing ver√∂ffentlicht, ist treibender Chi-House mit europ√§ischem After-Hour-Twist. Die in Caracas geborene DJ Mari.te lebt seit 2018 in Spanien, wo sie ihr Label und die gleichnamige Clubnacht Tresydos betreibt und f√ºr ihr breites Spektrum an House-infizierter Underground-Dance-Musik bekannt ist. Unter seinem Alias Liquid Earth produziert der kalifornische Wahlberliner Taylor Freels sonnendurchflutete Housetracks mit tiefen Basslines und knackigen Melodien.

Limousine Dream are back with their second party at Panorama Bar, with plenty of first-timers, a back-to-back set from label owner Gene On Earth and Dyed Soundorom, and a live set by Chicago house head Garrett David. The latter moved to the Windy City as a teen, where he became a buyer for legendary record store Gramaphone Records and resident DJ at Smartbar. His music, which he now mainly releases on his Global Swing label, is driving Chi-house with a European after-hours twist. Born in Caracas, DJ Mari.te has been living in Spain since 2018, where she runs Tresydos, her label and club night of the same name, and is known for her wide range of house-infused underground dance music. Under his alias Liquid Earth, Californian Berliner Taylor Freels crafts sun-drenched house tracks defined by deep bass and sharp melodies.

lineup: Puce Mary + @Tot Onyx
information:
silent green presents:

Puce Mary is the solo moniker of Danish-born artist Frederikke Hoffmeier. 
With a long career in experimental electronic music - Puce Mary has a reputation for intense live performances that span from gripping renditions of cinematic composition to the full-on fury of off-the-cuff harsh noise. Oft-identified with the now-generation of industrial noise, the project‚Äôs recent 
endeavours explores the field of sound more broadly than before, unfurling a complex sonic and literary narrative of tension and release. Tot Onyx is the solo project of Tommi Tokyo, who is also known as part of the experimental performance duo Group A, which was active until 2020. The sound artist and performer works a lot with metal objects and her body and, in keeping with Group A tradition, likes to break all expectations.

event_name: Trip the Light presents: DJ Sotofett (all night)
lineup: DJ Sotofett¬†(all night)
information:
We return to our adoptive home, Zur Klappe, and have none other than DJ Sotofett joining us for our first all night set.

DJ Sotofett operates the booth with the authority of a selector who is firmly in control of proceedings: never flustered, with a masterful command of energy and flow. 

His selections span the past five decades of soundsystem music, with a particular focus on soulful; groove heavy House, Techno and Electro, while his extended sets incorporate Jazz, Funk, Hip-Hop and Dub. Playing prominently with vinyl, his mixing is seamless and playful: full of neat chops and daring transitions. 

For going on 20 years, DJ Sotofett has been releasing a steady stream of records through revered labels such as Tresor and Honest Jon‚Äôs, as well as his own labels Wania and Sex Tags Mania / Amfibia. He has been throwing regular label parties at OHM and Tresor since 2014, while he also recently launched the dub focused party, Resonance of Dub. 

Having already been lucky enough to witness a DJ Sotofett all nighter in the flesh, you can take our word that this is going to be proper! 



The ethos of Trip the Light is based on creating a night with no frills, that is completely music-centric, focused on diversity, inclusivity and intimacy. Our music interests are broad and ever evolving but are rooted in UK soundsystem music. 

We will not tolerate discrimination of any kind. Please be kind to each other. See you on the dance floor x

Drum & Bass music is an integral part of the electronic music scene, and it has been gaining popularity over the years. Drum & Bass events are a great way to experience the unique and powerful energy of this genre.
The atmosphere at these events is unlike any other. The basslines thump through the air, creating a heavy, yet exciting atmosphere. Everybody is dancing enthusiastically, and it‚Äôs easy to get lost in the moment. The energy of the crowd is palpable, and it‚Äôs infectious.
The lineup at Infected Drum & Bass events is carefully curated to create a unique and memorable experience. DJs spin the hottest tracks of the moment, often mixing in some timeless classic tunes.
A Drum & Bass event is a great place to meet like-minded people and make long-lasting friendships. Everyone is there to enjoy the music and have a good time, and it‚Äôs easy to make connections with fellow music lovers.
If you‚Äôre looking for an unforgettable night out, a Drum & Bass event is the perfect option. The music, atmosphere, and people make for a party that you won‚Äôt soon forget. So come join in the fun and make some amazing memories.

For the fifth instalment of the ‚ÄöAquatic Travellers‚Äò series, the clued-in curator bb:fm put together a tailor-made two-floor diving team. Refine your fins for the first collaboration of the newly founded Sandwich crew ‚Äî consisting of Lucas, Patrick & Violetta‚Äî and the Sonntagsinstitut squad! 

On the upper floor, the signature electro sound of the ‚ÄöTravellers‚Äò series rules the dance floor with an all-flinta lineup. Apart from the broken beat cognoscenta and host bb:fm, Potsdam‚Äôs most elusive electro head and Galaxunity label founder Galaxaura and the Montreal-born DJ and prolific producer Data Plan will grill your gills.

lineup: Pysh¬†Franz Matthews¬†SEIUN
information:
HIFI/LOFI are bringing the heat back at Crack Bellmer on October 18th! This time, we bring you a stellar lineup to the table : PYSH, SEIUN, and Franz Matthews will all embark you in a sonic journey going from groovy and cosmic Indie Dance, to the realms of Melodic Techno, Dark Disco, with extra hints of hi-powered Italo.

PYSH
=====
Pysh, is a Polish DJ and music producer living in Berlin. His performances have permanently recorded in the lineups of the largest Polish music clubs and festivals, sharing the stage with leading artists of the world electronic scene, such as Eelke Kleijn, Robag Wruhme, Guy J or Kollektiv Turmstrasse.

In addition to balancing between the house, indie and melodic genres in his productions, sets and live acts, Pysh interweaves ethnic and folk sounds, which are a kind of hallmark of his work, which regularly travels all around the world under the aegis of such labels like Ritter Butzke, Jeahmon, Click, or Einmusik.

SEIUN
=====
French DJ and producer based in Berlin / Paris, SEIUN's music vibrates in a mixture of groovy bass, chuggy retro synths, touches of acid sonorities and vintage percussion, forming a powerfully bassy and eclectic combo that identifies itself as indie dance / EBM / italo disco. She perceives music as a universal way to connect with oneself and others, in a trance and a journey built on the moment to let go and focus on the present.

Recently becoming a member of the Parisian collective apero notturno, she has already conquered many places such as Sisyphos, Katerblau, Renate, Kitkat, as well as Mexico, South Africa, Turkey, the Netherlands and many others. Also a producer, her latest releases are on the Club Mackan and Nein labels.


FRANZ MATTHEWS
================
Now grounded in Berlin, the franco-german music producer, DJ & Live Act likes to blend worlds together. Either wandering through cosmic, spiritual, or other mental realms, mixed with sonic influences gathered from his travels around the world, Matthews always keeps faithful to one thing : trying to make people dance, while adding something meaningful out of their experience.

His studio work also always embodies a strong sense of ethos, commitment, and attention to detail. A winning combination that‚Äôs seen him release music on imprints such as Eskimo Recordings, AEON, ROAM, Heimlich, as well as his own label HIFI/LOFI Records, while collaborating and getting remixed by the likes of Aera, Chaim, Local Suicide, The Organism‚Ä¶

==================

information:
DEU: 

It‚Äôs after-party time 

Die Erinnerungen an den Windwiesentanz verblassen nicht so schnell‚Ä¶ ‚Äì tanzende F√º√üe, strahlende Gesichter und eine Atmosph√§re, die uns alle in den Bann gezogen hat. 

Wer dabei war, wei√ü: Dieser Vibe ist einzigartig. 

Und genau da wollen wir mit euch ankn√ºpfen! Am **18.10.** kehren wir zur√ºck auf die Tanzfl√§che, um die Magie wieder aufleben zu lassen. Im **Beate Uwe Berlin** laden wir euch ein, die Erinnerungen an durchtanzte N√§chte und unvergessliche Momente weiterzuspinnen. Ab **23:00** gibt's Downtempo und Deephouse, der die Seele streichelt und Discohouse Grooves, die euch direkt zur√ºck in die ekstatische Stimmung vom Festival katapultieren. But as usual: Warm & Cosy

It's after-party time 

The memories of this years Windwiesentanz don't fade quickly... - dancing feet, beaming faces and an atmosphere that captivated all of us. 

Anyone who was there knows that this vibe is unique.

And that's exactly where we want to pick up with you! On **18th of october** we're returning to the dance floor to bring the magic back to life. At **Beate Uwe Berlin** we invite you to relive memories of dancing the night away and unforgettable moments. From **23:00** there will be downtempo and deep house that caresses the soul and disco house grooves that will catapult you straight back into the ecstatic mood of the festival. lineup: Martha van Straaten¬†, Hassandra, Philippo, Marwan Hawash, MonoAbe, Rochelle Baz , Steffoo, Ap Solis, , 6 themed rooms to explore featuring 2 Dance Floors // Cabaret Shows // Intimate Workshops // Multiple Play Spaces // Secret Dens // Interactive Performances // Tarot Reading // Multi Handed Massage Parlour + So Much More!
information:
Step into the Garden of Tarot, where seduction & mysticism collide. Enter our world where the High Priestess teases out your hidden desires, the Lovers ignite your deepest passions, Justice demands you to surrender to pleasure, and the Wheel of Fortune spins you into rapturous ecstasy. 

Spread over 6 spaces, our sensual sanctuary invites you to embody the raw, erotic energy of the cards. Whether you're drawn to the allure of the unknown or the thrill of temptation, every corner offers a new intimate adventure.

Come alone or with lovers‚Äîour garden is a safe space for exploring fantasies, flirting with fate, and forging unforgettable connections. Let the cards lead you into a night of pure, unbridled pleasure.


***WORKSHOP PROGRAMME***

- Booty Therapy (hosted by MaiÃàmouna Coulibaly)

- Magical Life of Bodies (hosted by Micha Stella)

- Calling the Cat Within (hosted by Hameed & Arturo)


***PERFORMERS***
Rhys Pieces
Mandhla
Fluxxious
Tania Giovo
Alfie morgz

+
Live Painting by Christian Rug
Tarot Readings
Multi Handed Massage Parlour
Playful Connection Games

***TICKETS & ENTRY***
To make sure everyone can enter our paradise as quickly as possible, we have created a tiered ticket system based on entry time.

Tickets will be available at the door from 12:30am.

We do not offer refunds however if the event sells out and you are no longer able to attend, you can list your ticket on the RA Resale platform.

---DRESS CODE---
You may only enter our paradise if you are in costume. We operate a strict door policy which is NO EFFORT - NO ENTRY.

Whether you see yourself as the High Priestess, Masked Seer or perhaps the Temptress, we look forward to seeing all of your bold & edgy elegance come out in true fabulous form!

Think: Flowing Robes, Silky Fabrics, Ornate Headpieces, Crystal jewels, Leather straps, Shimmering lingerie, Botanical Patterns, Bold Makeup & Devilish Props.

Remember, 'The Garden of Tarot' invites you to embrace your most imaginative self, breaking boundaries and celebrating the intersection of queerness, sensuality, and a future unburdened by limitations. Let your costume be a reflection of the boundless fabulous decedent universe within you.

Check out our costume moodboard on our website.

*** NO PHOTOS ALLOWED ***
There will be an in house photographer present on the night who will seek consent before taking any photos or filming you. No other photography will be allowed on the night.

Allow yourself to remain present, engaged and playful!

*** SAFER SPACES POLICY ***
Pinky Promise is a space for everyone to feel welcome. We have a zero tolerance policy for harassment, unwanted touch, homophobic, transphobic, racist, sexist, ableist, or ageist behaviour. ALWAYS ask for consent before touching or engaging with someone. 

State your boundaries. If someone makes you uncomfortable, for ANY reason, you should let them know.

Our trained Awareness team will be available all night throughout the venue, looking after the welfare of all attendees to ensure that everyone feels safe and cared for. Feel free to speak to any of our team wearing a bright pink hi vis if you wish to express any concerns or feel uncomfortable or unsafe at any point during the night. We will believe you and we will help.

***ACCESSIBILITY***
The venue has multiple sets of stairs to enter each floor (3 floors in total). There will be some strobe and moving lights along with smoke machines and loud music.

Please read our rules & FAQ on our website before coming to our event

Find us in our digital realm:
Telegram - t.me/pinkypromiseworld
Instagram - @pinkypromise.world

lineup: Bassvictim live, Jas Lin ÊûóÊÄùÁ©é & hearthealer live, Nexcyia¬†live, Softmatter¬†live,  , Blood of Aza, Emma DJ, Evita Manji, Lutto Lento¬†, Makossiri¬†, object blue , Or:la¬†, XD Erica
information:
A term coined by Erik Davis in the late-90s, ‚ÄúTechGnosis‚Äù is the idea that modern technology is as much a spiritual and mystical force as the human beliefs and practices with which it intersects. 3hd‚Äôs ‚ÄúTechnosis‚Äù club night at RSO modifies the mentioned portmanteau of ‚Äútechnology‚Äù and ‚Äúgnosis‚Äù (i.e. the esoteric knowledge of divine truth) and applies it to its opening takeover of electronic music that speaks to the soul.

Rave transcendence will come in the form of object blue‚Äôs liminal wanderings between the club and experimental realms, Emma dj‚Äôs hard, gritty and indefinable sounds, and Softmatter‚Äôs bass-heavy avant-pop with a dark edge that has long served as a refuge from the struggles and adversity of authoritarianism. There‚Äôll be an explosive live performance from underground cult duo Bassvictim whose particular brand of youthful hedonism comes in a unique form of grunge-y industrial dance they call ‚Äúbasspunk,‚Äù as well as performances and DJ sets by XD Erica, Binghi, and Or:la. Also taking part are Evita Manji, MAKOSSIRI, and Lutto Lento, along with Blood of Aza‚Äôs gift for purveying extremes that deftly ricochet between dissonant noise and delicate atmospherics and a live set by sound artist and experimental ambient musician NEXCYIA. Based on his recent Exodus album, the performance combines immersive sound design and textural soundscapes to create an otherworldly reflection of his family‚Äôs journey from Texas to Los Angeles in the 1970s. The centerpiece of the night comes from Jas Lin ÊûóÊÄùÁ©é and Hearthealer, who premiere their ‚ÄúNEMATOCYST‚Äù interactive performance in Berlin in an effort to excavate a potent energetic force of aliveness for their audience to savor. Named after the stinging cells of jellyfish, the collaboration between the respective performance artist/choreographer and writer/producer/DJ is a ritualistic ceremony for facilitating a habitat of spacious freedom and summoning possibility through a collective altered state. 

Introduced into the common lexicon by Davis in his famed TechGnosis: Myth, Magic, and Mysticism in the Age of Information, the 1998 book‚Äôs titular notion proposes a cultural phenomenon where technology is not seen as antithetical to spirituality, but as a tool that can enhance and facilitate spiritual practices. Creamcake‚Äôs 3hd 2024: ‚ÄúTechnosis‚Äù event imagines the potential for such a rave new world.

lineup: LYZZA (Berlin), foreigner (L.A.), Shannen SP¬†(London), AUCO¬†(Infinite Quest / Berlin) , Nico Adomako¬†(Einhundert), KANUCIA (Einhundert)
information:
Einhundert is returning to Trauma Bar with some very special guests.

Einhundert @ Trauma Bar und Kino
Saturday 19 October / 23:59 - till late.

LYZZA [DJ SET] 
... is a producer and vocalist known for challenging the boundaries and carving a space in Electronic Music. Since her 2017 EP ‚ÄòPowerplay‚Äô, she has demonstrated her artistic potency, with collaborations ranging from Showstudio and Mugler to producing for billboard-nominated songstress and activist Emel Mathlouthi.¬†
Widely hailed as one of electronic music‚Äôs most promising young avant-pop producers,. LYZZA has collaborated with a host of impressive names such as Amnesia Scanner, Nicolas Jaar, Shygirl, the late SOPHIE, and Mykki Blanco- whom she toured with for several years. In 2024 Her first short film 'MOSQUITO: The Movie' has been included into The Criterion Collection and her EP‚ÄúSubstate‚Äù , saw her working with Emptyset‚Äôs James Ginzberg, about which Papermag writes; ‚ÄúLYZZA doesn‚Äôt just want to change the game, she wants to change the entire system that runs it.‚Äù

FOREIGNER (T&T - L.A.)
Born in Trinidad & Tobago, raised in Caracas & Brooklyn, and educated in DC, Adam ‚ÄúForeigner‚Äù Cooper is a multi-disciplinary storyteller best known as a Creative Strategy Director, DJ, designer and Experiential Producer. Adam is currently based in Los Angeles, California USA.¬†
While Foreigner is best known for his DJing and events, The Foreigner Company has established itself as the go-to creative development company for Cinematic AfroDiasporic ExperiencesTM through Event Production + Filmmaking + Brand Strategy + Qualitative Research and Graphic Design.

SHANNEN SP (E.B.N.X. / LONDON)
... is a London based DJ. Her DJ sets and curation in both music and the arts explore the spectrum of the global underground, platformed through her event series and label E.B.N.X.

AUCO (INFINITE QUEST / BERLIN)
Berlin-based DJ and Infinite Quest co-founder, AUCO, is known for their obsessive exploration of the craft of DJing.
Their signature style combines daring and complex blends with a gritty sound palette, which originally encompassed new gen and deconstructed club tracks, but has since grown to incorporate newly-evolved genres as Gqom, Jersey club, as well as old-school Jungle, Garage, and Ragga. Protean as ever, their selection pays tribute to their South London roots while also activating a nexus between the robust histories and global milieus of underground clubbing culture.

information:
Fire is a fierce, untamable force‚Äîwild and unpredictable, always shifting and teasing, never playing by the rules. It‚Äôs the heat that pulses through the crowd, igniting passions and sparking connections with every beat. 

FUEGO doesn‚Äôt just burn; it seduces, drawing you into its ever-changing dance of heat and desire. 

Do you hear? It‚Äôs tempting you to come closer, to feel its fierce heat‚Äîlet go, let it consume you.

//

El fuego es una fuerza feroz y indomable‚Äîsalvaje e impredecible, siempre cambiando y provocando, sin seguir las reglas. Es el calor que late en la multitud, encendiendo pasiones y creando conexiones con cada beat.

FUEGO no solo quema; seduce, atray√©ndote a su danza cambiante de calor y deseo.

¬øLo sent√≠s? Te est√° tentando a acercarte, a sentir su calor intenso‚Äîsoltate, dej√° que te consuma.

______________

FUEGO is where the beat gets juicy, the bodies move close, and the night burns hot. 

Born from the energy of Berlin‚Äôs hard techno and fueled by the fiery spirit of Latin core, this event invites you to lose yourself in the music, let go, unleash yourself, and feel the burn of a night that‚Äôs pure FUEGO.

lineup: Berghain:, Karenn (live), Arthur Robert, Darwin, DJ MARIA., DJ Red, Efdemin, Phara, Vera Logdanidi, , Panorama Bar: , Colored Craig, Couple Looking for Bananas (Chris Cruse, Luigi Di Venere, Massimiliano Pagliara), Jorkes , nd_baumecker, Sara Miller, System Olympia, we.amps
information:
Der House Gospel Choir ist eine in London ans√§ssige Gesangsgruppe, die 2014 erstmals beim Glastonbury Festival auftrat. Gegr√ºndet wurde der Chor von der S√§ngerin Natalie Maddix, um die Musikstile House und Gospel zusammenzubringen ‚Äì ein Ansatz, den auch viele US-amerikanische Produzent*innen und S√§nger*innen im New York der 90er Jahre verfolgten, die ihre Wurzeln in den afroamerikanischen Kirchen hatten und uns neben anderen die gr√∂√üten House-Hits dieser Zeit bescherten. Einigen dieser Songs werden wir sicher auch beim Auftritt von Harrsn with House Gospel Choir begegnen, die uns - nat√ºrlich am Sonntag - in abgespeckter Clubbesetzung inklusive DJ zur heiligen Tanzmesse in die S√§ule einladen. In der Panorama Bar hat Massimiliano Pagliara ein paar musikalische Freunde um sich geschart, darunter die australische DJ und Produzentin Eluize, die gerade mit Curious Bliss eine sommerlich-acidgetr√§nkte House-EP auf seinem Label Funnuvojere ver√∂ffent¬≠licht hat. Gemeinsam mit Chris Cruse und Luigi Di Venere spielt er als Couple Looking For Bananas diese Klubnacht ein langes Closing-Set.

The House Gospel Choir is a London-based vocal group that first performed at the Glastonbury Festival in 2014. It was founded by singer Natalie Maddix with the aim of bringing together the musical styles of house and gospel ‚Äì an approach pursued by many US producers and singers in New York in the 90s, whose roots in African-American churches paved the way for some of the biggest house hits of the decade. We're sure to hear a few of these songs during the performance (on Sunday, of course) by Harrsn with House Gospel Choir, leading a holy dance mass in the S√§ule with a slimmed-down club line-up and DJ. At Panorama Bar, Massimiliano Pagliara will be surrounded by a few musical mates, including Australian DJ/producer Eluize, who just released Curious Bliss, a summery, acid-soaked house EP on his label Funnuvojere. Along with Chris Cruse and Luigi Di Venere, he'll be playing a long closing set as Couple Looking For Bananas.

information: Step into the sonic realms of Astral Lab, RUTA, and Speedgasm converging in a fierce side-by-side, two-floor takeover. information:
We live in terrifying times. Dispatches of wars, disasters, and crises circulate with unceasing regularity and ease, while an overwhelming feeling of powerlessness underscores an ever more incomprehensible world at odds with its own logic. The impossible has become possible. Reality is stranger than fiction. The tenth edition of Creamcake‚Äôs 3hd, with its title ‚ÄúThe Shadows That Linger,‚Äù probes this uncanny realm where the ordinary becomes strange in an ‚Äúalways-already‚Äù defined by digital technology, nostalgia, and deterritorialization. Wading deep into this hauntological space between the familiar and the unfamiliar from October 19 to November 3, the festival will examine the spiritual and the ghostly, the ambiguous and the uncertain, alongside those historical, political, cultural, and social relics and reverberations that continue to affect us all.

The interdisciplinary program aims to open up to the political potential of discomfort. In experiencing and engaging with the alien and the otherworldly, ‚ÄúThe Shadows That Linger" will spend the present working through the specters of the past in an attempt to transform dread into a drive for a better future. A decade since its first edition, the concerns raised in 3hd 2015‚Äôs ‚ÄúThe Labor of Sound in a World of Debt‚Äù seem almost trite compared to the sheer scale and impact of today‚Äôs cultural flux, social disparity, and environmental degradation, and the mass violence, destruction, and suffering that continues to unfold globally. Perhaps it‚Äôs worth reflecting on this seemingly simpler past as part of a circuitous chain of events leading to the present, while remembering that chains can be broken and shadows do fade.

information:
You are invited to brighten your fall season with us, let go and forget about your adult self. Life might be full of responsibilities, but at Act Like Adults, we‚Äôre all about keeping the fun alive. Even as we return back to darker seasons, we believe in holding onto that carefree light spirit. That‚Äôs why we want to invite you to Lokschuppen, creating a space where you can let loose and forget about the demands of life outside of dance floors and exciting music and experiences with your loved ones. Join us for a night of pure enjoyment with an amazing lineup that will make you lose yourself in the music. Let go, dance, and live your best life with us‚Äîno responsibilities, just pure fun.

AWARENESS:
At our events, we maintain a no tolerance policy against all forms of discrimination, including racism, sexism, homophobia transphobia, body shaming, or any disrespectful behaviour. Consent is of highest importance before approaching or touching anyone. Our commitment is to foster a secure and inclusive environment for everyone, and any actions conflicting with this principle will not be tolerated.

If you encounter any concerns or disruptions during our event, please feel free to approach a member of the awareness team or security or bar personnel.

In consideration of the privacy and comfort of all participants, we kindly ask for not taking photos or videos inside the event. To uphold this, stickers will be provided and placed on all cameras.

We are very grateful for everyone cooperating with these guidelines.


ONLINE PRESALE:
We would like to inform you that buying a presale ticket online does not guarantee entry to the club. The venue reserves the right to refuse entry, in which case the ticket will be refunded automatically.
¬†
Please note that due to security measures at the entrance, there may be an increased wait time, as well as for ticket holders. We kindly ask that you consider this when planning your arrival and respect the process. Thank you.


We look forward to seeing you!

event_name: EUPHORIA ENDS with Yulo X, Tian Karl, Punzmann, Arno Cao
lineup: Tian Karl¬†, Yulo X¬†, Punzmann¬†, Arno Cao
information:
Berlin-based electronica artist, DJ and producer Yulo X is about to drop his debut album "EUPHORIA ENDS" on October 11th, 2024. It‚Äôs showcasing an eclectic electronica sound that beautifully marries his former roots in wave and dream pop with contemporary electronic production. To celebrate the album release (and his 40th birthday!) he invited his close producer and dj family to a great daytime event.

Get ready for an electrifying day of sonic exploration!

Straight from the heart of London's pulsating music scene, Tian Karl is set to unleash a treasure trove of UK house and garage gems that will make your feet move. In a rare and not-to-be-missed DJ set, Vienna's own musical composer and artist Punzmann will demonstrate the incredible versatility of electronic music. And of course brace yourself for Yulo X's eclectic journey through the realms of house, bass music and techno. He will not only serve up a mind-bending set but also treat you to fresh tracks from his latest album. 
Rounding out this stellar lineup is Berlin's Arno Cao with melodic, groove-oriented house that's guaranteed to keep you moving.

Since it's a daytime event and a small venue, there will be limited capacities. 

+++ Admission is free, but registration is required for entry since it's a private event +++

information:
Acido and Deep Street combine for a special event featuring the heads of both labels flinging down hot plates all night, upstairs at Paloma.

Mister Dreesen should need no introduction to Berliners, and while Jay & Andy have both played separately in the city, this will be the first time they bring their wide-ranging, back-to-back energy and DJ passion to Berlin. 

These veterans of the Bristol scene, with respective releases on labels such as Trilogy Tapes, Punch Drunk, Idle Hands, Diving Bird, Don‚Äôt Be Afraid and brstl are hauling their heaviest trax for one night only!

Drawing upon years of dedicated collecting, jamming, deejaying and exploring music from across the spectrum - don't miss this rare chance to catch them do their thing upstairs at Paloma alongside the mighty Dynamo Dreesen for a heavy night of musical movement, it's gunna be‚Ä¶ something!

lineup: mx.pinky, Miri Malek b2b Dakn ÿØÿßŸÉŸÜŸí, Ak√Øi b2b FISK , NaN, Turboculosis , snaeb x Jay Mayhew (live), abstraqt (live), Sabina Moe x Harmoni x Slow Moon (live), Visuals by svfficient
information:
The interdisciplinary arts platform, Dwam, takes over 90mil for a night of live performances, ambient DJ sets, live AV, and bass-heavy music in the basement. All proceeds from this event will be donated to direct aid initiatives in Gaza.

We open the night at 21 hrs with dance performances from Sabina Moe and Jay Mayhew in collaboration with live experimental music from snaeb, abstraqt, Harmoni & Slow Moon. At midnight, the basement opens and the project space turns into the ambient lounge. The basement will host bass-heavy sets from mx.pinky, Miri Malek b2b Dakn ÿØÿßŸÉŸÜŸí, and Ak√Øi b2b Fisk.  In the lounge, NaN and Turboculosis are on the decks with ambient/experimental vibes and live AV by svfficient.

Food will be available to purchase until midnight.

Early doors: 21:00 - 22:00
Dance Performances & Live Acts: 22:00 - 23:30
DJ sets across two floors: 0:00 - late

Suggested entry 15‚Ç¨ + 5‚Ç¨ membership card for new members. All profits from door sales will be donated to direct aid initiatives supporting people affected by the ongoing genocide in Gaza.

Awareness: Expectations on the guidelines of our space will be given to all attendees to help ensure respect, kindness and safe dancing. Dwam and 90mil do not tolerate any form of discriminatory, aggressive or disrespectful behaviour during, before or after the party. If you or someone you see is in need of care, please reach our staff and they will help you immediately. 

Accessibility: 90mil is located on the ground floor and has a ramp for easy access into the building, as well as an accessible toilet. Unfortunately the basement is not wheelchair-accessible. For individuals requiring assistance due to a disability, we offer a complimentary additional ticket for their accompanying person. We kindly ask that attendees test themselves for COVID before attending in solidarity with immuno-compromised people.

event_name: STOLEN (China) - post-punk dark wave. The Allegorist - deep, immersive sonic tales
lineup: STOLEN The Allegorist
information:
One of the leading indie rock bands of China with a first solo concert in Berlin!
STOLEN were formed by vocalist Liang Yi, guitarist Fangde, bassist Jun, drummer Yufeng, and keyboardist Duan Xuan while studying at the Sichuan Conservatory of Music in 2009. In 2012 Formol, a French VJ, joined the band.
In 2017 they met Mark Reeder, who was on a tour in China with his film B-Movie and was performing at the Morning House Festival in Chengdu. Mark was really impressed by STOLEN‚Äôs brilliant live performance, and after the gig, they decided to go into the studio together to record a demo. In January 2018, the band traveled to Berlin to record their second album, ‚ÄòFragment‚Äô which was again produced by Mark Reeder and Micha Adam. The band wanted to soak in the atmosphere of the city and especially its Techno-club-scene and inject their impressions into their music. It was during the production of this album that Mark decided to reactivate his label MFS, especially for the release of Fragment in Europe. It was a challenging objective. Fragment was released in China in September 2018, and in Europe in early 2019 on MFS.
Mark introduced STOLEN‚Äôs music to New Order‚Äôs Bernard Sumner who was very impressed, and not only by their music but also by their spirit and ambition. The band was invited as a guest for NEW ORDER on their European tour in 2019.
STOLEN has the wild and sexy nature of traditional rock music, while blending the sanity and restraint of electronic music. Their high-energy sound integrated techno, dark-wave, and post-punk influences, is both introspective, exploratory and irresistibly danceable.
Remolding the rock band configuration into a hyper-synchronized dance engine, with a highly explosive audio and handcrafted-visual live performance, STOLEN has a strong recognition and a high degree of aesthetic unity in sound, vision and scene, is undoubtedly one of the leader of indie rock scene in China.

Support our local The Allegorist
Anna Jordan works primarily as a sound artist, crafting deep, immersive, dark and intricate sonic tales. She is a sound artist, composer, electronic music producer, performer, singer, remixer and visual artist, with a background of economics and fine arts.
Her art project The Allegorist is a visionary, enigmatic, transmedia and boundary-pushing artist known for crafting deep, immersive sonic tales. Embracing a wide array of influences, weaving together the mysteries, art and spirituality, the art project defies categorisation, resonating with those who seek the unconventional.

event_name: Love-Songs + Saeko Killy: 'Passive Progressive' Release Party
lineup: Love-Songs, Saeko Killy , Lo Kindre, Thomas Lea Clarke
information:
Phase Group presents a night of live music by Love-Songs and Saeko Killy to celebrate the release of the new Love-Songs album ‚ÄòPassive Progressive‚Äô on the 20th October, at Tennis Bar in Berlin.

Love-Songs are the trio consisting of Thomas Korf (electronics + vocals) Sebastian Kokus (Bass) and Manuel Chitka (Percussion) who make cosmic, kraut-inspired electro-acoustic music. Many will be familiar with their previous output on wonderful labels like Kame House and Bureau B.

'Passive Progressive' lands in the form of 8 enthralling tracks that take us through dreamlike and psychedelic echoing territories, where Korf‚Äôs modulating electronics and effected vocals ripple over the grooving rhythm section of percussion and bass supplied by Kokus and Chitka. We‚Äôve no doubt that the sound that Love-Songs have crafted with This new album will be enthusiastically received by all sonic voyagers and fans of the label, and we‚Äôre over the moon to welcome them to the Phase Group family.

+

Saeko Killy

Joining Love-Songs is the Berlin-based electronic producer Saeko Killy who will be presenting her unique live show of leftfield clubsounds, combining elements of dub, post-punk and kraut with electronic beats.

+

Lo Kindre + Thomas Lea Clarke (DJ Set)

Completing the lineup, Phase Group founders Thomas and Daniel will be playing music from their record collections to set the mood guide the sound of the evening.

Doors - 20:00
Tickets - ‚Ç¨10+

lineup: Twen, + aftershow DJ
information:
Special Sunday show at 8MM Bar:

Twen is a lo-fi, ethereal indie punk band born out of the Boston Punk scene, formed in 2017 by vocalist Jane Fitzsimmons and guitarist Ian Jones. Both were playing in bands or putting on shows in the area's fertile DIY house show community, and they soon got together to write songs that were part slightly psychedelic rock and part moody pop. Fitzsimmons' vocal style in the band's earliest days relied on emphatically sung but hard-to-discern lyrics, designed to draw the listener's attention away from prescribed narratives. After moving to Nashville, the duo released a cassette called Twen Live, consisting of five songs recorded at their first show. The band toured steadily throughout the next two years. Described by Vice i-D as "a DIY band about to make it big", in 2019 they signed on with indie label Frenchkiss Records for the release of their studio debut 'Awestruck'. In 2024 Twen will return to Europe with their new LP.

Showtime: 20:30

Felukah is an Egyptian rapper, singer, poet, and activist who effortlessly blends her Arabic heritage with Western sounds. Dubbed the 'Arabfuturist songstress,' she‚Äôs leading a new wave of Arab women in music. Her revolutionary spirit has caught the attention of audiences across the Middle East and the West, landing her opportunities with Boiler Room TV, FIFA World Cup, Harvard University, and the Brooklyn Museum, among others.

True to her versatile nature, Felukah moves between genres and projects with ease, all while keeping her roots in radical love and her North African heritage. This tour is all about pushing boundaries, connecting people, and creating unforgettable memories.

lineup: Theo Croker (Okeh Rec./ Sony Masterworks/US) *live*, , Support: Brekky Boy (AU), , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Hypnotische Jazz-Kompositionen zwischen Tradition und Moderne.

Der Trompeter, Produzent und Komponist Theo Croker ist ein Geschichtenerz√§hler, der durch seine Trompete spricht ‚Äì dabei Grenzen √ºberwindet und sich durch Musik Geh√∂r verschafft.

Mit den Alben ‚ÄúBLK2LIFE II A Future Past‚Äú (2021), ‚ÄúLove Quantum‚Äú (2022) und der EP ‚ÄúBy The Way‚Äú (2023) hat er einen wichtigen Teil der Herkunft, Gegenwart und Zukunft der Black Music Culture in den USA musikalisch aufgearbeitet. Theo Croker steht damit an der Spitze einer jungen Generation an Musiker*Innen der afro-amerikanischen Jazz-Szene, die das musikalische Erbe und die pr√§genden kulturellen Leistungen ihrer Vorg√§nger neu beleuchtet, deren Beitrag f√ºr die US-amerikanische Musikentwicklung historisch selbstbewusst aufarbeitet und traditionelle Genre-Grenzen hinter sich l√§sst.

Gospel, Blues, Jazz, Soul, Funk: Theo Croker hebt die musikhistorischen Gemeinsamkeiten all dieser Genres hervor und verwandelt sie in einen neuen, zeitgem√§√üen Sound. Auf einer Metaebene sind diese Str√∂mungen f√ºr ihn in der positiven Gestaltungskraft der Liebe verbunden, die es erm√∂glicht, gegen alle Widerst√§nde neue Erlebniswelten und Realit√§ten zu schaffen: ‚ÄûLove Quantum ist auch eine Hommage an all die verschiedenen Ebenen der Liebe, die es geben kann - Liebe zu einem Freund, Liebe zu einem Partner, Liebe zu einem Elternteil, Liebe zu sich selbst und Liebe zum Leben. Es geht darum, wie m√§chtig diese Energie f√ºr uns als Menschen ist.‚Äú

Er√∂ffnet wird der Abend von Brekky Boy. Das Electro-Psychedelic-Jazz-Trio aus Sydney spielt am liebsten in Jazz-Bars und auf Berggipfeln. Mit Einfl√ºssen von K√ºnstler*innen wie Tigran Hamasyan, GoGo Penguin, Robert Glasper und Phronesis hat das Ensemble einen lebendigen, originellen Sound entwickelt, der Elemente aus Jazz, Rock, Minimal und Folk enth√§lt. Mit ihren mitrei√üenden Live-Shows geh√∂ren Brekky Boy zu den aufregendsten jungen Acts der australischen Jazz- und Instrumentalszene. Ihren urspr√ºnglichen Traum, in der World Surf League anzutreten, haben die am Strand von Sydney lebenden Musiker aufgegeben, daf√ºr wurden sie f√ºr den Montreux Jazz Award nominiert, haben Bands wie Snarky Puppy supportet und auf zahlreichen internationalen Jazzfestivals gespielt. Das Trio ist bis heute v√∂llig unabh√§ngig geblieben und hat 2023 seine vierte EP 'Seita' ver√∂ffentlicht.

‚ÄúLyrical melodies, hard-hitting polyrhythms, EST/Tigran-style progressive grooves and no shortage of Aussie humour‚Ä¶‚Äù - Jazzwise

Photo: Obidigbo Nzeribe

________________________________________


Theo Croker is a storyteller who speaks through his trumpet. A creative who refuses boundaries, the GRAMMY Award-nominated artist, composer, producer, thought leader, and influencer projects his voice through the music.

With the albums "BLK2LIFE II A Future Past" (2021), "Love Quantum" (2022) and the EP "By The Way" (2023) he has musically reappraised an important part of the origin, present and future of black music culture in the USA. Theo Croker is at the forefront of a young generation of African-American jazz musicians who are shedding new light on the musical legacy and formative cultural achievements of their predecessors, confidently reassessing their contribution to the development of US music and leaving traditional genre boundaries behind.

Gospel, blues, jazz, soul, funk: Theo Croker emphasises the musical-historical similarities of all these genres and transforms them into a new, contemporary sound. On a meta level, he connects these trends with the positive creative power of love, which makes it possible to create new worlds of experience and realities against all odds: "Love Quantum is also a tribute to all the different levels of love that can exist - love for a friend, love for a partner, love for a parent, love for yourself and love for life. It's about how powerful this energy is for us as human beings.‚Äù

The evening will be opened by Brekky Boy. The electro-psychedelic jazz trio from Sydney prefers to play in jazz bars and on mountain peaks. With influences from artists such as Tigran Hamasyan, GoGo Penguin, Robert Glasper and Phronesis, the ensemble has developed a vibrant, original sound that incorporates elements of jazz, rock, minimal and folk. Brekky Boy are one of the most exciting young acts on the Australian jazz and instrumental scene. Having given up their original dream of competing in the World Surf League, the Sydney beach-based musicians have been nominated for the Montreux Jazz Award, supported bands such as Snarky Puppy and played at numerous international jazz festivals. The trio has remained completely independent to this day and released their fourth EP ‚ÄòSeita‚Äô in 2023.

‚ÄúLyrical melodies, hard-hitting polyrhythms, EST/Tigran-style progressive
grooves and no shortage of Aussie humour‚Ä¶‚Äù - Jazzwise

Photos: Obidigbo Nzeribe

information:
The Body and Dis Fig find kinship in reimagining what it means to make ¬ªheavy music.¬´ Their debut Orchards of a Futile Heaven is the perfect synthesis of two forces, twisting melodicism and intoxicating rhythms, layering a dense miasma of distortion with intense beats and a soaring voice clawing its way towards absolution.

The multidisciplinary artist and performer otay:onii infuses her productions with a shapeshifting voice, leaping from oddball pop melodies to shrieking caprice as she explores themes of anxiety and selfhood over swirling drones, distorted harmony, noise, and carnivalesque ceremonial forms. With the revenant might of a lunar spectre, her hull-breached vibes twist and scurry like the by-blows of a dead god‚Äôs dreams, corkscrewing down into the mind‚Äôs cringing eye.

lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz f√ºr Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen f√ºrs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas f√ºr den Floor ‚Äì jeden Dienstag k√∂nnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung ‚Äì jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer K√ºnste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen f√ºr alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erkl√§rt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie l√§uft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots f√ºr den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu sp√§t zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

lineup: Kazy Lambist
information:
Eleganter Elektropop f√ºr tanzende Tagtr√§umer

Kazy Lambist alias Arthur Dubreucq beweist, dass der so genannte French Touch in der elektronischen Musik nach wie vor lebendig ist und Bedeutendes hervorbringt. Seine Musik ist schwebend und vertr√§umt, sinnlich und voller Emotionen. Einige sagen Chill-Wave dazu und das bedeutet, dass sich hinter einer vordergr√ºndigen Eing√§ngigkeit eine lebendige und tanzbare Melancholie verbirgt: raffiniert und hedonistisch, fl√ºchtig und elegant, entspannt und charaktervoll.

Nach einer Reihe von Singles und EPs und einer ausgedehnten internationalen Tournee schl√§gt Kaziy Lambist nun das zweite Kapitel auf und pr√§sentiert sein neues Album ‚ÄûModa‚Äú, benannt nach dem Istanbuler K√ºnstler*innenviertel auf der asiatischen Seite des Bosporus. Hier hat er eine Zeit lang gelebt und gemeinsam mit Sedef Seb√ºktekin den Song ‚ÄúD√ºnya" aufgenommen. Dar√ºber hinaus entstand ‚ÄúModa Disko‚Äú (in Zusammenarbeit mit Den Ze), eine mitrei√üende Italo-Disco-Kollaboration, die sich der vibrierenden Lebendigkeit dieses Viertels widmet. Geografisch ist das Album sehr weit gefasst und bezieht seine Inspiration aus der T√ºrkei, Italien und S√ºdfrankreich. ‚ÄúModa‚Äú verwebt nahtlos elektronische und organische Kl√§nge und strebt sowohl nach klanglicher Ekstase als auch nach introspektiver Traurigkeit.

Kazy Lambist brilliert in verschiedenen Stimmungen und Geschwindigkeiten. Seine Musik l√§dt gleicherma√üen zum Tagtr√§umen in der H√§ngematte, zum Tanzen in einer gem√ºtlichen Lounge oder auf einem hypnotischen, sonnengek√ºssten Dancefloor ein.

Photo: Antoine Henault

_____________________________________________



KAZY LAMBIST 
NEW ALBUM / ¬´ MODA ¬ª
Kazy Lambist persistently navigates the realm of his friction-less, conflict-free sounds with a music both welcoming and panoramic, sophisticated and hedonistic, volatile and elegant, relaxed yet full of character. While others might resort to using their electronic arsenal for more aggressive means, Kazy Lambist, inspired by sensuality and emotions, refuses to confine himself to certain restricted musical niches. Not surprising for an artist who‚Äôs been striving to push boundaries since his early days, looking to offer an extensive vision to his audience, inviting listeners to daydream in their hammock, dance away in a cosy lounge or on a hypnotic sun-kissed dance-floor. His first viral hit ‚ÄúDoing Yoga‚Äù, had earned him the new talent Inrocks Lab audience award in 2015, film director Guillermo Del Toro‚Äôs enthusiastic endorsement and led to a collaboration with fashion designer Jean-Charles de Castelbajac. Subsequently, he released the stellar breakthrough album 33 000 Ft, undeniably making a name for himself on the electro-pop scene. 
Kazy Lambist is now ready to launch the second chapter, an LP almost six years in the making that shouldn‚Äôt be mistaken for the result of great artistic inertia. The fresh-faced thirty-year old still delighted us with his interim output including, the breezy Sky Kiss EP with a compelling Jean-Beno√Æt Dunckel (Air) collaboration, breathing a new, more classic life into some of his early successes (Decrescendo EP), and a few more exploratory wanderings (‚ÄòNasty‚Äô together with Italian rapper Tutti Fenomeni). He also made the world dance with his live shows and Dj sets, confirming his global appeal with a platinum-certified single (‚ÄòLove Song‚Äô), five gold-certified singles (‚ÄòDoing Yoga‚Äô, ‚ÄòHeadson‚Äô, ‚ÄòOn You‚Äô, ‚ÄòAnnecy‚Äô and ‚ÄòWork‚Äô) and a worldwide tour bookended by a 20-concert US tour alongside fellow French outfit Kid Francescoli. Leading the international acclaim is Turkey, where his success was firmly established following a recent spat of gigs and a month-and-a-half long residence in the artistic neighborhood of Moda, located on the Asian side of the Bosphorus strait. This oriental retreat inspired the name for his new album, Moda, where Kazy Lambist - real name Arthur Dubreucq -  recorded ‚ÄòD√ºnya‚Äô, a seraphic effort featuring the soothing vocals of Sedef Seb√ºktekin over Turkish violins and Jowee Omicil‚Äôs saxophone. Similarly ‚ÄòModa Disko‚Äô, a jubilant Italo-disco collaboration with singer Den Ze would have fitted perfectly in the soundtrack for Italian movie La Grande Bellezza.
Produced with the help of Glasses (seen on ‚ÄúLove Song‚Äù and ‚ÄúOh My God‚Äù) with Ash Workman (Metronomy, Christine and the Queens, Baxter Dury‚Ä¶) officiating behind the mixing desk, the collaborative record, featuring a wealth of instrumental cameos from different background, seamlessly weaves the electronic and more organic sounds together. Geographically expansive, the album draws inspiration from Turkey, Italy (where he lived for two years during the album conception), the South of France (his native Montpellier) with the symbolic Mediterranean serving as a common thread. The album immerses itself in the limbo of a flourishing chill-wave, manifesting in various bustling forms. The album narrates tales of love, striving for both sonic ecstasy and introspective sorrow (‚ÄòAfter All‚Äô), a combination that oozes enough suave (‚ÄòItalian Way‚Äô) and golden reflections (‚ÄòSomebody To Love‚Äô), to shine at variable speeds and better suit the listener‚Äôs mood. This fluid type of pop (‚ÄòNirvana‚Äô featuring Californian singer Julietta) adorns more voluptuously solar highlights to express the disintegration of the relationship between an artist and his muse (‚ÄòLost‚Äô with longtime stage collaborator Amou√´), or becomes more restless in the immoderate elation of wine celebration (‚ÄòM√©diterran√©e‚Äô). The music also takes on a groovy sensuality on ‚ÄòFlawless Form‚Äô, accompanied by the Strasbourg jazz collective Emile Londonien. With Moda, Kazy Lambist explores beyond the borders, all the time preserving a perfect balance between refinement and pleasure.

Photo: @ Antoine Henault

Musikalische Rituale von der Couch aus? Was nach Musiktherapie klingt, ist pures Vergn√ºgen: Resident DJ Missvergn√ºgen gestaltet seit den 2000er Jahren den musikalischen Underground mit ihren eklektischen Sets und ausgesuchten Gast-DJs. 

Eine ziemlich einzigartige Energie geht von den Turntables aus, w√§hrend ihr Abend, jeden Mittwoch (!), zum festen Ritual geworden ist. Undenkbar ist die Mitte der Woche ohne sie, garantiert ist das Vergn√ºgen ‚Äì einmal mehr mit Ivanka als treue Wegbegleiterin auf der Couch!

Iwanka Skrivanek ist eine Komponistin, Sounddesignerin, Soundtrackerin und DJ mit einer Schatzkiste voller goldener Geschichten aus der ganzen Welt. lineup: Vincent Peirani (ACT/FR) *live* // Jokers, w. Ziv Ravitz & Federico Casagrande, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Der Akkordeonist Vincent Peirani gilt als einer der kreativsten Musiker der europ√§ischen Jazzszene und betritt mit seinem Instrument immer wieder neue Wege ‚Äì virtuos und √ºberraschend. Mit seinem Projekt Jokers wendet er sich dem klassischen Format des Jazztrios zu, um mit dessen Konventionen gleich wieder zu brechen. Seine beiden Mitstreiter, Federico Casagrande an der Gitarre und Ziv Ravitz an Schlagzeug und Keyboards, verf√ºgen beide √ºber einen reichen Erfahrungsschatz, ein Interesse an Rock und elektronischer Musik und eine Vorliebe f√ºr musikalische Hybridit√§t. Ob Solist, Rhythmiker, Akzentuierer, Farbgeber oder vieles mehr: Die Idee hinter dieser Besetzung ist das spontane Wechselspiel der musikalischen Rollen untereinander. Gemeinsam taucht das Trio mit der Freiheit des Jazz in eine cineastische und √ºppige Klangwelt ein, die ebenso √ºberrascht wie verzaubert. Ein fantasievolles Jazz-Fusion-Rock-Electronica-Abenteuer mit Spannung, Poesie, Rhythmus, virtuosen Ausbr√ºchen und intimen Momenten.

Wir empfehlen zur Einstimmung das gleichnamige Album, das neben sehr pers√∂nlichen und eigenst√§ndigen Coverversionen von Marilyn Manson, Bishop Briggs oder den Nine Inch Nails auch Eigenkompositionen, vor allem von Peirani selbst, enth√§lt. Trotz aller Einfl√ºsse aus anderen Genres ist Jokers letztlich ein klares Jazzprojekt: Im Mittelpunkt steht die Interaktion. Die drei Musiker h√∂ren einander zu, kommunizieren und erwecken so das Ausgangsmaterial zum Leben. Und sie wandeln auf verschlungenen Pfaden, die erst im Moment des Zusammenspiels entstehen und sich immer wieder neu verzweigen.

In Kindheit und Jugend zun√§chst klassisch ausgebildet, entdeckte Vincent Peirani mit 16 Jahren den Jazz f√ºr sich und studierte sp√§ter am Pariser Konservatorium - dem einzigen in Frankreich, dessen Jazzabteilung Akkordeonisten aufnahm. Seitdem hat er die Sprache des Akkordeons mit seinem Gesp√ºr f√ºr Stilkreuzungen und ungew√∂hnliche Klangfarben grundlegend erneuert. Als lupenreiner Jazzmusiker, dem aber auch Weltmusik, Klassik, Chanson oder Pop leicht von der Hand gehen, engagiert er sich in verschiedenen Projekten, denen er mit seinem dynamischen und innovativen Spiel einen besonderen Zauber verleiht.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Stanislas Augris

______________________________________---


For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

Die d√§nische DJ und Produzentin Courtesy aka Najaaraq Vestbirk pr√§sentiert intimate yell mit Stil: Ihr zweites Album besteht aus einer Mischung aus Deep House, 2-Step, 90er IDM und Ambient, begleitet von einer 15-min√ºtigen Videocollage, die in Zusammenarbeit mit der Fotografin Laura Schaeffer entstanden ist und heute im CCA Berlin ‚Äì Center for Contemporary Arts gezeigt wird. Danach wird die Against Interpretation-Labelbegr√ºnderin und NTS-Resident in die S√§ule gehen, um in guter Gesellschaft zu feiern: Byron Yeates und das Geschwister-Duo S-candalo, die gemeinsam auch die Party La Noche veranstalten, werden zusammen mit dem break-begeisterten DJ Klo- auflegen.

Danish DJ/producer Courtesy aka Najaaraq Vestbirk is launching intimate yell in style: her second album is a force majeure of deep house, 2-step, 90s IDM and ambient, accompanied by a 15-minute video collage created in collaboration with photographer Laura Schaeffer, screening today at the CCA Berlin ‚Äì Center for Contemporary Arts. Afterwards, the Against Interpretation label owner and NTS resident will head to S√§ule to celebrate in good company: the co-promoters of club night La Noche, Byron Yeates and sibling duo S-candalo, will be playing along with breaks-loving DJ Kl≈ç.

event_name: Aurora Edition: Yanling + Jan Urbiks + Amedeo Cappelletti + Tim Novikov (AV)
lineup: Yanling¬†(Live), Choir: Annika D√∂rner, Hannah Endrulat, Dinah Kouyat√©, Mathilda Adamik, Jan Urbiks (Live), Amedeo Cappelletti (Live), Tim Novikov (AV)
information:
Aurora Edition is an avant-garde series of ambient, drone, and experimental live concerts. It takes place in selected institutions and venues. Each live show features customized audio and video projections onto the domes and walls of the respective architecture. With the goal of seamlessly blending music and visuals, Aurora collaborates with multiple artists for each edition, creating impressive atmospheres that perfectly complement and enhance the architectural setting.

Since the series was founded in 2023, Aurora Edition has also evolved into a record label, introducing its first release with Yanling's Cymatic. In the October edition at Silent Green, Yanling will present her new album Cymatic along with a four-person women-led choir, accompanied by performances from Jan Urbiks and Amedeo Cappelletti. Audiovisual artist Tim Novikov will shape the program visually with custom dome projections.

lineup: Gary Beck, Jon Hester, Oliver Deutschmann, Sanna Mun, , Tiefschwarz, Vio PRG, Selina (DE)
information:
‚ñÜ  About the Expeditions
The Expeditions series was founded in spring 2018 with a clear vision of breaking out of the monotony that defines most pure Techno nights in Berlin. The concept is to create a clear musical distinction between the different parts of the night, while remaining loyal to the classical and traditional aspects of Techno: from Detroit groove to hypnotic and atmospheric storytelling. We emphasize energy and progression. We strive to create a clear beginning and a decisive end. We believe in Techno as a journey, designed for the dance floor, rather than for podcasts. Following this principle, we curate the second floor with classic, warm, chord-led interpretations of House music, that serve as a perfect contrast to the main floor program. Occasionally, you might even find a third floor hidden in the vast garden of :// about blank. Explore, that's what the Expeditions is about.

‚ñÜ  What to expect
‚¶ø A Power Deck with well curated interpretations of pure Techno music. No minimalism, no sophisticated preaching. 
‚¶ø A Comfort Deck with a contrasting program, curated with the finest House music: classic Chicago House, Soulful and New York Garage, and Berlin contemporary touches.
‚¶ø DJs at eye level, musically educated audience and Berlin underground at its best. 

‚ñÜ FAQ
 ‚¶ø Is there a dress-code? - No, the Expeditions doesn't have a dress code, but we do encourage you to be creative when choosing an outfit for the party., and to leave your everyday behind.
‚¶ø Is taking photos inside the club allowed?
- No. The Expeditions, and :// about blank have a strict no-photo policy. We also strongly encourage you to check in your phone at the cloakroom and lose the feeling of time. This is, however, not mandatory.‚¶ø Is the Expeditions a safe space for minority groups?
- The Expeditions, and :// about blank in general, are a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism, antisemitism, or homophobia will not be tolerated. In addition, you are requested to familiarize yourself with the principles of consent, and to respect the personal space of any fellow guest. In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our staff at the entrance immediately.

Everyone is subject to a vetting procedure at some stage to ensure relative safety + ultraperverions. There are three routes to attend our main event in London + Berlin:

We strictly do not permit any photo, video or audio recording.

You agree to our Klub Rules by submitting the application form and/or ticket purchase. Failure to comply leads to ejection from the event and a potential lifetime ban and termination of membership. Members are responsible for their friends and partners and for the entire cummunity. Klub Membership or holding a ticket does not guarantee that you will be permitted entry to the event on the night. Reasons for non-admission may include (but are not limited to) our door staff having a genuinely held belief that a ticket holder has: not complying with the dress code, been denied or had their suspended membership suspended, not yet been granted membership but cannot demonstrate a comprehensive understanding of the Klub Rules when asked, been ejected from one of our events, been the subject of a behavioural complaint at a previous or similar event, been disrespectful to our staff or other guests, is overly intoxicated, otherwise demonstrated that they present a risk to our community or licencing conditions. If a patron is denied entry and other ticket holders in their company decide not to enter, no refund can be issued to the ticket holders who voluntarily decided not to enter. information:
A Festival for Contemporary Sounds of Asia and North Africa. 

Future East Festival‚Äôs 4th edition ‚ÄúEXTENSION‚Äù will resonate across three floors of Musikbrauerei, showcasing an exciting spectrum of genres in Electronic and Electro-acoustic music, as well as A/V performances and club night featuring a curated selection of artists from Asia and North Africa.

The Festival Club night (Future Goes Late), invites AN(8)X, KUDUR, and KWIA alongside Future East to create a diverse and unique experience of Berlin‚Äôs night life, Expect an unforgettable fusion of sounds and communities, showcasing the vibrant spirit of the city after dark.
_________________________________

AN(8)X is a Berlin-based artist group curating hybrid art events with a focus on audiovisual performances that spotlight queer, FLINTA artists with ESEA backgrounds. Focused on radical experimentation and community, they showcase the raw, hyper-regional sound of East and Southeast Asia's underground scene.

KUDUR is a Berlin-based collective and party series led by trans/queer BIPOC members, focused on creating safer spaces for community and artistic expression. Inspired by the Mediterranean's rich history, Kudur crosses genre, border, and generational boundaries, blending music, culture, and politics while preserving its members' cultural roots and challenging social norms.

KWIA is a no-longer-secret, ambient-focused listening bar situated along Berlin's Maybachufer that follows in the tradition of Japanese jazz kissas ‚Äîbars with high-end sound systems for attentive listening. Bringing this rare audio culture to Berlin, KWIA offers a queer, musically open space featuring contemplative electronic music.

lineup: BIIANCO¬†, Xenia¬†, T78¬†, VIDO (2)¬†, GNR√ò
teepee (CZ) + Varley (Support act)
information:
Light and darkness. Eyes closed on a journey to your own emotions. The melodies change the rhythm of your heartbeat, while you silently listen to every word sung. It feels like we are all connected and it‚Äôs so obviously honest, real, and it‚Äôs earnest‚Ä¶

With their performances, teepee aims to create a welcoming and safer space, a parallel world where you can stop for a moment and let go. It is a space where any sign of difference is embraced, a place to observe the wonders buried deep within you. Soulful vocal harmonies and captivating melodies help capture the magic between Tereza Laviƒçkov√° and Miroslav Patoƒçka, who formed the dream-pop project teepee in 2015 and have been exploring the space between electric and acoustic elements ever since. Subtle samples and synthetic sounds provide a bed for their melancholic, honest and confessional lyrics. Over time, they have enriched their original sound which is rooted in indie-folk with more electronic and pop elements, highlighted by the involvement of new live musicians.

teepee is a pretty well established band from the Czech Republic with three released studio albums and over 1 million streams on Spotify. They have also played numerous shows throughout Europe and at some major showcase festivals such as Eurosonic Noorderslag, Enea Spring Break, Waves Vienna and Reeperbahn Festival. Right before the outbreak of the Covid-19 pandemic, the band played their biggest European tour in support of the British duo Seafret which also included a sold out show in Berlin.
