lineup: SECRET LINEUP
information:
‚óà Performance Based, Immersive Event ‚óà

‚óè Enter a new world with every floor
‚óè Extensive performance lineup
‚óè Secret music lineup
‚óè Awareness team

‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà

‚óà What to expect? ‚óà
Every floor will be curated by a different art collective, each bringing its own visual design, storytelling, music, and performances to create three unique worlds to explore. These worlds are connected through the Liminal Space, a surreal realm where different realities collide and glitch together, resulting in bizarre performances of roaming creatures. Visit our Insta to get a feeling for the different worlds --> @liminal.events
‚óè Babylon3000: retro-future, silver, metallic, cult-like, hedonistic, technoid, fast.
‚óè The Hilton: extra-fluffy, bouncy, colorful, slutty, juicy, sassy.
‚óè The Naked Tea Party: warm, naked, connected, cozy, aware, slow.
‚óè Liminal Space: glitchy, bizarre, uncanny.

‚óà Was erwartet dich? ‚óà
Jedes Kollektiv √ºbernimmt einen der Floors um ein einzigartiges Design mit eigener Storyline, Musik-Lineup und Performance-Lineup zu kreiren. So entstehen drei verschiedene Welten die darauf warten erkundet zu werden. Diese Welten sind durch den Liminal Space verbunden: Einer surrealen Umgebung, in der Welten verschmelzen und bizarre Performances hinter jeder Ecke auf dich warten. Besuche uns auf Instagram um ein Gef√ºhl f√ºr die verschiedenen Welten zu bekommen --> @liminal.events
‚óè Babylon3000: retro-futuristisch, silber, metallisch, kultartig, technoid, schnell.
‚óè The Hilton: extra-flauschig, bunt, slutty, frech, bouncy.
‚óè The Naked Tea Party: warm, nackt, verbunden, gem√ºtlich, aware, langsam.
‚óè Liminal Space: glitchy, bizarr, ungew√∂hnlich.

‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà

‚óà FAQ ‚óà
> Is there a dress code?
The usual Kater Blau door policy applies. However, we encourage you to bring a character to the event to become a part of it.

> Why the secret music lineup?
Join for the experience and not for a single headliner. Since DJs have enough spotlight in the club environment, we decided to refocus attention on art collectives, performers, storylines, and the awareness concept. Here are some key facts about the musical program:
‚óè Every floor = different music: technoid, bouncy-dirty, and slow. 
‚óè Gender-balanced lineup.
‚óè Artists are allowed to post, so if you dig a bit you will find out. 

> Why the Awareness Team?
We are trying to create an equalizing space, in which it does not matter who you are. A space where you can get a brief rest from the overregulated outside world and experience connection and play while your boundaries are respected. As much as we want to believe in this utopia, we know such an environment can be exploited. The awareness team is a low-barrier touchpoint for you if you experience any form of boundary crossing or discrimination. They are here to listen, take you out of the situation, and assist you if you are unwell. 

‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà‚óè‚óà

-END OF TRANSMISSION-

information:
Laundrette l√§dt zum n√§chsten Vollwaschgang ein, bei dem sich David Elimelech, Partok und Roi Perez wie immer die Booth mit verschiedenen queeren DJs aus aller Welt teilen. Samira ist ein exzellenter pal√§stinensischer House-DJ, der bereits bei der letzten Laundrette in der Panorama Bar aufgelegt hat. Er war Resident im pal√§stinensischen Club Kabareet in Haifa, der im September nach neun Jahren leider seine Pforten schloss. ISAbella ist eine der Mitgr√ºnder*innen von MARICAS, einer auf FLINTA* fokussierten queeren Party in Barcelona, die einen lebendigen Mix aus progressivem House, Breakbeats und Trance spielt. Kodemul kommt aus Mexiko und ist der Veranstalter von Por Detroit, einer queeren Partyreihe in Mexico City und Los Angeles.

Laundrette is hosting another spin cycle, where David Elimelech, Partok and Roi Perez will be sharing the booth as usual with various queer DJs from all over the world. Samira is an excellent Palestinian house DJ, returning to Panorama Bar after the last edition of Laundrette. He was a resident at the Palestinian club Kabareet in Haifa, which sadly shut down in September after nine years. ISAbella is one of the co-founders of MARICAS, a FLINTA*-focused queer party in Barcelona that offers a vibrant mix of progressive house, breakbeats and trance. Kodemul from Mexico is mind behind Por Detroit, a queer party series in Mexico City and Los Angeles.

event_name: Valentina Magaletti & Theresa Baumgartner ‚Ä¢ No√©mi B√ºchi ‚Ä¢ Zavoloka
lineup: Valentina Magaletti¬†, Theresa Baumgartner , No√©mi B√ºchi, Zavoloka
information:
In Cooperation with Heroines of Sound Edition #3  ‚Ä¢ Konzert, AV Show

In cooperation with the feminist electronic music festival Heroines of Sound, Volksb√ºhne presents exciting audio-visual live sets by Valentina Magaletti & Theresa Baumgartner, No√©mi B√ºchi and Ukrainian electronica whiz Zavoloka, in a cooperation with the feminist electronic music festival Heroines of Sound . Expect a multifaceted spectrum of immersive drones, straddling noise avant-garde, field recordings, experimental pop and visual media. Electronic music as symphonic maximalist mix ‚Äì inspired by the embodiment of sound.

Valentina Magalotti & Theresa Baumgartner: LUCHA LIBRE

Friction loss, glitch, clash - drummer Valentina Magaletti‚Äôs compositions for drums and percussive instruments adopt a very inventive approach. On LUCHA LIBRE, she showcases the wildest variations of her versatile techniques exploring technoid sound art in dungeon sound volume, textural rhythms and the amazing potential of consonance and dissonance. Complex, non-linear time situations oscillating within a rhythmical continuum between simple structures, poly-rhythmic overlays and pure chaos, are translated into a dazzling AV show by Theresa Baumgartner in this Berlin debut.

No√©mi B√ºchi: DOES IT STILL MATTER¬†

No√©mi B√ºchi‚Äôs AV set Does It Still Matter will be a German premiere, on show in Berlin for the first time. The music is an exquisite mix of textural drones and delicate yet complex rhythms. Hypnotic cluster compositions made of film music, sound sculptures, classical music fragments and jazzy patches are combined to productively clash in a symphony of sound textures. ¬†Does It Still Matter rounds off a series of previous releases comprising Mati√®re and Matter, all focusing on the embodiment of sound and the physicality of music. B√ºchi‚Äôs sound structures and aesthetic choices are exploring the idea of materiality in an increasingly liquid, fluid, immaterial world.

Zavoloka

Kateryna Zavoloka, sound and media artist, composer and performer from Ukraine, is uncompromisingly devoted to leftfield music free from genre expectations and stylistic requirements. She will present her latest tracks in an elaborate audio-visual set created by the artist herself. Experimental electronic music peppered with references to Ukrainian folk music, and club music combined with analogue instrument use are her speciality, and very accessible at that. Traditional music instruments like the kobza, a Ukrainian guitar, and spilka and kolianka flutes allude to folk songs from Ukraine to soon get lost in an imaginary distance, which adds an almost meditative touch. The focus is on forward-pushing electronic beats that are at once dynamic and lingering. Her last album Amulet was nominated for ‚Äúbest album of the year‚Äù in 2022 by various music magazines. Kateryna Zavoloka lives in Berlin.

event_name: Verboten Berlin - Mountains of Glass Tour 2024
lineup: Verboten Berlin
information:
Alexander Freund alias Verboten Berlin k√ºndigt die ‚ÄûMountains Of Glass‚Äú-Tour an, die im Oktober 2024 starten wird.

F√ºnf ausgew√§hlte Termine in M√ºnchen, Z√ºrich, Wien, Hamburg und Berlin sind geplant. Der exklusive Presale startet ab sofort im Ticketshop: undercover.de. Verboten Berlin ist bekannt f√ºr die Verschmelzung von elektronischen Neo-Kraut-Elementen mit den vielf√§ltigen musikalischen Einfl√ºssen der Berliner Clubkultur. Musiker und Produzent Alexander Freund, der kreative Kopf hinter dem Projekt, gie√üt darin seine Leidenschaft f√ºr das Komponieren und Songwriting in innovative Songs. Die Tracks von Verboten Berlin wurden bereits von K√ºnstlern wie Booka Shade, Rodriguez Jr., Tube & Berger und Monkey Safari geremixt und gesungen und haben es in renommierten Editorial-Playlists wie Low Key Tech und New Music Friday geschafft. Das Ergebnis ist eine stetig wachsende Anh√§ngerschaft.

2024 zieht es Verboten Berlin wieder auf die B√ºhne. Einige ausgew√§hlte Clubshows sind geplant ‚Äì neben Deutschland stehen auch √ñsterreich und die Schweiz auf dem Tourplan. Verboten Berlin-Konzerte sind dabei alles andere als gew√∂hnlich. ‚ÄûF√ºr mich bedeutet Freiheit, dass keiner oben oder unten steht, dass wir uns auf Augenh√∂he begegnen ‚Äì und das verfolge ich auf Tour und mit dem Album,‚Äú betont Alexander Freund. ‚ÄûIch m√∂chte nicht der Ansager sein, nicht die Gef√ºhle anleiten und das Publikum an die Hand nehmen. Ich m√∂chte, dass wir das gemeinsam machen [‚Ä¶]‚Äú Das neue Album ‚ÄûMountains Of Glass‚Äú sieht Freund dabei, ebenso wie die vorherigen Ver√∂ffentlichungen, lediglich als Rahmen. ‚ÄûBesonders freue ich mich darauf, jeden Abend mit einem neuen Track, Beat oder Song von der B√ºhne zu kommen, entstanden in gemeinsamen Momenten, spontan.‚Äú

information:
The popular maxim ‚Äúsee no evil, hear no evil, speak no evil‚Äù doesn‚Äôt have a universal meaning. In some languages the expression denotes choosing to ignore the harmful actions of another, in others it warns against doing the wrong thing yourself. 3hd‚Äôs ‚ÄúSee No Evil‚Äù evening of performances at HAU Hebbel am Ufer, not only explores these differing-though-related interpretations of social agency and responsibility, but also its definition in relation to existing norms and conventions.

Perspective, interpretation, and projection are some of the psychological themes that haunt the work of Cristine Brache and Sigrid Lauren‚Äôs ‚ÄúGoodnight Sweet Thing.‚Äù The forty-minute live performance art piece unfolds over three Acts, beginning with a deconstructed Jello wrestling match between protagonists Mary Magdalene and Nothing Girl‚Äîtwo parts of the same mind in literal and psychic conflict‚Äîbefore the scene transforms into a Victorian psychoanalysis session and then crescendos with a 1950s American prom motif. Adapted from Brache's poetry collection of the same name, the performance intertwines poetry, movement, and a score by Ryan Woodhall, to explore the internal battle for authenticity, and examines its complex relationship with societal pressures and authority.

While ‚ÄúGoodnight Sweet Thing‚Äù reflects on the complexities of masking and societal performance via overlapping historical time periods, customs, and traditions, Damsel Elysium envisions an alternative world altogether. The multi-instrumentalist, composer, and interdisciplinary artist creates an expressive realm outside language. Damsel draws on their recent Whispers From Ancient Vessels release on AD 93 to enact a collection of tales and ‚Äúspeakings‚Äù in immersive live performances that unite sound, plants, and ritual. Their raw and organic soundscapes combine ethereal whispers with the rumbling resonance of their double bass, piano, and field recordings to evoke the voices of nature itself, speaking to its "beautiful evil" by engaging with the earth in all its sublime complexity.

Running for over two evenings, the ‚ÄúSee No Evil‚Äù double-bill will include a one-hour intermission and afterparty with DJ sets by slimgirl fat playing the Friday, and Alice Z Jones on Saturday.

An international band of art punk, provocative indie music. Renowned for their live raucous shows, cinematic visual art & a wild arrangement of styles.
Explosive femme vocals with lyricist & dancer Madeleine Rose, tracks co-produced by Anton Remy, drummer and multi-instrumentalist. Their upcoming Double Album 'Expressions Of Obsessions‚Äô was recorded with both new collaborators and previous members of P.D.O.A.

Playing their part in keeping Germany‚Äôs capital weird, P.D.O.A.‚Äôs live shows hark back to the fearless eccentricity explored by the West Berlin performance art and music collectives of the 1980‚Äôs. P.D.O.A. is an act of near zen-like non duality, hittin‚Äô that golden ratio between the soulful and the sinful.

Originally hailing from Montreal, core duo L√©onie Dishaw and Ga√´lle Cordeau relocated to Berlin in 2019, and with the move came a fresh start for Lemongrab. Locking in the drummer of Leipzig synth-punks Lassie, Teun Verheij, along with Fritz Ali Hansen on bass and Joel Thomas on guitar, the band has made a quick yet lasting impression in the Berlin and German punk scenes. lineup: Monty & Forbidden Kitty
information:
The Venus KickOff Party
INSOMNIA Berlin @ VENUS 2024
Trade fair stand from 11 a.m. with various acts and workshops
Melodic Techno, Techno & Electro by DJs Monty & Forbidden Kitty
Kinky Midnight Show ‚ÄúVikings‚Äù by Brittany Bardot
BDSM playgrounds - whirlpool - couples area
Advance tickets are available on our website or at the INSOMNIA cloakroom. 

INSOMNIA is THE sex-positive hotspot and safe space for hedonists, sexual free spirits, BDSM and fetish lovers, and the queer community.

At Venus 2024, we will once again be presenting ourselves with our own booth, the INSOMNIA Lounge, kinky shows and extraordinary party nights in the club after the fair.

Together with Joyclub Sex Education, we are once again setting a few feminist accents this year against the male-dominated program at the fair ‚Äì sex coaches and modern sex-positive relationship therapists invite you to lectures and stimulating discussions in our INSOMNIA Lounge in Hall 18. But of course the shows won't be neglected either.

At our booth at the Venus trade fair, you can not only have a friendly chat with Dominique and other personalities from INSONIA, but you can also have yourself professionally photographed with your favorite star or starlet by our in-house photographer in a photo corner. A sex coaching area, where tantra specialists and sex therapists inform you about sexual wellness and alternative forms of love and relationships, completes our exciting ensemble.

Every half hour, you can listen to interesting lectures while enjoying a relaxing drink at the specially designed INSOMNIA bar.

Enjoy the days with us at Venus and when the gates close under the radio tower, we will roll out the red carpet at INSOMNIA for international guests and, of course, stars and starlets from the scene.

On Friday, October 25th, from 10:00 p.m., we look forward to the ‚ÄúVenus Kick Off‚Äù party with DJs Monty & Forbidden Kitten and driving techno beats. A breathtakingly indecent show ‚ÄúVikings‚Äù by the enchanting Brittany Bardot awaits you around midnight.

On Saturday, October 26th, from 10 p.m., ‚ÄúVenus Bizarre‚Äù will follow ‚Äì the fetish party and sex-positive hotspot for all night owls. Here you can let yourself go after the day at the fair, try out the newly purchased fetish outfit, dance to the electronic beats of our techno-house-psytrance DJs Anubix & DonDilone and be enchanted by a particularly obscene performance by DoubleTrouble Berlin.

In addition to the party activities, our BDSM catacombs in the basement, the separate playrooms, couple area, clinic area, massage and whirlpool invite you to indulge in forbidden games and sinful activities.

Our attentive awareness team will take care of you and your safe space and is always approachable.

Admission on Friday or Saturday:
‚Ç¨30 per person, ‚Ç¨27 in advance 

Combined ticket for Friday and Saturday:
55‚Ç¨ per person, 50‚Ç¨ presale 

Tickets are also available at the box office at the club or at the INSOMNIA stand at the Venus trade show. It is recommended that you purchase tickets in advance.


Rules of the evening:

Our awareness team will be in the club and is always available to talk to.

No means no.

Do you want to talk to someone, dance or play? Ask politely if they are interested and respect their answer.

Leave others their space when they are playing with each other or being intimate. Do you want to join in? Ask politely and respect their answer.

- Cell phones are not allowed! Leave them in the dressing room.

- Crossing boundaries will not be tolerated. Ask, a no is a no.

Sexual or verbal harassment will not be tolerated under any circumstances.

lineup: Projektbau, Montee, Misha Biork, Dom Hyuga
information:
Toska - noun /Ààt≈ç-sk…ô/ - a feeling of sadness and melancholia without any specific cause.

After years of releasing songs inspired by the anxious & melancholic side of club culture, Projektbau launches international event-series TOSKA to bring his sound of restlessness to intimate venues around the globe.

Inspired by the ethos of emo and punk shows, TOSKA aims to bring back a sense of community and emotional depth that has been lost in the rapid commercialisation of dance music. 

Expect a unique lineup of selectors with a wide sonic palette spanning only the best House, UK Garage, Breakbeat and Trance tunes.

Real Music. Real Emotions.

LINEUP

Projektbau
Montee
Misha Biork
Dom Hyuga

23:00 - 05:00

--


"No single word in English renders all the shades of TOSKA. At its deepest and most painful, it is a sensation of great spiritual anguish, often without any specific cause. At less morbid levels it is a dull ache of the soul, a longing with nothing to long for, a sick pining, a vague restlessness, mental throes, yearning. In particular cases it may be the desire for somebody of something specific, nostalgia, love-sickness. At the lowest level it grades into ennui, boredom.‚Äù - Vladimir Nabokov

information:
Man kann ihn ohne √úbertreibung als die Stimme der House-Musik bezeichnen, die auch diejenigen sofort erkennen, die sich nur gelegentlich in der N√§he eines Dancefloors aufgehalten haben: Robert Owens. Seine Chicago-House-Torch-Songs "Bring Down The Walls" und "Can You Feel It", die er in der zweiten H√§lfte der 80er Jahre zusammen mit Larry Heard aufnahm, oder das 1991 mit Satoshi Tomiie entstandene "I'll Be Your Friend" machten ihn f√ºr immer zur Legende. Seitdem hat Owens seine charismatische Stimme auf unz√§hligen Platten von K√ºnstlern wie Masters At Work, Photek oder zuletzt Luke Slater und seinem Projekt L.B. Dub Corp. erklingen lassen. Robert Owens legt zur heutigen Klubnacht in der Panorama Bar auf, Slater spielt mit seinem House-Projekt live in der S√§ule. Berghain-Premiere f√ºr Grace Dahl, DJ, Produzentin und Labelbetreiberin (Serial Disc Touchers) mit finnisch-ungarischen Wurzeln. Als Resident-DJ der Vault Sessions ist sie f√ºr ihre vielseitigen Techno-Sets, treibenden Grooves und kraftvollen Kickdrums bekannt. Mandel, der auf Refuge Worldwide eine eigene Radiosendung namens House of Highlife hat, legt ebenfalls zum ersten Mal bei uns auf.

It's no overstatement to call him the voice of house music, instantly recognizable to anyone who's ever been remotely near a dancefloor: Robert Owens. His Chicago house-torch songs ‚ÄúBring Down The Walls‚Äù and ‚ÄúCan You Feel It‚Äù, recorded with Larry Heard in the second half of the 80s, and ‚ÄúI'll Be Your Friend‚Äù, which he wrote with Satoshi Tomiie in 1991, made him a legend. Since then, Owens has lent his charismatic voice to countless records by acts such as Masters At Work, Photek and, most recently, Luke Slater and his project LB Dub Corp. Robert Owens will be playing at Panorama Bar for this edition of Klubnacht, and Slater will be playing live in the S√§ule with his house project. Berghain debut for Grace Dahl, DJ/producer and label owner (Serial Disc Touchers) with Finnish-Hungarian roots. As resident DJ of Vault Sessions, she's known for her versatile techno sets, propulsive grooves and powerful kick drums. Also playing here for the first time is Mandel, who has his own radio show called House of Highlife on Refuge Worldwide.

information:
Horror in the Night: Berlin's Ultimate Halloween Haunt

Datum: 26.10.2024
Ort: M-BIA Club Berlin

Willkommen, mutige Seelen, zur ultimativen Halloween-Nacht im M-BIA Club Berlin, wo das Unheimliche erwacht und die Dunkelheit zum Leben erwacht.

Tretet ein in eine d√ºstere Welt des Psytrance. Unser hypnotischer Sound wird euch in einen tranceartigen Albtraum ziehen, aus dem es kein Erwachen gibt.

Folge dem dunklen Ruf der Techno-Beats mit einem d√ºsteren Soundtrack, der Dich auf eine Reise durch die Schatten mitnimmt, die Deinen Verstand herausfordern wird.

Unserer gruseligen Kulisse und schaurigen Dekorationen werden euch in eine andere Dimension transportieren. Bereitet euch auf das Unerkl√§rliche vor und lasst euch von den unheimlichen √úberraschungen verzaubern.

Zieht eure schaurigsten Kost√ºme an und betretet das M-BIA in Berlin, wenn die Dunkelheit hereinbricht. Seid ihr mutig genug, die Nacht des Horrors zu erleben? Unser Event wird eure schlimmsten Albtr√§ume wahr werden lassen. Der Eintritt in den Abgrund kostet nur einen Klick entfernt.

Wenn euer Kost√ºm unseren Kassendamen beeindruckt, wird sie euch gro√üz√ºgig belohnen. Zeigt eure Kreativit√§t und erhaltet eine besondere Anerkennung f√ºr eure M√ºhe!

lineup: Gallowstreet (INI Movement/NL) *live*
information:
Gallowstreet sind eine Brass Band aus Amsterdam, bestehend aus sieben Bl√§sern und einem explosiven Schlagzeuger. Ihr Vorhaben: Das Repertoire einer Brass Band mit einer Melange aus Big Band Swing, Hip-Hop Grooves, Disco und House Kl√§ngen neu aufzustellen. Gallowstreet nutzen diese breite Palette musikalischer Genres, um mit ihren Kompositionen Geschichten zu erz√§hlen, die meisten davon beatgetrieben, alle von hymnischer Qualit√§t. Ihre B√ºhnenshows sind ph√§nomenal, denn mit ihrer unerbittlichen Rhythmik erzeugen sie einen Sog, der die Intensit√§t eines erstklassigen DJ-Sets locker erreicht.

Inzwischen ist die Band seit √ºber zehn Jahren mit ihrer avantgardistischen Blechblasmusik unterwegs und hat sich zu einer gro√üen Inspirationsquelle f√ºr die junge, aufstrebende europ√§ische Brass Band Szene entwickelt. Es vergeht keine Woche, in der nicht ein Gallowstreet Song von jungen, begeisterten Brass Bands neu arrangiert und gecovert wird.

Mit ihrem j√ºngsten Album ‚ÄúA Trip Worth Making‚Äú reflektiert die Gallowstreet-Crew ihre gemeinsame Reise und l√§sst die Herausforderungen, Chancen und Feiern Revue passieren, die sie auf diesem Weg sowohl als Gruppe als auch als einzelne Musiker erlebt haben. Es ist ein H√∂hepunkt des Sounds, den sie im Laufe der Jahre entwickelt haben, indem sie mitsingbare Hymnen, intelligent orchestrierte Drops und Builds sowie emotionsgeladene Riffs effektiv zu einem Album zusammenf√ºgen, das einige der h√§rtesten Bl√§sers√§tze liefert, die die Welt je geh√∂rt hat.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Delicious Tunes

__________________________________________


Gallowstreet, the Dutch brass band with an attitude. Hailing from the Galgenstraat in Amsterdam they have refined their sound through the course of 4 albums.

A decade of innovating brass music. Gallowstreet has been up and at it. This squad of dedicated musicians from Amster¬≠dam has been proving its worth at festivals and clubs both in the Netherlands and abroad. Armed with 7 horn players and 1 drummer the band employs a wide range of musical genres to tell stories with their compositions, most of them beat driven, all of them with anthemic quality.

Gallowstreet has proven to be a big inspiration for the emerging European Brass Band scene. A reference point for musicians that look to the band for inspiration. There‚Äôs no week that goes by without a video of one of the songs being covered by young enthusiastic brass bands from around the globe. Their songs have seen re-arrangements for a wide range of ensembles and Gallowstreet has been a consistent source of inspiration for other bands.  

With ‚ÄúA Trip Worth Making‚Äù the Gallowstreet crew reflects on their communal journey and revisits the challenges, oppor¬≠tunities and celebrations they‚Äôve had along the way, both as a group and as individual musicians. It is a culmination of the sound they‚Äôve developed throughout the years, effectively using ready-to-sing along anthems, intelligently orchestrated drops and builds and emotionally laden riffs to build an album that delivers some of the heaviest brass music the world has ever heard. With shows on Lowlands, North Sea Jazz, Bout Du Monde, in Algeria, Slowakia and Turkey and sold out clubshows in the famous Paradiso in Amsterdam and the legendary New Morning in Paris the band is a well-traveled, seasoned ensemble that knows the crack of the whip when it comes to playing big shows for large crowds.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

information:
Chaos comes before all principles of order and entropy. Its foolish desires encompass every choreography; each dance, a performance of chaos. By invoking chaos magick, we call upon ourselves all kinds of forces; those that bring liberation and joy and those that could potentially harm or paralyze us.

If our boundaries aren't firm, we risk giving up too much of our personal power. Like elements called upon when casting a circle, think of your boundaries as the forces you conjure to protect yourself by blocking out unwanted influences.

Recall: When did someone last cross the line with you? 

Define: What are the absolute limits that others can‚Äôt cross without consequences?

Assert: Take these boundary definitions and turn them into affirmations.

As a form of reversal magic, this spell moves the energy of the boundary from being dependent on the actions of others to affirming your own principles. It‚Äôs not so much about shifting the paradigm as it is about rewiring the paradigm from the inside. The first step is to call all your power back to you. From there, you can explore. To release the mind from habitual thinking, a stimulus may be required.

It is HIGH‚õ§‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã5.
Let the ceremony begin.

‚õ§‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã We call upon the element of EARTH to bring stability and resilience.

‚õ§‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã We call upon the element of WATER to bring fluidity and compassion.

‚õ§‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã We call upon the element of FIRE to bring transformative energy that creates rather than destroy.

‚õ§‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã We call upon the element of AIR to bring mental clarity and learning.

‚õ§‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã We call upon the element of SPIRIT in the tarot archetype of the Hierophant, the wise and mighty Mistress who shows us the ancient path that will set us free and protect us from evil forces.

Look around: you're surrounded by potential accomplices, comrades, lovers, maenads, sorceresses. Dare to glimpse new routes and states of existence. Experiment with choices and (per)versions of yourself you'd never thought possible. Wear some make-up (and not much more). Perceive and perform your power, share and submit your power and wisdom, and empower each other in return. 

Come early and stay late.
HIGH‚õ§5

A part of the proceeds from HIGH‚õ§5 will go to benefit ONYX & ROSA - A Sex Positive Tarot Film.

Follow us on Telegram for details on the location and more!

information:
Pre-Sale only - Tickets via Eventbrite: EARLY BIRD TICKETS & REDUCED PRICE NOW AVAILABLE!

The QUEER SKIN exhibition explores themes of identity, body transformation, and rebellion against conventional beauty standards. This event celebrates queer art, fashion, music, and expression, featuring interdisciplinary works from painting and photography to live performances and music acts. Attendees can also join a panel discussion on queer art and visibility before the runway show, which blends fashion, performance, and art in a unique spectacle. The evening concludes with an aftershow party, where queer DJs will set the tone for a night of dancing and celebration.

information:
The percussionist, electronic musician and bassist Burkhard Beins is celebrating his sixtieth birthday as a constantly reinventing veteran and companion of Berlins Echtzeitmusik. For this occasion, he invites a 60-sextet made up of Berlin scene and international guests, old and new companions, for a very special, collectively improvised birthday concert as part of the series biegungen im ausland.
In his performances, the self-taught musician uses various sound objects and unusual sound generators (small electrics) in addition to the drums. Since the late 1980s he has been playing at international festivals, as well as concerts and tours in Europe and North America. Burkhard Beins has already worked with countless musicians and composers, including Keith Rowe, Sven-√Öke Johansson, Peter Niklas Wilson, Orm Finnendahl, John Tilbury, Charlemagne Palestine and Axel D√∂rner. He is a member of the ensembles Perlonex (with Ignaz Schick), Activity Center (with Michael Renkel), Polwechsel, The Sealed Knot, Phosphor, Trio Sowari, BBB and others.

Trio Sowari brings together three musicians who have developed a very personal approach to their instrument. Respectively based in London, Paris and Berlin, Phil Durrant, Bertrand Denzler and Burkhard Beins never cease to widen the scope of their research at the crossroads of different acoustic and electronic worlds. Beyond the rigour of their improvisations, their music is nourished by multiple influences and the countless collaborations they have with artists from all horizons. Trio Sowari thus becomes a space in perpetual mutation where different currents of experimental music meet and in which asymmetrical concretions are formed, marking out an unpredictable topography. In 2024, Trio Sowari will be celebrating its 20th year of existence. Since 2004, the trio has played at numerous international festivals and venues throughout Europe. The group will release its fourth album to mark the anniversary.

Sara Neidorf (they/she) is a Berlin-based drummer and film curator. They drum in the bands Mellowdeath, Aptera, Graien, Mad Kate | The Tide, and Sarattma. Neidorf has worked as a musician in theater and dance contexts, live scoring films, and as a session drummer has toured internationally with such artists as The Brian Jonestown Massacre, Hypnodrone Ensemble, Tau, and Sometimes With Others. She co-directs and curates Final Girls Berlin Film Festival, which screens horror films made by FLINTA* filmmakers. Whether in their music or film work, they're interested in exploring crevices, tensions, transgressions, and the sites where conventions implode upon themselves.
 
DO U WANT TO MOVE BACK TO LDN is a collaborative project between John T. Gast and Solomon Gar√ßon. The project uses experimental techniques borrowed from noise, dub, classical, and film score. Their live performances take an improvisational approach which is echoed in the recorded output available viaDOUWANTTOMOVEBACKTOLDN.COM 
Previous shows include Cafe Oto (UK), Spanners (UK) and IIR Resideny (DK).
 
This show uses strobe lights.
 
This event takes place as part of Hillside.

lineup: Svetlana Spajiƒá ‚Äì voice, Andi Stecher ‚Äì drums, Guido M√∂bius ‚Äì feedback, Bass, electronics
information:
Gordan make music between expressivity and abstraction. Their pieces are open processes that create a loss of sense of time. Arrangements reduced to the essentials and expressive singing combine to form a powerful musical whole. Something new emerges from minimalism, intensity and the Balkan singing tradition.

When Gordan's first album ‚ÄúDown In The Meadow‚Äù was released on Morphine Records in October 2021, it was celebrated by critics and listeners alike. In May 2024, the trio presented their second, in some respects even more radical album (‚ÄúGordan‚Äù, Glitterbeat Records). With this release, Gordan reinforces the mystique of legends and stories from the Balkan countries through controlled feedback, hypnotic bass, expressive drumming and the unique singing of Svetlana Spajic.

Gordan‚Äôs music is marked by radical reduction, seemingly endless ascension and a passion for experiments. The Serbian singer Svetlana Spajiƒá is an internationally recognized expert on the history and practice of an extremely rich musical tradition. She knows and masters the hyperlocal singing styles of the Balkan Peninsula like no other contemporary singer. Guido M√∂bius plays bass and various electronic sound generators. He also uses a guitar amplifier, microphone and effects to provoke feedback that harmonizes with or rubs against the vocals. A dialogue between sound and noise, expanded or fragmented by Andi Stecher's expressive drumming. Stecher dispenses with any ornamentation and at the same time plays in a varied and concentrated manner. Together the trio forms a dynamic sound body.

lineup: Sungazer (676832 Records DK2/US) *live, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Elektro-Future-Jazz-Explosion

Sungazer, gegr√ºndet in Brooklyn New York, besteht aus dem Bassisten und Musik-Youtuber Adam Neely und dem Schlagzeuger Shawn Crowder. Wer ihre letzte Show im Gretchen gesehen hat, wei√ü: Ihre Konzerte sind eine Explosion aus Fusion-Jazz, 8-Bit, Glitch und Progressive Rock. Sungazer springen in die L√ºcke zwischen Jazz und Electronica, bringen den Geist der Improvisation in die elektronische Musik und zaubern pure Jazzeuphorie auf die B√ºhne. Mit ihrer speziellen Mischung arbeiten sie im Grenzbereich zwischen Jazzimprovisation und moderner elektronischer Musik√§sthetik.

Sungazer gibt‚Äôs seit 2014. In der Zwischenzeit waren sie bereits mit Ghost-Note, Shubh Saran und Moon Hooch auf Tournee und sind auf drei Kontinenten aufgetreten. Nach den beiden vielversprechenden EPs ‚ÄúSungazer Vol.1‚Äú und ‚ÄúSungazer Vol.2‚Äú ver√∂ffentlichten sie 2022 ihre erste LP ‚ÄúPerihelion‚Äú. Koproduziert und gemischt von Simon Grove, sowie unter Mitwirkung einer F√ºlle von Gastmusiker*innen eingespielt, bringen sie hier ihr √§sthetisches Programm auf den Punkt. Au√üerdem tauchen die beiden auf YouTube regelm√§√üig tief in die Technik ihrer Kunst ein und erreichen mit ihren skurrilen Videoproduktionen ein riesiges Publikum.

Wie Sungazer das Spielerische mit dem Methodischen verbinden und welche glitzernden Kl√§nge sie aus der elektronischen Welt zaubern, l√§sst sich sehr gut am Beispiel der Tracks 'THICC', 'Drunk' und 'Threshold' nachvollziehen.

Photo: Jeanette D. Moses

_______________________________________


Sungazer is an international Future Jazz duo featuring YouTuber / bassist Adam Neely and drummer Shawn Crowder.

Originally formed in Brooklyn, NY in July of 2014, Sungazer has brought their unique blend of hard-hitting Jazz Fusion, 8-bit and Progressive Rock to audiences in the U.S. and Europe. Sungazer explores the human element of improvisation within the context of modern electronic music. Exciting, hard-hitting, and never predictable, Sungazer creates music aimed squarely ahead into the 21st century. They released their sophomore EP entitled Sungazer, Vol.2 in 2019.

On October 11, 2021 they released their debut full-length album, Perihelion. The long-awaited debut LP explores time and the liminal spaces between jazz improvisation and modern electronic music aesthetics. The album was co-produced and mixed by Simon Grove (Plini, Protest The Hero, Intervals) and features an eclectic cast of guest musicians.

Photo: Jeanette D. Moses

29.10 ‚Ä¢ Tea Eater (US / feat. Gustaf member) @ Barkett Berlin

Tea Eater is a New York City based indie rock / art punk band led by Tarra Thiessen of Gustaf and Sharkmuffin. Their sound combines catchy hooks with sardonic lyrics about butter, killing your doppelganger, and how the DMV is the worst. Formed in 2022, Tea Eater quickly established themselves through their high-energy live shows and DIY ethos. Since the release of their first single ‚ÄòI‚Äôm Starting a Podcast‚Äô, Tea Eater have shared the stage with Thee Oh Sees, completed a successful residency at Bushwick venue The Broadway, and toured the U.S. East Coast.

Their debut album ‚ÄòObsession‚Äô, produced and mixed by Drew Vandenburg (Bambara, Faye Webster, Of Montreal), released in the fall of 2023.

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen f√ºrs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas f√ºr den Floor ‚Äì jeden Dienstag k√∂nnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung ‚Äì jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer K√ºnste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen f√ºr alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erkl√§rt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie l√§uft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots f√ºr den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu sp√§t zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

lineup: The Herbaliser Band (/UK) *live*
information:
Back On Track: The Herbaliser Band

Jazz, Electronica und Funk, zusammengehalten durch ein frisches Hip-Hop Ger√ºst, daf√ºr steht das Duo The Herbaliser.  Im Januar 1995 ver√∂ffentlichten Ollie Teeba und Jake Wherry alias The Herbaliser ihre erste 12"-Single "The Real Killer" beim britischen Label Ninja Tune. Viele werden au√üerdem ihr im gleichen Jahr erschienenes Deb√ºtalbum kennen: "Remedies‚Äú ist eine Mischung aus harten Breaks, Jazz-Samples und Funk und geh√∂rt zu den Klassikern der Genre√ºberschreitung. Bereits ein Jahr sp√§ter erschien gleich ein zweiter Klassiker: "Blow Your Headphones". Im Zuge der Aufnahmen erweiterten sie ihr Programm um eine achtk√∂pfige Live-Band und verfolgten die Idee, Clubmusik auf Tour zu schicken. Die The Herbaliser Band war geboren und wurde zwei Jahrzehnte lang zu einem festen Bestandteil vieler Elektro-, Dance- und Jazz-Festivals auf der ganzen Welt und war in vielen Clubs zu Hause.

Im Jahr 2020 endete die Zusammenarbeit des urspr√ºnglichen Duos. Jetzt hat sich die Herbaliser Band um Ollie Teeba herum neu aufgestellt und kommt vorbei, um die Alben ‚ÄúRemedies‚Äú und ‚ÄúBlow Your Headphones‚Äú auf die Gretchen-B√ºhne zu bringen.

Die Besetzung besteht derzeit aus Easy Access AKA Ralph Lamb (Trompete/Fl√ºgelhorn), Andrew Ross (Tenor-/Baritonsaxophon), James Morton (Altsaxophon), Micah Moody (Schlagzeug), Patrick Dawes (Perkussion) und Ollie Teeba an den Turntables.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.  

_______________________________________


The Herbaliser Band

Way back In January 1995, Ollie Teeba and Jake Wherry AKA The Herbaliser, a
sample-based beatmaking duo from Twickenham, South West London, released their debut 12‚Äù single ‚ÄòThe Real Killer‚Äô on UK label Ninja Tune. The pair were deeply immersed in Hip Hop culture and heavily into digging around in dusty record bins looking for funky samples.
As well as jazz and soul records, they had a particular taste in old movie soundtracks, which would become a particular characteristic of their production sound.
They soon followed up with their first LP, ‚ÄòRemedies‚Äô Establishing themselves as one of the main features of the Ninja Tune crew, as they expanded their roster of eclectic artists and DJs. The following year, as they were recording their second full length release, ‚ÄòBlow Your Headphones‚Äô, they extended their output to include an 8 piece live band and debuted June 1996 at George IV in Brixton. The Herbaliser Band, (which would count among it‚Äôs members,
the likes of Easy Access, Chris Bowden and Kaidi Tatham) continued on, touring
internationally, to great reception, from diverse audiences and would become regulars at a multitude of electronic, dance, dub and jazz festivals, worldwide, for the next 2 decades or so.
Finally, in 2020, the relationship, of the production duo that this all began with, came to a conclusion. Yet, in July 2021, when the second pandemic lockdown was in effect, the band performed and recorded a performance for a remote festival in Japan. All bands that year, would perform remotely, if at all.
Now, in 2024, after something of a hiatus, The Herbaliser Band have reformed with a lineup that currently includes Easy Access AKA Ralph Lamb (trumpet/flugelhorn) & Andrew Ross
(tenor/baritone sax-flute), James Morton (alto sax), Micah Moody (drums), Patrick Dawes (percussion) & Ollie Teeba on the turntables.  

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

information: Nyokabi Kari≈©ki is a Kenyan composer and sound artist. Her spectrum includes classical contemporary and experimental electronic music, pop, film and (East) African traditions, which she is committed to preserving. She performs with piano, voice, electronics and African instruments (kalimbas, mbira, etc.) and is considered a crucial voice in experimental music. // The Growth Eternal is a spiritual bass and vocoder music project. With their sound textures they interweave different genres, turn plants into sound sources and use music as medicine.

lineup: Michael Sebastian, kiskadee
information:
Live Dance musician Michael Sebastian and producer Kiskadee co-headline their debut Berlin show at Sal√∂√∂n. Touring their organic dance music from London, expect Kiasmos meets Fela Kuti.

Michael Sebastian merges contemporary discipline with transcendental spirituality, through jazz improvisation and play. This is framed by an objective to create spaces of collective ecstasy, inspired by his time on a variety of dance-floors. He has just released his EP ‚ÄòMove‚Äô featuring incredible collaborators from all disciplines. Featured on New Music Friday South Africa, COLORS, CLASH & Earmilk. 

Kiskadee makes organic electronic music capturing sounds from his surroundings to transform them into uplifting soundscapes that reflect his own experiences. He spent 2023 creating his debut album, first traveling to Iceland to immerse himself in nature and develop the project. A Room for Breathe, released May 2024. Featured on CLASH, Complex & Voices Radio; he has also worked alongside producers such as Andrew Wyatt, Kid Harpoon and Stint; and artists such as James Bay, Liam Gallagher and MIA.

A show you do not want to miss!

lineup: MissVergn√ºgen, The Hans
information:
Hinter dem ‚Äûletzten Strohhalm des Punk. Besser als Mozart‚Äú steht eine smarte Leichtigkeit: Einmal vom The Hans-Sound gepackt, hat uns ein beschwingter Rock‚Äôn‚ÄôRoll im Griff, der mit dem Punk scharfsinniger, ironischer und genauso humorvoller Texte Hand in Hand geht. 
Schlie√ülich ist The Hans ‚ÄûIggys rechte Faust‚Äú und ‚ÄûBowies schwarzes Auge‚Äú, wie es eine der wenigen Infos √ºber ihn im Netz, hier das Fever Creek Festival, preisgeben. Doch wer surfend durch die Datens√§tze auf der Suche nach mehr Infos ist, st√∂√üt, in einen direkten Sog geratend, auf seine Songs: Beseelt und bei einem Gitarren-Sound, der schon mit The Kinks oder The Monks verglichen wurde, f√ºhrt uns The Hans beispielsweise durch ‚ÄûIggy‚Äôs City‚Äú oder schmei√üt mit messerscharfem Witz Spekulanten aus Berlin raus ‚Äì all das nur einen Griff zur E-Gitarre entfernt!

"Was des Tigers t√§glich Brot (der waghalsige Sprung durch den Feuerreif) ist f√ºr The Hans der beherzte Griff zur E-Gitarre. F√ºr so einen Zirkus gibt es wohl keinen besseren Ort als das Eschschloraque. The Hans spielt wohldressierten Punk, charmant und bissig, frei von Tierqu√§lerei und auch textlich immer einen Sprung voraus." (Artist Statement)

F√ºr so ein Konzert gibt es wohl kaum eine bessere Gastgeberin als MissVergn√ºgen. Seit jeher gestaltet sie den Berliner Underground als Musikerin und DJ mit, zuerst in der ‚Äûselbst-zur-Bar-ernannten‚Äú Garage im Hinterhof des ber√ºhmt-ber√ºchtigten Eimer, in der Waffengalerie oder im King-Kong-Klub. Seit 2006 bespielt sie die Mittwochabende im Eschschloraque mit eklektischen Sets und gibt der Subkultur mit DJ-G√§sten und Konzerten, wie The Hans, wieder eine Stimme. Ein vergn√ºglicher Zirkus. Besser als Mozart und Bach zusammen.

lineup: House of Lunacy is an Adult playground for the senses, a sex positive space with consent and comfort at it's principle core. A warren of Art, Theatre and Performances from Berlins most creative souls
information:
Lovers, Dreamers and the Decadent Damned,

Your are cordially invited to the court of the creatures of the night‚Ä¶

The darker months will have fallen upon us and with it we are shrouded in a hazy mist. This can only mean one thing, Halloween is near and the veil is at its thinnest‚Ä¶

There is a place that exists within a realm we can only reach once a year, a place where the beautiful the damned and the delicious dance amongst ageless creatures.

Who‚Äôs ready to step through the veil and into a world of temptation and satisfaction. Adorn yourself with your finest robes and taste the blood on your lips as we haunt these walls with immortal souls. 

Take a bite. We are delicious.

House of Lunacy - Dark Versailles The Vampire Ball
31.10.2024
Renate


This is the last House of Lunacy of 2024 and will begin our countdown of the final year of House of Lunacy. You don't want to miss it. 

House of Lunacy is a Lovers Labyrinth set over all floors of Renate. Get lost and find yourself, and explore our installations, our live art, performances and dance to the early hours with our carefully curated DJs and music. 

Costumes are essential. 

ENTRY : We are a LGBTQ+ space and we do not tolerate any forms of discrimination or Homophobia. 

House of Lunacy has a strict dress code and door policy. Each event is created with a creative theme in mind for guests to explore with their clothes, costumes and bodies. 

This is not negotiable and we expect all who jump into this world to join in. This is to enhance everyones experience and to truly create a new adventurous world of love and freedom. 

‚úµ DRESS CODE ‚úµ 
Our world is only reachable when in costume. Dark Versailles, Baroque, Renaissance, Vampires, Ballgowns, Powder wigs, decadent pearls and jewels, over the top kink and fetish, divine creatures, dandies, jesters, strumpets and demons.  

GUIDELINES 
‚úµ HOUSE RULES‚úµ

Unfortunately nobody can ever guarantee a space is 100% safe, but we are striving for perfection. 

No means no. Yes can always become No. 

Never take what doesn't want to be taken and don't give what is not wanted.

Consent is not negotiable. 

We take this very seriously. 

We DO NOT tolerate any form of discrimination, Racism, homophobia, anti trans or hate speech. 

Respect. Respect. Respect. 

Anyone who is found to be disobeying these rules, you will be leaving immediately and dealt with accordingly. 

We will have our care team and Awareness team walking around The House at all times. 

A hand-picked selection of caring and loving souls and party veterans who know how to look out for you and are there to help with whatever the situation. 

Any member of staff (incl bar staff) can be spoken to at any time, they are all connected via walkie talkie to security and the door. 

Never feel embarrassed about asking and talking to them. 

Take care of one and other and always reach out if needed. Find us over in our new Luniverse - 

*Please note RA tickets does not guarantee entry. You have to comply to The House and Renate's rules and door policy.

**NO REFUNDS FOR NO COSTUME **

information:
Jasmine Myra: Euphorische Instrumentalmusik

Nach einer sensationellen Show im letzten Jahr, kommt die britische Saxophonistin Jasmine Myra im Oktober wieder bei uns vorbei und bringt auch gleich ein neues Album mit. Wundersch√∂n arrangiert, verbindet ‚ÄúRising‚Äú Jasmine Myras musikalische Einfl√ºsse zwischen Kenny Wheeler, Bonobo, Olafur Arnalds und Shabaka Hutchings zu einem stimmigen Ganzen.  Ihre spirituelle Instrumentalmusik hat einen euphorischen und erhebenden Klang und weist dabei eine ganz besondere Qualit√§t auf - schwelgerisch, melodisch und gl√ºckselig, ohne in Sentimentalit√§t abzugleiten.

Die Saxophonistin, Komponistin und Bandleaderin Jasmine Myra stammt aus Leeds und lebt heute in London. Seit 2022 ist sie bei Gondwana Records unter Vertrag und arbeitet eng mit Labelbesitzer und Produzent Matthew Halsall zusammen, dessen Gesp√ºr f√ºr Talente bereits die Musik von GoGo Penguin, Mammal Hands und Hania Rani in die Welt getragen hat. Im Sommer 2022 ver√∂ffentlichte sie ihr hochgelobtes Deb√ºtalbum Horizons", das von der Kritik begeistert aufgenommen wurde. Mit Clubshows und Festivalauftritten in ganz Gro√übritannien und auf dem europ√§ischen Festland nahm ihre Karriere rasant Fahrt auf.

‚ÄúRising‚Äú kn√ºpft nahtlos an die Qualit√§t des Vorg√§ngers an und ist ein wichtiges Statement f√ºr den britischen Jazz. Aufgenommen hat sie das Album erneut mit dem Gitarristen Ben Haskins, dem Schlagzeuger George Hall, dem Pianisten Jasper Green, der Harfenistin Alice Roberts und dem Bassisten Sam Quintana, die gemeinsam die subtilen Texturen von Myras Musik gekonnt unterstreichen und mit einer kollektiven Sensibilit√§t und Dynamik spielen, die die Musik wirklich auf eine strahlende Reise schickt. Don‚Äôt miss!

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Emerged Agency

_________________________________________


After a sensational show last year, British saxophonist Jasmine Myra returns in October with a new album.

Jasmine Myra is a saxophonist, composer and bandleader from Leeds, now based in London. Her original instrumental music has a euphoric and uplifting sound, influenced by artists as diverse as Bonobo, Olafur Arnalds and Kenny Wheeler, whose music shares an emotive quality that can also be heard in Jasmine's own compositions. In early 2022, she signed to Gondwana Records and worked with label owner and producer Matthew Halsall (whose keen ear for talent has helped bring the music of GoGo Penguin, Mammal Hands and Hania Rani to the wider world) to deliver her critically acclaimed debut album 'Horizons' in summer 2022.

Following the release of 'Horizons', Jasmine's musical career and profile skyrocketed over the next year and a half. Brilliant reviews worldwide, massive radio airplay and top streaming playlists led to major tours and festival appearances across the UK and mainland Europe.

Elevating, uplifting and beautifully arranged: Jasmine Myra's second album 'Rising' builds on the success of her groundbreaking debut to deliver a major statement from one of the UK's rising jazz stars. Produced by Matthew Halsall and mixed by Greg Freeman, 'Rising' is a confident and vibrant follow-up that connects the musical dots between Myra's influences Kenny Wheeler, Bonobo and Shabaka Hutchings to create something unique, beautiful and profound.

‚ÄòRising‚Äô features the same core of musicians as ‚ÄòHorizons‚Äô, with guitarist Ben Haskins, drummer George Hall pianist Jasper Green, harpist Alice Roberts and bassist Sam Quintana who collectively bring a deft understating of the subtle textures of Myra‚Äôs music and perform with a collective empathy and drive that really pushes the music on a radiant journey.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

Er√∂ffnet wird der Abend von Agata, die k√ºrzlich Tracks auf NO BORDERS und loveisthetruth ver√∂ffentlicht hat.

With a cohesive blend of techno, IDM and breakcore, DJ/producer Whrikk from the Netherlands combines complex drum programming and melodic elements, finding the perfect balance between danceable grooves and electronic mayhem. Besides his DJ set, this S√§ule night welcomes a live set by Volruptus: the Reykjav√≠k native's latest album Moxie arrived last year via Herrensauna, offering unruly drums, erratic arpeggios and glitchy bass. Opening the night will be Agata, who has recently released tracks on NO BORDERS and loveisthetruth.

lineup: Samantha Michelle , Kristina Sheli
information:
Samantha Michelle is a rising DJ known for her electrifying sets and diverse musical style. Based in New York, she blends genres effortlessly, captivating audiences with her infectious energy and eclectic taste. Drawing from a wide range of influences, Samantha creates unique atmospheres with rich textures and groovy beats. Her dedication to pushing creative boundaries and delivering unforgettable performances has cemented her status as a rising star in the DJ world, inspiring audiences worldwide.

Kristina Sheli is a versatile Georgian singer-songwriter and DJ based in Berlin, celebrated for her broad range across genres like house, electronica, and hip-hop. With over a decade of live performances both in Berlin and internationally, she has collaborated with renowned producers such as The Beatminerz, Martin Badder, and Ruede Hagelstein. Her music, a fusion of various influences from hip-hop to house, has been released on esteemed labels like Get Physical and Defected Records to name a few.

‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà  ABOUT US  ‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà‚ñà
... ... ...

Curious to know what really defines us?

-- COMMUNITY
We have a sexy, open-minded, and close-knit community that extends far beyond the usual forms of social media. Pre and after-parties are usually part of the overall experience.

-- CLUBS & VENUES
Clubs/Venues are regularly changed, shaping the long nights to be specially tailored to the location and differing in our specials and lineup.

-- ARTISTS & SPECIALS
We invite special artists & performers to our parties or create space for new extravagant ideas in our world. Keep an eye out for specials on our flyers or in social media. We make a point to always prepare something unique.

-- EXCLUSIVITY
The audience depends on the event; we make our selection on-site, sometimes online, and check the dress code at the door. You can be sure that we have developed a sense of who brings the right mindset.

-- MEANING
It's not just about sex - it's about a feeling, a relaxed mindset that we prefer. We come to celebrate, to connect, and to find out what our Libido(h) wants to do with us. Those who come only for the F-word should stay outside.

-- PRIVACY
No-photo policy, not even by photographers.


And what else?

-- SAFETY & CONSENT
Of course, we also take care of your safety. An awareness team is deployed for every event, security is present, and our rules are highlighted. You can find them on our website as well.

-- ACCESSIBILITY & INCLUSIVITY
A platform for newcomers and a meeting point for the scene. We want to ensure that the right characters have access to our world. So don't hesitate to ask questions and give feedback, whether in person at the door, in the club, or online. If you're uncertain about the dress code, we can gladly provide recommendations.

information:
Tehran Contemporary Sounds is proud to announce the fifth edition of the TCS festival to be happening 29th of October to 3rd of November 2024 in Bethanien Studio 1 and Kino Central.
TCS is a Berlin-based hub, for Iranian musicians, sonic and visual artists and collectives living abroad as well as in Iran, with the aim to bring together the different voices and forces of the big spectrum of the Iranian contemporary, experimental art and music scene, widely spread across the globe.
TCS is dedicated to, creating a platform for showcasing the unique talents of the Iranian artists and musicians; creating a cross-border collaboration hub; facilitating an artistic and interdisciplinary dialogue;

In the five days of the festival we‚Äôll have, a number 15 av performances, in Kunstquartier Bethanien Studio 1 and two days of film screenings curated by Experimental Film Society at Kino Central.

TCS is turning Five!!! 

Please follow our social media pages and website for exact opening and admission times!

lineup: Julius Rodriguez (Verve/US) *live*, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Der in New York geborene und in Los Angeles lebende Multiinstrumentalist, Komponist, Bandleader und Produzent Julius Rodriguez sprengt alle Grenzen und pr√§sentiert einen einzigartigen Sound, der nur ihm geh√∂rt. Auf seinem aktuellen Album ‚ÄúEvergreen‚Äú jongliert er mit Elementen aus Jazz, Gospel, Hip-Hop, Klassik und Electronica. Keyboardsounds, Vocoder und digitale Drums treffen auf reiche Melodie- und Harmonieparts, das Ganze klingt hochmodern, ist ebenso eing√§ngig wie komplex und geht sofort ins Ohr. Beschr√§nkte er sich auf dem Vorg√§nger ‚ÄúLet Sound Tell All‚Äú noch weitgehend auf seine Hauptinstrumente Klavier und Schlagzeug, so spielt er hier neben diversen Keyboards und Percussion auch Bass, Gitarre und Klarinette.

Auf die Frage nach den Genres hat er eine klare und sch√∂ne Antwort: "Ich hoffe, ihr h√∂rt das hier und vergesst die ganze Sache mit den Genrebezeichnungen", sagt er. "Das ist einfach Musik, zu der man tanzen, f√ºhlen und denken kann. Evergreen geht durch eine ganze Reihe von Genres, aber das ist die Welt, die ich sehe und h√∂re. Das ist das Gef√ºhl, das ich hervorrufe. Ich habe ein Statement abgegeben und gesagt: Das Genre bin nur ich". Kurzum: Julius Rodriguez verk√∂rpert den wahren Geist des Jazz, indem er ihn v√∂llig befreit in die Zukunft f√ºhrt.

Wer im Alter von 25 Jahren bereits eine derart ausgereifte Musikalit√§t an den Tag legt, muss sich wohl das Pr√§dikat Wunderkind gefallen lassen. Rodriguez ist ein Multitalent: Klavier und Harmonielehre zu beherrschen, helfe ihm beim Schlagzeugspielen, das wiederum die rhythmische Dimension des Klaviers besser erfasse, sagt er. Sein Werdegang in Stichworten: mit zw√∂lf an der Manhattan School of Music, mit vierzehn erste Auftritte, dann ans legend√§re Julliard. Beim Betty Carter Workshop wurde er unter anderem von Jason Moran unterrichtet. Inzwischen hat er mit Wynton Marsalis, Roy Hargrove oder Meshell Ndegeocello gearbeitet und war Mitglied des Onyx Collective.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

pr√§sentiert von hhv

Photo: atibaphoto

_____________________________________


No matter where, Julius Rodriguez, the New York-born and Los Angeles-based multi-instrumentalist, composer, and producer electrifies any lane. By doing so, he also transcends perceived boundaries between genres and styles, redefining the music to mirror his own fluid creative inclinations and delivering a sound that's solely his alone.
Following widespread applause from The New York Times, Vanity Fair, The FADER, and more, collaborations with everyone from Wynton Marsalis to A$AP Rocky, and tens of millions of streams, he grows in as many directions as possible on his second full-length offering, EVERGREEN [Verve Records].

"An 'EVERGREEN' is a plant whose foliage remains functional for all seasons. That's similar to how I like to be; I want to be myself no matter the genre I'm playing or what's going on around me. There are a lot of styles on this record, but it's recognizably my voice."
By breaking boundaries with EVERGREEN, Julius has lived up to the true spirit of jazz by ushering it towards the future freely. "I hope you hear this and forget about the whole genre labeling thing," he leaves off. "This is just music you can dance to, feel to, and think to. It's not about categorizing; it's about enjoying something for what it is. EVERGREEN goes through a whole bunch of genres, but this is the world I'm seeing and hearing. This is the feeling I'm invoking. I made a statement and said, 'The genre is just me'."

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

Presented by hhv

information:
WE LOVE:
The Killers // The Wombats // Metronomy // Two Door Cinema Club // Blur // Pixies // New Order // Bloc Party // The Kooks // Maximo Park // Franz Ferdinand // Tocotronic // Oasis // Arctic Monkeys // The Ting Tings // Arcade Fire // Phoenix // Shout Out Louds // Foals // Bonaparte // Editors // Vampire Weekend // Tomte // Florence + the Maschine // Mumford & Sons
-----------------------------------------------------
The Early Days ist eine Zeitreise in das goldene Jahrzehnt des Indie als die gro√üen Bands um Arctic Monkey, Bloc Party & The Killers Hitalben am laufenden Band produzierten und damit Musikgeschichte schrieben. Das waren noch Zeiten... The Early Days eben. Nat√ºrlich d√ºrfen zwischen den ganzen Ausrast- und Mitsingsongs nicht die Wegbereiter wie The Smiths, Oasis und Queen fehlen. Also let's dance to Joy Division and celebrate the irony.

The Early Days is a journey back in time to the golden decade of indie, when the big bands like Arctic Monkey, Bloc Party & The Killers churned out hit albums and wrote music history. Those were the days... The Early Days. Of course, among all the freakout- and singalong songs, pioneers like The Smiths, Oasis and Queen shouldn't be missing. So let's dance to Joy Division and celebrate the irony.
Britpop, Indie, Post-Punk, New Wave & Beyond 1980-2010
Indie-Party Like It's 200X

Fr. 01.11.24 // 23:59 // Lido Berlin-Kreuzberg

lineup: Bassem Saad & Sanja Grozdanic, Casey MQ, MIRA Êñ∞‰ºùÁµ± , Sorour Darabi with Ange Halliwell, Pablo Altar, Shaly Lopez, The Fertile Crescent, XTC in the XIV, Yawning Portal , Yi Li
information:
The scientific concept of parallax refers to the apparent shift in the position of an object when viewed from different vantage points. Metaphorically, it can represent a psychological, philosophical, or artistic change in the understanding of a situation, idea, or truth, depending on one‚Äôs perspective. The title of 3hd‚Äôs ‚ÄúUnderworld‚Äù concert and performance event at Silent Green Kulturquartier‚Äôs Betonhalle suggests such multiplicity, with its subterranean prefix representing just one of many possible worlds and interpretations.

As its own modification to the repurposed Wedding crematorium complex, the below-ground concrete hall hosts a monumental night of music and live performance, ritual and ceremony, that delves into the infinite possibilities, potentialities, and planes of existence influencing our every day. Casey MQ explores the fluid and unreliable nature of memory through introspective piano and vocal arrangements, and Yawning Portal‚Äôs highly deconstructed and improvised live set creates an ambient devotional of "music to levitate to." Playing material from their forthcoming album, The Fertile Crescent‚Äôs Oxhy and Susu Laroche merge folk anthems and mystic drone metal to explore the sublime space of communal ritual and emotional exchange. MIRAÊñ∞‰ºùÁµ±‚Äôs performance of sentient geography and ceremonial resistance to commodification challenges societal norms through their cosmic narratives blending experimental fiction, shamanic culture, and AI-generated visuals.

Sorour Darabi‚Äôs ‚ÄúFROM THE THROAT TO THE DAWN‚Äù centerpiece embraces transformation, identity, and contemporary myth through performance and dance. Created in collaboration with Pablo Altar and Ange Halliwell, the performance reinterprets "night" through the lens of One Thousand and One Nights‚Äôs central Scheherazade character. Bassem Saad & Sanja Grozdaniƒá‚Äôs script-based performance, ‚ÄúPermanent Trespass (Beirut of the Balkans and the American Century)‚Äù contends with the possibility and mutability of mourning through protracted catastrophe as the frame of who or what is being mourned appears to shift and unsettle, giving form to the double exposure of past and present occurring at moments of historic transition. Meanwhile, vocal ensemble XTC IN THE XIV applies live electronics to early polyphonic choral arrangements, using time-stretched and pitch-shifted samples to probe the uncanny and cross-temporal relationships in music, while Yi Li‚Äôs ‚ÄúEternal Death‚Äù video installation recreates and reorganizes abstract sensory experiences in physical and digital spaces. Shaly L√≥pez‚Äôs scenography generates atmospheric compositions that challenge perception by staging non-physical dimensions, such as dreams and meditative states through sound, light, and scent.

The existence of an underworld assumes an overworld, and many more worlds that reflect each other in an infinite mirror of duplicate glass surfaces that go on forever. This effect of light bouncing back and forth, at equal yet opposite angles, creates the illusion of limitless space and reveals deeper insights into the boundless possibilities of parallax.

event_name: Kiezsalon with Judith Hamann & Sofia Jernberg and Ben Glas
lineup: Judith Hamann, Sofia Jernberg, Ben Glas
information:
For our final Kiezsalon of the year, we head to the Akademie der K√ºnste in Tiergarten for some musical edification. Making their first collaborative appearance in Berlin are vocalist extraordinaire Sofia Jernberg and cellist Judith Hamann, presenting their commissioned work from MADEIRADiG last year. They will be joined by Berlin-based composer and psychoacoustic researcher Ben Glas.

Born in Ethiopia and raised in Vietnam, Stockholm-based Sofia Jernberg is an exceptional singer and composer. With a background in jazz, she focuses on unconventional techniques and sounds such as non-verbal vocalisation, split tones and toneless singing. Music theatre and contemporary opera also play an important role in Jernberg‚Äôs artistic oeuvre. 
In 2023, she made her debuts with the Collegium Novum Zurich, Ensemble Resonanz and the Lucerne Festival Contemporary Orchestra.

Originally from Melbourne, Judith Hamann is a cellist meanwhile based in Berlin whose process-based creative practice encompasses electroacoustic music, site-specific generative work and microtonal systems. The Wire posited that Judith ‚Äúdestroys the fiction of the musician who lives and works outside conventional parameters and puts in its place a series of compositions that are fundamentally humane.‚Äù

Ben Glas is an experimental composer who moved from Portland to pursue Sonic Studies at the Berlin University of the Arts. Through ephemeral compositions, he questions preconceived notions of passive hearing versus active listening. His works focus on the realms of subjective perception and cognition via the use of acoustics, psychoacoustics and space as tools for sonic composition.

Founded over three centuries ago, the Akademie der K√ºnste is one of Europe‚Äôs oldest cultural institutes. Designed by architect Werner DuÃàttmann, Hanseatenweg is a generous, yet modest ensemble of three different buildings encompassed by courtyards and gardens, a proper site to ring out the year before we take our winter break.

lineup: Avantdale Bowling Club
information:
Tom Scott is one of the most compelling figures to emerge from the New Zealand music scene over the last seventeen years. He returns to Europe this October with his Avantdale Bowling Club project, following sold out shows in 2023.

Over the course of two albums, Avantdale Bowling Club (2018) and Trees (2022), Tom has worked with musicians and producers in New Zealand to craft a vivid intermingling of jazz, soul, hip-hop and electronica. Written from a working class perspective at the bottom of the globe, Scott‚Äôs lyrics explore the day-to-day realities of life lived on the margins of society. 

Sad and celebratory in equal measure, Avantdale Bowling Club has been lauded by NPR, Refuge Worldwide and Radio New Zealand. The debut release won the coveted Album of the Year and best Hip-Hop artist at the Aotearoa Music Awards followed by Independent Music NZ‚Äôs Taite Music Prize for best album release. At the end of 2022 the follow-up Trees debuted at number 1 on the NZ album charts.  

Raised on jazz, soul, funk and rap, Scott has honed his skills as a rapper, songwriter and bandleader through membership in several cult groups (@Peace, Average Rap Band). He first emerged in 2007 with Home Brew, a band that has recently returned to the touring circuit and the top of the NZ charts with an unexpected second album, Run It Back. Scott‚Äôs other projects, and his burgeoning Years Gone By label, ensure that he continues to influence and push boundaries across genres.

In May 2023 he made his UK debut, selling out two shows at London‚Äôs Ninety One Living Room and playing at The Great Escape festival in Brighton, before returning in November for a sold-out show at Islington Assembly Hall as part of London Jazz Festival.

event_name: Funk Assault: The Last Dance ‚Äì Watergate's Final Chapter
lineup: Funk Assault (Chl√§r¬†and Alarico)
information:
As the lights dim on Watergate‚Äôs legendary dancefloor, we invite you to join us for one final night to celebrate the incredible journey we‚Äôve shared. To make sure this farewell is unforgettable, we‚Äôre extending the event into an open-end celebration. The music won‚Äôt stop, and neither will the energy. Over the years, this space has been more than just a venue ‚Äì it has been the heartbeat of a community, a place where music, creativity, and unity thrived. Together, we‚Äôve built something iconic: these 10h+ sets have grown into an unforgettable series of events, each moment shaped by your energy, passion, and love for the music.

We are deeply grateful to every dancer, crew, team member who has been part of this journey. Without you, this wouldn‚Äôt have been possible. This last dance is not just a goodbye, but a tribute to the memories we‚Äôve created together ‚Äì a celebration of the friendships, beats, and shared experiences that will live on long after the final track fades.

Join us as we honor Watergate‚Äôs legacy one last time, with no time limits ‚Äì just a night of endless gratitude and celebration for everything we‚Äôve built together.

lineup: Laraaji + Patrick Shiroishi
information:
silent green presents

Based in New York City, Laraaji began playing music on the streets in the 1970s, improvising trance-inducing jams on a modified autoharp processed through various electronic effects. Influential British musician and record producer Brian Eno saw him playing one night in Washington Square Park and invited him to record an album of ambient music at his studio. Laraaji went on to release a prolific series of albums for a wide variety of labels, many of which he recorded himself at home and sold as cassettes during his street performances. In recent years his profile has enjoyed a renaissance via a series of new and reissued recordings on the All Saints label, as well as worldwide performances, laughter meditation workshops and deep listening sessions.

Patrick Shiroishi is a Japanese-American multi-instrumentalist and composer based in Los Angeles who is perhaps best known for his extensive and incredibly intense work with the saxophone. Over the last decade he has established himself as one of the premier improvising musicians in Los Angeles, playing solo and in numerous collaborative projects. Shiroishi may well be considered a foundational player in the city‚Äôs vast musical expanse.

lineup: Resavoir (International Anthem/US) *live, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Resavoir - das ist moderner Soul-Jazz mit entspannten Beats, Fusion-Jazz und Alternative Hip-Hop, verwoben mit elektronischen Texturen und zusammen mehr als die Summe dieser Teile. Woran das liegt? Resavoir ist ein kollaboratives Projekt um den in Chicago geborenen Produzenten Will Miller. Der klassisch ausgebildete Trompeter und Komponist ist Mitglied der Indie-Band Whitney und hat unter anderem mit Mac Miller, Lil Wayne, A$AP Rocky und SZA zusammengearbeitet. Inspiriert von Indie-Rock und Hip-Hop hat er die daraus entstandenen Mischformen mit seiner eigenen Sensibilit√§t versehen und einen charakteristischen, beat-orientierten, √ºppigen und cineastischen Soul-Jazz-Sound entwickelt.

Mit Resavoir tritt Miller in die Rolle des Bandleaders und hat f√ºr die Aufnahmen zu den beiden Alben "Resavoir I" und "Resavoir II" jeweils ein Dutzend Instrumentalist*innen aus der Jazz- und Improv-Szene Chicagos um sich versammelt. Miller l√§sst seine Trompete durch MIDI-Keyboards laufen, experimentiert mit Samplern, Drumcomputern und Synthesizern und entwickelt dabei einen Sound, der ihm eine nahtlose Zusammenarbeit erm√∂glicht.

Die Musik ist gr√∂√ütenteils instrumental, getragen von Pop-Appeal und Melodien, die so eing√§ngig sind, dass man das Gef√ºhl hat, sie w√§ren schon immer um einen herum gewesen, dabei aber komplex, ausbalanciert und nie verkopft. Subtil strahlende Symphonien, die uns den Glauben zur√ºckgeben k√∂nnen, dass die Welt doch irgendwie in Ordnung ist.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

lineup: Cindy Pooch, O'o
information:
InFin√© once again takes over Berlin's legendary Berghain club for another evening! This time, the focus is on voice and sound experimentation: let yourself be mesmerized by the mysticism of singer Cindy Pooch and the onirism of pop-electro duo O'o for a Club InFin√© that brings to you the finest of experimental chanson.


Cindy Pooch


Singer-songwriter from Cameroon, Cindy Pooch has been writing and exploring a wide range of music for several years: trip hop, soul, maloya... Until now, she had been a performer for others, before releasing her critically acclaimed 1st solo album ‚ÄúIn Nomine Corpus‚Äù in 2023. Today, her artistic experiments are mainly motivated by the desire to use voice, words and sound sensations as tools to trigger or accompany healing processes.


O'o


The duo O'o is made up of two strange birds: Victoria Suter and Mathieu Daubign√© blend experimental pop, electronica and song. A singular, offbeat blend that evokes the lyrical accents of Kate Bush, the dreaminess of Bj√∂rk and the groove of Little Dragon. Their music stands out for its vocal creativity and polished production. After releasing their 1st album ‚ÄúTouche‚Äù in 2022, O'o are back with a second album, ‚ÄúSongs of Wishes and Bones‚Äù, a collection of stories between light and shadow, the 1st chapter of which is set for release in October 2024.

lineup: Jaffar Hussain Randhawa
information:
silent green presents: 

Jaffar Hussain Randhawa is coming to Europe for the first time at the invitation of Pakistani Grammy winner Arooj Aftab and the Dutch Le Guess Who? festival.
Guldasta, meaning bouquet, is the debut solo release of Pakistan's most senior and accomplished Clarinet maestro, Ustad Jaffar Hussain Randhawa. It was recorded live, on the rooftop of his house in Shahdara, on a foggy winter afternoon, as he sat with his favourite accompanists under the Alam. He titled the album Guldasta because he imagines at as a bouqet of flowers, mixing up various raags and styles, each flower with its own distinct fragrance.

information:
BLANCO TETA: Transfeminist Noiserock.

Ein experimentelles Rockprojekt mit der Aggressivit√§t und Einfachheit des Punk. Blanco Teta ist mehr als nur eine Musikgruppe ‚Äì es ist eine kreative und visuelle Erfahrung, die einen direkten Dialog mit dem Publikum herstellt. Unbarmherzige, verzerrte Klanglandschaften, kantige Darbietungen, ein transfeministisches Konzept mit avantgardistischem Ansatz. Ein Konzert von Blanco Teta zu erleben, bedeutet, in eine immersiv-intensive Atmosph√§re einzutauchen, die von purer Energie und k√ºnstlerischer Unkonventionalit√§t gepr√§gt ist.

Transfeminist noiserock:

The band itself describes its music as an experimental rock project, with the aggressiveness and simplicity of punk but with a great twist: relentless distorted noise soundscapes, edgy performance, transfeminist concept and an avant-garde approach. Based in Buenos Aires this quartet is a great live band with an unique sound, partly because of the presence of a cello.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs.
