lineup: freekind. (HR/SI) *live, , Support: Novine
information:
Sei frei. Sei freundlich. Das ist die Philosophie von freekind..  Ihre Mischung aus Neo-Soul, Jazz und Rap, zusammen mit ihren positiven Vibes und einem wundervoll l√§ssigen Flow, sorgt regelm√§√üig f√ºr eindrucksvolle und gleichzeitig nachdenkliche Live-Shows. Ihr Set-Up aus Drums, Keys und Vocals mutet minimalistisch an, ihr Sound ist alles andere als das. Alle, die im letzten Jahr das Konzert im Gretchen erlebt haben, wissen das.

Die kroatische Pianistin und S√§ngerin Sara Ester Gredelj und die slowenische Schlagzeugerin Nina Koro≈°ak-Serƒçiƒç begannen ihre Zusammenarbeit im Jahr 2019 mit der Ver√∂ffentlichung ihrer ersten Single ‚ÄûI'm gonna live‚Äú. Im Jahr 2020 ver√∂ffentlichten sie ihre erste EP mit dem Titel ‚Äûnot good enough‚Äú. 2023 ist mit "Since Always And Forever" ihr Deb√ºt Album erschienen. L√§ssig groovende, pr√§zise und jazzig verschleppte Beats treiben die Tracks voran, getragen von so pointierten wie gef√ºhlvollen Klavier- und Synthesizer-Sounds und gef√ºhlvoll vorgetragener Lyrik.

freekind. machen Musik mit Botschaft, subtil und aus dem Flow heraus. So ist ihre Single ‚ÄúGood News‚Äú eine Liebeserkl√§rung an das Leben jenseits der schlechten Nachrichten und enth√§lt die Aufforderung, sich auf Liebe und Hoffnung zu beziehen. Oft finden wir beides in unseren t√§glichen Begegnungen. Sch√∂n, das sie auf ihrer ‚ÄúGood News Tour‚Äú wieder zu uns kommen. Also: Seid frei, seid freundlich und kommt zum Konzert, es gibt gute Nachrichten.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Jan Filip Jordan Franges

_______________________________________


The soulful group is composed of Croatian pianist and vocalist Sara Ester Gredelj and Slovenian drummer Nina Koro≈°ak-Serƒçiƒç. Their songs carry a strong message of love and hope, complemented by R&B and Jazz grooves.

The music scene got acquainted with the duo in 2020 with their EP ‚Äúnot good enough‚Äù. Their first full-length album ‚ÄúSince Always And Forever,‚Äù released under the label Butter92 and distributed by L√©g√®re Recordings, features 12 songs, including singles like Visualize, Happiness, Good Vibrations, Bright Light, and Carry You.

The album channels the essence of the golden age of hip-hop but in a fresh and innovative way, incorporating elements of pop, neo-soul, and jazz. The result is a distinctive sound that pays homage to its roots while pushing boundaries and creating its own path. It is a testament to freekind.‚Äôs ability to blend genres and create a sound that is both nostalgic and progressive.

 The ongoing joke is that their live performances are a sort of group therapy with the songs sharing something that‚Äôs inside all of us, in a way that evokes understanding and empathy. With the groove, it is the perfect combination. Music that moves you and MOVES you, if you know what I mean. 

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

Photo: Jan Filip Jordan Franges

Sounding the massive organ in Berlin‚Äôs iconic Kaiser-Wilhelm-Ged√§chtniskirche with additional organ accompaniment by Stephen O‚ÄôMalley, Malone will be joined by Macadam Ensemble vocal quartet, and a five-piece microtonal brass ensemble consisting of Elena Kakaliagou, Johannes Lauer, Magnus Schriefl, Rike Huy, and Weston Olencki.

lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz f√ºr Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen f√ºrs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas f√ºr den Floor ‚Äì jeden Dienstag k√∂nnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung ‚Äì jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer K√ºnste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen f√ºr alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erkl√§rt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie l√§uft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots f√ºr den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu sp√§t zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

information:
The two-day festival eavesdrop presents contemporary electronic music and sound art from more than a dozen outstanding Berlin-based and international artists. Taking place at silent green‚Äôs Betonhalle, the festival‚Äôs 3rd edition uniquely brings together a group of adventurous composer/performers and installation artists that share a common practice in electronic sound composition whilst spanning a diversity of inter-related contemporary tendencies. Electronic is understood in its broadest and most curious sense to include turntablism, DIY analogue electronics, AI voice synthesis, generative sound installation, electric guitar manipulations, analogue synthesisers and the human machine relations apparent in processed, extended vocal techniques.  

'To eavesdrop' is a mode of listening intently and eavesdrop invites listeners to consider, from multiple perspectives, new social and technical developments in international music and sound cultures.

lineup: TECHNO MITTWOCH: TUNNEL/TURBINE , TECHSIA , Darren Black, Martin K, Samuel Cy , more..
information:
Get ready for another intense midweek session for Berlin's most dangerous day of the week to rave - WEDNESDAY Lose yourself at AVA Club in the heart of Berlin - underneath the Train Tracks of Warschauer Str S-Bahn Station. This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night. And since there‚Äôs no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It‚Äôs Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,   

Come in your best techno outfit or whatever you feel most comfortable. The most important thing is that you are ready to experience the night and surrender to the music. Techno Wednesday is a celebration of TECHNO culture that pushes the boundaries of what is possible. It is an invitation to immerse yourself in a world where time stands still and music reigns. Get your tickets now and be part of this electrifying night! Leave everyday life behind you and immerse yourself in the world of techno. See you on the dance floor!   

No Sexism, No Racism, No Homophobia.  

AWARENESS TEAM AVA is sensitive to the needs of the people who participate in the events: the " AVA Awareness Team" will give you information and assistance whenever you need it;

Entry prohibited for minors under 18 years of age.

lineup: Skemer LIVE , support TBA
information:
Skemer is the cooperation between singer Kim Peers and guitarist Mathieu Vandekerckhove formed in 2019. They soon discovered that their individual strengths complemented each other perfectly. Two very different worlds collide and lead to minimalist dark wave deconstructions that are equal parts brutal and erotic.

This duality is reflected in the name Skemer, which next to its obvious English meaning of 'intriguer' also stands for ‚Äòdusk‚Äô in Mathieu‚Äôs native tongue West-Flemish. The band recorded their debut album just months after meeting and this sense of urgency shines through in their effervescent live performances, where Peers seductive vocals coalesce with Vandekerckhove's austere beats to meld into a transcendent fury.

Debut album Benevolence is released on the 25th of October 2019 on Avant! Records. In 2022 a remix of the song ‚ÄúSunseeker by Dana Montana was released on He.She.They Records.

Kim Peers has a background in the high end fashion world. She‚Äôs born and raised in fashion capital, Antwerp, where she started working in the 90‚Äôs with Inge Grognard and Ronald Stoops. She soon traveled the world for several high fashion magazines, runways and campaigns, such as Vogue, Prada, YSL and many more. To this day she‚Äôs still having fun with modeling in fashion. She also has a background in music. Under her own name her EP ‚ÄúTell Me More‚Äù was released on DJ Hell ‚Äôs International Gigolos Records in 2004, with remixes by Mt Sims and David Carretta. The remix of David Carretta appeared on a compilation from Dave Clarke in 2005. In 2012 she started a no wave-punk band called Crimpers they released a 7‚Äù in 2012 on Dennis Tyfus‚Äô Ultra Eczema records. Throughout the years she also enjoyed dj‚Äôing. Meeting the Drag Me To Hell family felt like coming home and somewhere around 2018 Mati Drome, the founder of DMTH, invited her to become a resident dj at the Drag Me To Hell raves.

Mathieu Vandekerckhove is guitarist and a founding member of the post-metal band Amenra, Absent In Body and his personal project Syndrome. Amenra was formed in 1999 in the West Flanders city of Kortrijk. The band was founded by vocalist Colin H. van Eeckhout, lead guitarist Mathieu Vandekerckhove and bassist Kristof Mondy. The three had been in the hardcore punk band Spineless that split up in 1999 and wanted to create music with more "heart and soul‚Äù. Absent In Body originally formed in 2017 originally as the mutual vision of guitarist Vandekerckhove and Neurosis frontman Kelly, who, in conspiracy with Iggor Cavalera (ex-Sepultura, Cavalera Conspiracy, Petbrick,...) and Amenra‚Äôs Colin H. van Eeckhout, conjured a sprawling, episodic blend of post-metal and sludge. Atmosphere is key here, whether it's the tribal drums against a squall of controlled noise that open "The Acres/The Ache," the mountain-cleaving riffs or the reflective, minimalist passages which offer a melodic reprieve.

lineup: GNOD feat. MC Sissi, Sophie-T
information:
Crunch Tapes & Positive Transmitter present:

Thursday, 07.11 @ Neue Zukunft Berlin 
GNOD (UK) + MC Sissi
Support: Sophie-T

Over the past decade, Gnod has evolved into one of the most unpredictable and intriguing bands in the experimental music scene. Their sonic explorations have ranged from the cosmic pastoral landscapes reminiscent of their collaborations with White Hills to their more recent ventures into post-punk on albums like "Just Say No..." and the noise rock intensity of "Hexen Valley". Despite the diverse range of sounds, each release offers something extraordinary, keeping listeners eagerly anticipating what they'll do next. Gnod continues to push boundaries, delivering fresh, thought-provoking music that challenges conventional genre definitions.


Support:
Sophie-T (DE)

Sophie-T is a multidisciplinary poet from Weimar, Germany, whose creative work blends poetry and spoken word performance with visual art and paintings. Her art often bridges the worlds of literature and visual aesthetics, where sound and language interact with imagery and textures. By combining spoken word sounds with her paintings, Sophie-T creates immersive artistic experiences that engage both the auditory and visual senses. Her work typically explores themes deeply rooted in personal expression, emotional depth, and experimental narrative, offering a unique fusion of performance and visual arts.


Venue address: Alt-Stralau 68, 10245 Berlin
Start: 20:00

About the event: 
Green Room is an intimate club night that gives you a slice of UK club culture in the heart of Berlin. Originally founded as a series of off-location events around the city Green Room maintains a DIY ethos at the centre of its operation. Inspired by the legendary FWD nights at Plastic People, the event is focused on spotlighting new and notable grassroots talent, in addition to a formidable roster of residents. Expect dark percussive grooves and a healthy portion of sub-bass from Fitzroy‚Äôs custom Martin Audio / Function 1 hybrid rig.

information:
The Depeche Mode Dance & Play - Party
DM, 80s, EBM, Dark Wave, Electro & Goth Rock by DJs Marvin, Toby
Midnight Bondage Performance
BDSM catacombs & couples' gallery open from 10 pm
DM Visualizations, Jacuzzi, Playgrounds, Cocktails & Fresh Fruits
Awareness team
Dress code: Kinky, Fetish, Goth, BDSM, Black Glamour, Elegant


This party has been unique for more than 15 years and has become an integral part of Berlin's nightlife.

Today we celebrate the best band ever in a unique way as always. Here, in addition to related music, the legendary records of Depeche Mode will not only be played, but will be JOYED in dance and passionate play!

'Stripped', 'Freelove', 'Sea of Sin', 'A Pain that I'm used to' and 'Strangelove, etc'... all tracks that inspire more than just wild dancing. If you read the lyrics of the band carefully, you will be confronted again and again with the themes of sexuality, pain, love, sensuality and also perversions. But also other genre-like beats are not missed out.

So in this night electro sounds of the last decades meet whip cracking and sensual love play, when SM meets DM, Gothic meets Fetish and Oldschool meets Newschool.

This time this unique cocktail will be underlined by a very special fetish performance.

Musically DJ Marvin (Queen of the Night, Dark Friday) & DJ Toby (Black:Celebration) will not only make Depeche Mode fans happy, but will conjure up electro, goth rock, dark wave & 80ies on the dance floor.

This event is rounded off by video visuals of Depeche Mode and the atmospheric vaults of the INSOMNIA Club - all open from 10pm, including a whirlpool, massage bench, the gallery for couples hungry for experience and various game rooms, such as the BDSM catacombs in the basement.

An awareness team is always on the move in the club, taking care of your safety and is always approachable.

event_name: SOFIA BORGES / ILIA GOROVITZ / PEDRO MELO ALVES
lineup: Sofia Borges ‚Äì drums, Ilia Gorovitz ‚Äì drums , Pedro Melo Alves ‚Äì drums
information:
An evening as part of the biegungen im ausland consisting of three solo sets, which is entirely dedicated to a highly versatile instrument: the drums. 

Sofia Borges expands the possibilities of her instrument with everyday objects that you find in every hardware or household goods store: metal pieces, kitchen items, toys. The sound range that can be heard in her solo sets is as flexible as her instrument. With her free, open playing, she treats tempo as a variable, as one category among many, with no claim to dominance. Electronic sounds complement Borges‚Äô lively percussion style.

Ilia Gorovitz has had a decisive influence on Berlin's artistic underground in just a few years. As an organizer with a sure sense of taste, Gorovitz presents exciting international acts from the fields of sonic experiments, noise and improvisation. Each program he is responsible for is an uncompromising manifesto. As a musician, Gorovitz is involved in various projects, including the minimal noise rock duo Stumpf and the bands PŒûB and my blood is confusing. In his solo sets, the drummer shows his preference for complex rhythms and different degrees of distortion.

Sometimes delicate, sometimes powerful, always absolutely focused, this is how Pedro Melo Alves appears on stage. In his virtuosic live concerts, he gives the sounds enough space to unfold. Alves switches easily from contemplative soundscapes to complex, dense figures on the drums. The Portuguese musician and composer crafts amazing music from skins, rims, cymbals and objects at the highest technical level. His sets are like journeys of discovery through the sonic diversity of his instrument.


Supported by Berlin Senate Department for Culture and Social Cohesion.

information:
Der Festsaal Kreuzberg wird am 09.11. & 10.11.2024 zum Tempel of Boom Bap. Kreuzberg hat wieder einen realen Hip Hop Club.


Die Block Party Berlin besetzt am Flutgraben gleich alle Areas und bringt Dir die ultimative Hip Hop Mische. Am Samstag erlebst Du die Elite der Deutschrap Liga ‚Äì Haze trifft auf Morlockk Dilemma ‚Äì f√ºr uns ein absolutes Dreamteam und schon lange √ºberf√§llig auf einer B√ºhne. Aus Frankfurt pr√§sentieren wir Alyssa, mit Attitude und Skillz √ºberraschte Sie uns am Anfang des Jahres und so mussten wir sie einfach verpflichten. Denn neben Presslufthanna muss man sich schon behaupten k√∂nnen- Hanna hat uns einfach so sehr im letzten Jahr begeistert, wir mussten sie einfach wieder nach Berlin holen.


Neu auf unserer Block Party sind die Newcomer Slots: wir bieten die legend√§re B√ºhne des Festsaal Kreuzberg f√ºr die n√§chste Generation: Tanone und Lucky Luke & Naixn haben uns der letzten Zeit so √ºberzeugt, dass wir Euch die jungen Wilden gerne vorstellen wollen.Der Sonntag ist reserviert f√ºr die internationalen Acts ‚Äì eigentlich dachten wir es wird sehr schwierig die letzten Jahre zu toppen. Aber nach unz√§ligen Anrufen und Mails haben wir tats√§chlich unser Wunschlineup zusammenstellen k√∂nnen: F√ºr die erste Berlin Show ever werden wir die legend√§ren Living Legends Crew einfliegen lassen: The Grouch, Aesop, Bicasso Eligh, Luckyiam, Scarub und Sunspot Jonz spielen f√ºr uns ein exklusives Deutschland Konzert.

Legend√§r wird wohl nicht mehr ausreichen, um dieses Konzert zu beschreiben.Denn zudem bieten wir f√ºr Euch die Hip Hop Live Band der Stunde on Top: OMA aus England dominiert zur Zeit dieses Internet und feiern auf der ganzen Welt Erfolge. Den Abend einleiten werden aber auch keine Unbekannten. Auf der Insel einer der Hip Hop / Soul Publikumslieblinge. Ihre Shows stets ausverkauft haben wir hier eigentlich nur Main Acts am Flie√üband f√ºr Dich.

lineup: Eiko Ishibashi
information:
Multi-instrumentalist and composer Eiko Ishibashi and celebrated filmmaker Ry≈´suke Hamaguchi have teamed up once again on new film performance Gift, following their successful collaboration on the Oscar-winning international feature film Drive My Car. 

Gift is both a live performance and film created in parallel to Hamaguchi‚Äôs recent feature film Evil Does Not Exist ‚Äì with both works using the same footage and scenario, yet applying a different approach. While Evil Does Not Exist was created as a classic feature film for cinematic release and won the Silver Lion at last year‚Äôs Venice International Film Festival, the companion piece Gift was crafted as a separate silent film meant for live soundtrack performance by Ishibashi. 

Written and directed by Ry≈´suke Hamaguchi, Gift is set in Mizubiki Village in Nagano, a town located on a plateau rich in nature not so far from Tokyo. Takumi and his daughter Hana, who have lived there for generations, lead a modest life, following the cycle of nature. Their small community is increasingly challenged by a steady flow of new arrivals. One day, a plan is hatched by an entertainment agency to build a glamping site near Takumi‚Äôs house. The discovery that they intend to discharge sewage into the village water source causes unrest in the village, disrupting the community‚Äôs calm way of life. 

A counterpart to Evil Does Not Exist, Gift offers an alternative perspective on disharmony and inevitable imbalances in man‚Äôs relationship to nature by using the same material and story, but creating a distinct, emotionally charged experience enhanced through Ishibashi‚Äôs live performance.

information:

Mitternachts Show by Fifi Fantome
Specials: Basement & Dungeon, Whirlpool, Couples Area, a glass of bubbly as a welcome drink until midnight, Awareness Team
Dress code: Gold - Glitter - Extravagant - Kinky - Fetish
Admission: ‚Ç¨25 per person / students & social ticket* ‚Ç¨15


Champagne & Naughtyness
Whether it's the 1920s or the 2020s, we lived and still live in turbulent times. INSOMNIA is a melting pot of dreams and hopes between crises, wars and conflicts.

We dance through the night on the volcano of desire, shrill, fast, radical, excessive, exalted and wicked. We transform heaviness into lightness, break the corsets of convention and immerse ourselves in a world of sparkling encounters and mischief.

Be brave. Be wild. Be irresistible.

Dress code:
Nothing normal. Don't dress up - reinvent yourself! It's time to unleash your true essence. Be sexy, extravagant, kinky - be a feast for the senses.

Create looks that whisper, scream and seduce. Let leather meet lace, shine meet darkness, fetish meet baroque and create an outfit that says more about you than words ever could.

Rules? Only those that honor freedom and respect. Always ask, dance wildly, play beautifully.

Respect and active consent come first. Ask politely if you want to talk, dance or play with someone, respect a 'no' the first time and thank them for it. Remember that a public game is not an automatic invitation to join in. Our awareness team, recognizable by the glowing crowns, will be out and about for you all night.

No "free-range" photographer! We have a permanent photo station in the clinic corner from 10pm to 1am for those who want to take photos.

On this night, you are the masterpieces, the sculptures that glow in the dark. Under the flickering light of the lasers and the rich sound of techno, each of you is a living work of art, unique and desirable.

Birds of paradise, the curious and greedy for the new, eccentric nightshade plants populate the bizarre amusement as phantasmagorias - "Schampus & Schabernack" offers space for everyone who wants to dance in the shadows and shine in the spotlight.


*Social or student ticket please with appropriate proof (student ID, social ticket BVG etc.) at the box office

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: L I N (listen/D) *live*
information:
5 in 1. Drums, Synthesizer, Gitarre, Bass und Vocals.
LIN ist mehr als eine Solok√ºnstler*in, LIN ist eine Soloband. Aus Fu√üschaltern, Kabeln, Loop-Station und ihren Instrumenten hat die Berlinerin ein Cockpit f√ºr Konzerte gebaut, mit dem sie einen beeindruckenden Sound kreiert. Genretechnisch irgendwo zwischen Elektro- und Popsph√§re, vielschichtig, detailreich und intensiv. Die englischsprachigen Songs sind nicht nur tanzbar, sondern auch ausdr√ºcklich politisch. In ihren Texten inszeniert die queere K√ºnstler*in eine Welt, in der gesellschaftlich gemachte Normen aufgebrochen und neu gesetzt werden. "We need new norms" fordert LIN. Bei ihren Liveshows rei√üt sie das Publikum f√∂rmlich mit, wie der Impuls einer Kugelwelle, bei der sich die Energie in immer gr√∂√üeren Kreisen ausbreitet.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: CAPADOL

__________________________________________


Five in One. Drums, synthesizer, guitar, bass and vocals.
LIN is more than a solo artist, LIN is a solo band. From footswitches, cables, loop station and instruments she has built a cockpit for concerts, with which she creates a sound that navigates genre-wise between electro and pop spheres. Multi-layered, rich in detail and intense. The English-language songs are not only danceable, but also explicitly political. In her lyrics, the queer artist* stages a world in which socially made norms are broken and set anew. ‚ÄúWe need new norms‚Äù demands LIN. At her live shows, she literally sweeps the audience along, like the momentum of a spherical wave in which the energy spreads in ever larger circles.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

Photo: CAPADOL

lineup: Mabe Fratti & Military Genius
information:
silent green presents:

Mabe Fratti‚Äôs sensibility is the triumph of experimentation over technical dominion of an instrument. The experimentation of sound with feelings, with existence itself, with an open heart, letting herself to be transformed by what she lives and hears. This is what has led Mabe Fratti from Guatemala to Mexico City. From the creation of pop songs to free improvisation, from the academy to noise, from collaborations in ensembles and duos to the profound personal journey that is reflected in her solo works.
Military Genius (songwriter/producer Bryce Cloghesy) announced his new album, Scarred For Life, set to release on November 1st, 2024 via Unheard of Hope. Following his 2020 debut Deep Web, this album blends bass-heavy R&B, spaced dub, and jazz with a more traditional rock influence, focusing on lyricism. The lead single Darkest Hour, accompanied by a self-directed video shot near his new home in Joshua Tree, California, captures the feeling of being swept into the unknown. Cloghesy reflects on leaving the past behind and embracing the journey into an uncertain future.

lineup: Nadine Shah
information:
Since her debut album with the terrific title "Love Your Dum And Mad" in 2013, she has now published five strong albums. The most recent was the powerful, emotional, abysmal "Filthy Underneath" in February, which shows her lyrically and musically on top of her game. She even deals with topics such as her own experiences of sexual abuse, depression and suicidal thoughts in songs that should appeal to anyone who loves PJ Harvey, Nick Cave, Marianne Faithfull and Chelsea Wolfe. Shah, who has Norwegian and Pakistani roots and was raised in England, says: "I feel far less restricted than ever before when writing lyrics and making music. There's something extremely liberating about people knowing your most intimate story. I will never be able to be a secretive artist. It's too late for that. But maybe some of my story will speak to the listener."

The fact that she adds a "maybe" here can be read as a British understatement, because you can see just how much she does this at her intense concerts - and there will be a few of them in November. She will be performing live in four German cities from November 8th.

lineup: Open Decks for Vinyl DJs
information:
VINYL ONLY! 

Jeden Dienstag ab 18:00 Uhr. Seit inzwischen mehr als 10 Jahren ist der Dienstag mit "Open Decks & Tischtennis" im Humboldthain Club eine feste Instanz f√ºr Nordberliner Bewegungsjunkies. 

Ob die Platten zum Auflegen, die Kellen f√ºrs Tischtennis oder die Ballerinas f√ºr den Floor ‚Äì jeden Dienstag k√∂nnt ihr euer Spielzeug mitbringen und vom Wochenende entschlacken. 
Ob Techno, Drum and Bass, Disco oder Mamas Schlagersammlung ‚Äì jeder Stil ist willkommen und wird vom Publikum abgefeiert. 

Daher bietet der "Open Decks Abend" vielen jungen DJs eine nach wie vor einzigartige Plattform zur Darbietung ihrer K√ºnste und zum Austausch untereinander. 

Zwei Tischtennisplatten, genug Kellen f√ºr alle, ein Kickertisch, satter Sound aus den Boxen und nicht zuletzt leckeres Bier vom Fass, tragen dazu bei, dass eine stetig wachsende Zahl an gut gelaunten Menschen den Dienstag im Humboldthain Club zu ihrer Homebase erkl√§rt hat. 

FAQ Frage: Wie l√§uft das mit dem Auflegen? 
Antwort: Zu Beginn jeder Veranstaltung liegt an der Mainbar eine Liste mit den DJ-Slots f√ºr den Abend aus. 

Jeder Slot geht eine halbe Stunde und jeder DJ darf nur einen (seinen) Namen in die Liste eintragen. 
Pro Abend gibt es 20 Slots! 
Es empfiehlt sich also, nicht all zu sp√§t zu kommen, sonst ist die Liste voll.

lineup: The Telescopes, angelic milk
information:
The Telescopes are an English noise, space rock, dream pop and psychedelic band formed in 1987 by artist, composer, and musician Stephen Lawrie, with band members David Fitzgerald and Joanna Doran joining later. The band's line-up is in constant flux; there can be anywhere between 1 and 20 members on a recording.

The Telescopes have influenced the shoegaze, space rock and neo-psychedelic movement including artists such as The Brian Jonestown Massacre, Black Rebel Motorcycle Club, F√ºxa, The Warlocks, Revolver, Whipping Boy, Vanishing Lines, Seefeel, Ecstasy of Saint Theresa, Frances Bean Cobain, Portishead, Mogwai and Radiohead.

In recognition of their ongoing influence on a new generation of artists, a tribute compilation titled Anticipating Nowhere, A Homage To The Telescopes was released in 2016 by The Blog That Celebrates Itself Records. The album featured 17 Telescopes tracks covered by various artists from the Flavor Crystals, Jaguwar and One Unique Signal.

The Telescopes have been described by the British music press as "more a revolution of the psyche than a revolution of the sidewalk"; a thread consistent throughout a body of work spanning over 30 years.

The band has released 16 studio albums across various music labels including but not limited to Creation Records and Tapete Records with their most recent album Growing Eyes Become String out now on Fuzz Club Records. A new album is currently being recorded for Tapete.

As a live band, they are considered to be unique even in their niche, with positive reviews from publications such as Isolation (UK), "The Telescopes are such an important band. Such an important concept. They walk where other bands fear to tread and refuse to compromise their art. This is what makes them so vital on record and unmissable on stage."


Supporting act:

angelic milk (DE)

Berlin-based band that has captivated audiences worldwide with their unique blend of dreamy bedroom pop and raw garage rock. Formed in St. Petersburg in 2014, the band quickly gained a devoted following, earning praise for their catchy tunes and evocative performances. Fronted by the charming anti-heroine Sarah Persephona, their music is characterized by electrifying melodies and nostalgic sound. The lyrics are telling tales of fatal romance, psychedelic experiences and old school rock‚Äôn‚Äôroll lifestyle, and the band‚Äôs live shows are a notoriously loud and chaotic spectacle with a twist of wild sex appeal.

lineup: Demdike Stare¬†(live), support by Gizem √ñz
information:
Miles Whittaker and Sean Canty have been releasing music as Demdike Stare for a decade and a half, deftly refining their own strand of electronic music lying at the intersection of techno, dub, ambient, jungle and many others genres. 

Originally hailing from Manchester, the duo have taken their dark and drum-inflected sound to the furthest reaches of the electronic music scene, often transcending club culture and branching into experimental concerts and festivals.

For our next session of 180 min w/  we are super excited to welcome the pair to our historic Saal for a night of unbridled atmospheric experimentation as they perform a rare 3-hour live set accompanied by a spellbinding light show from Mike Erwin. If you‚Äôve been following the series (which has already seen the likes of Rrose, .VRIL and R√∏dh√§d) you know to expect the unexpected.

Supporting Demdike Stare on the night will be the supremely talented Gizem √ñz. Renowned for her roles as a sound artist, contemporary artist, DJ and producer, her ambient sets create cohesive sonic narratives that continue to resonate long after the music ends.

lineup: 22-1 B√©lavie¬†, 1-4 PHLOXO, 4-7 Markus Glanz
information:
EVERY FUCKING THURSDAY, UNITY AT KITKAT CLUB

UNITY is a vibrant kinky community of free spirits who seek to connect with their souls and bodies in a respectful, sexy, and playful manner. We have created a space where you can bring your fantasies to life and anticipate high-quality lineups, ranging from uptempo trance/neotrance to berlin uptempo techno, providing a diverse musical experience for all. We want to get behind normal DJ Gigs. Our focus on high quality berlin techno concerts and uptempo trance live Acts. 

You are a Live Band or Live Act or you are playing hybrid dj gigs? Send us an email to unity.events.berlin@gmail.com

Rules
- know the Party you go to - UNITY ‚Äì and the Artists of the night.
- no strict dresscode, but: ‚Äûdress for kitkat club‚Äú ‚Äì be creative!
- by purchasing a ticket, you consent to our team taking photos at the event for promotional purposes. If you prefer not to be photographed, please inform our photographer.
- UNITY tries to be a safe space for everyone. Treat others with respect. All individuals are welcome, regardless of sexual orientation, origin, or religion. Any unwanted touching, offensive language, or disrespectful behavior will result in exclusion from the event.

lineup: Trentem√∏ller
information:
Those who have seen Copenhagen based Anders Trentem√∏ller live know about his fascinating ability to draw the audience completely into his world of sound which is misty, mysteriously grooving and empathetic. Danceable melancholy, you could say. Stylistically, Trentem√∏ller interweaves electro with shoegaze, synth and dreampop, sometimes instrumental, sometimes with hand-picked guest singers. His most recent album, "Memoria", was released in 2022 and features new wave influences in songs such as "Dead Or Alive" and "No More Kissing In The Rain". This time around, more than half of the tracks on the record are purely instrumental. In an interview, Trentem√∏ller said: "I'm still a big fan of instrumental music. It's such a beautiful way of expressing feelings. Straight to the heart without restrictions. And my music has that
cinematic approach that instrumental music also has."

His live concerts are particularly inspiring because Trentem√∏ller not only relies on atmospheric lighting and visuals, but performs together with a band that will bring the nuances of his music with precision to the stage. On his new tour, which will also take him to Munich, Berlin and Cologne starting in mid-November, he will be joined by Disa Jakobs (vocals, guitar, synths), Silas Tinglef (drums, guitar), Brian Batz (guitar), Jacob Haubjerg (bass) and, of course, the mastermind behind it all: Anders Trentem√∏ller on synths.

information:
MILK & HONEY, the legendary club of social eroticism that has been a sensation in Prague for the last 15 years, is returning to Berlin for its second grand event after a successful debut that connected the Prague and Berlin scenes.

Brace yourselves for an unforgettable event connecting Prague and Berlin as a sizeable group of Czech guests, composed of charming and playful couples, converges on Berlin for this extraordinary occasion. The Prague scene is known for a "lot of action," not only in the playground but usually directly on the dancefloor. Therefore, expect a lot of happening directly in front of the DJ!
Milk & Honey events are also known for the solid sound produced by their talented female residents, who also come to Berlin.

This collective has been curating unique erotic experiences for couples and their refined companions since 2009. Don't miss the chance to be part of the excitement as Milk & Honey brings its allure to the vibrant heart of Berlin for the very first time!

Stay tuned for exclusive details on Telegram and be among the first to secure your spot during the presale!

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: WNBL (Agogo Rec./D) *live*, Kota No Uta (D) *live*, DJ ALKARLINE (D)
information:
WNBL ist ein Kollektiv junger Musikschaffender aus Berlin und Potsdam, die Einfl√ºsse aus elektronischer Musik, Jazz und Hiphop zu einer eigenen Mischung verbinden. Mit WNBL invites haben sie seit Beginn des Jahres eine Residency im Gretchen. Dabei geh√∂rt es zu ihrer sich st√§ndig weiterentwickelnden Herangehensweise an Musik, dass sie regelm√§√üig K√ºnstler*innen einladen, um musikalische Erfahrungsr√§ume zu gestalten.

Kota No Uta ist eine in Berlin lebende K√ºnstlerin, Produzentin und Singer-Songwriterin. Ihr Sound ist im Neo-Soul und psychedelischen Soul verwurzelt und reicht von afrikanischer Musik bis hin zu experimentellen und elektronischen Kl√§ngen. Als multikulturelle Geschichtenerz√§hlerin schreibt Kota ihre Texte durch das Prisma von Metaphern und Mythologie, oft inspiriert durch t√§gliche Beobachtungen ihrer Umgebung. Ihr Markenzeichen ist die kraftvolle, dunkel gef√§rbte Stimme, die sie in ihren selbst produzierten Songs gerne mehrfach aufnimmt und √ºbereinanderlegt. Kota No Uta setzt bewusst auf Kontraste und kreiert dadurch immer wieder √ºberraschende Momente.

Im Jahr 2023 gewann Kota einen Female* Producer Prize von Sony Music Entertainment Germany und Music Woman.

WNBL selbst kommen wieder mit einer druckvollen Bl√§sersektion und einer Rhythmusgruppe, die aus zwei Schlagzeugern besteht. Alle Beteiligten sind musikalisch in der Berliner Clubkultur sozialisiert, alle h√∂ren Dub, Bass Music und Broken Beats. M√∂glicherweise ist das der Grund, warum sie ihre Jazz-Skills niemals raush√§ngen lassen. Stattdessen nehmen sie den Jazz beim Wort und spielen beeindruckende Live-Sets mit cleveren Beats, Improvisationen und wunderbaren Arrangements.

DJ Alkarline, deren Name inspiriert ist von der Alakali-Mangan-Zelle, umgangssprachlich auch Alkaline oder Alkali-Mangan-Batterie bezeichnet, sorgt daf√ºr, dass die Energiespeicher den ganzen Abend mit groovy Electronica aufgeladen bleiben.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

_________________________________


WNBL is a collective of nine young musicians based in Berlin and Potsdam, who bring an unique blend of influences from electronic music, jazz and hiphop with a matchless energy onto the stage. With ‚ÄúWNBL invites‚Äù, they have a residency at Gretchen. As part of their constantly evolving approach to music, they invite artists to create spaces for musical experiences.

Kota No Uta is a Berlin based artist, producer and singer-songwriter. Her experimental sound is rooted in neo-soul, psychedelic soul. A multicultural story teller, by nature, Kota writes her lyrics through the prism of metaphor and mythology, often inspired by daily observations of surroundings. In 2023 Kota won a Female* Producer Prize by Sony Music Entertainment Germany and Music Woman, meanwhile releasing collaborative singles with various producers.

WNBL themselves come with a powerful brass section and a rhythm section consisting of two drummers. All those involved are musically socialised in Berlin's club culture, they all listen to dub, bass music and broken beats. they take jazz at its word and play impressive live sets with ecstatic beats, exciting improvisation and wonderful arrangements.

DJ Alkarline, whose name is inspired by the alakali-manganese cell, also known colloquially as an alkaline or alkali-manganese battery, ensures that the energy stores remain charged throughout the evening with groovy electronica.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

lineup: Liliane Chlela + White Boy Scream
information:
silent green presents: 

Producer, DJ and performer Liliane Chlela is widely known in electronic and experimental scenes for her unique and audacious approach to sound, stirring audiences into pushing the limits of their auditory experiences ever further. Through her signature techniques, she explores the relationships between improvisation and the manipulation of sounds from wide-ranging musical genres. As White Boy Scream composer and sound artist Micaela Tobin integrates voice with electronics, oscillating between extreme textures of noise, drone, and opera. Her music includes elements of sonic ritual, ancient myth, and ancestral memory.

lineup: Le_haekien & Veith von Tsotzhousn
information:
German below. 

In their live performance, the sculptor Le_haekien and the sound artist Veith von Tsotzhousn work with the same sound material. This unfolds in space and makes movement visible. A fusion of sound and the medium of wood emerges‚Äîa relationship that absorbs, amplifies, and simultaneously alters different qualities of time to release them into the space. In this sonic and sculptural work, a dialogue arises, manifesting in a walkable sound space. The two artists invite the audience to linger in the multi-hour performance, observing the evolving space and immersing themselves in the ever-changing sound.

In ihrer Live Performance arbeiten der Bildhauer Le_haekien und der Soundk√ºnstler Veith von Tsotzhousn mit demselben Klangmaterial. Dieses entfaltet sich im Raum und macht Bewegung sichtbar. Eine Fusion aus Klang und dem Medium Holz entsteht. Eine Beziehung, die verschiedene Zeitqualit√§ten aufnimmt, verst√§rkt und zugleich ver√§ndert, um diese in den Raum zu entlassen. In dieser klanglichen und skulpturalen Arbeit entsteht ein Dialog, der sich in einem begehbaren Klangraum manifestiert. Die beiden K√ºnstler laden dazu ein, in der mehrst√ºndigen Performance zu verweilen, die Entwicklung im Raum zu beobachten und sich dem sich stetig ver√§ndernden Klang hinzugeben.

lineup: Waikiki, Tom Teschner
information:
Sexpositive 30+ - Party with sounds from all decades, all-time classics & mash-ups
DJ Waikiki & Tom Teschner
Specials: Whirlpool, Couples Area, Awareness Team
Dress to impress! From elegant to extravagant!
Admission: Per person 25‚Ç¨ / Social Ticket* 15‚Ç¨
Guests under the age of 30 are also welcome!

Come and immerse yourself in a world full of nostalgia and sensual energy! The "Naughty Nostalgia" party at INSOMNIA Club invites you to an unforgettable night full of memories, passion and adventure.

Our DJs bring the most danceable classics of past decades back to the dance floor and give many a hit a new remix look with electronic beats that will get you dancing.
Adventurous couples, sophisticated singles, curious newcomers - this party is for everyone who wants to go on a voyage of discovery in a hedonistic parallel universe. Whether partying, dancing, flirting, shagging - everyone will find their corners and suitable opportunities & people here.

Our club offers a special couples' gallery where you can retreat with your partner and enjoy the intimate atmosphere. For those who want to explore even more, there are various playgrounds available to bring your fantasies to life.

The INSOMNIA Club Awareness Team is always present to ensure that all guests treat each other with respect and feel comfortable. We place great importance on a safe and sex-positive environment where you can express yourself freely.

So grab your wildest outfits, get carried away by retro beats and mash ups and experience a night full of sensual adventures and let yourself be enchanted by the unique atmosphere!

Rules of the evening:
Our awareness team will be out and about in the club and always available for you.
- No means no.
- Do you want to talk, dance or play with someone? Ask politely if you are interested and respect the answer.
- Give others their space when playing or being intimate with each other. Do you want to join in? Ask politely and respect their answer.
- Cell phones are not allowed! Leave them in the checkroom.
- Crossing boundaries will not be tolerated, ask once, a no is a no.
- Sexual or verbal harassment will not be tolerated under any circumstances.

*Please present your social ticket with appropriate proof (social ticket BVG etc.) at the box office.

lineup: Stella Rose, Quarters of Change
information:
silent green presents: 

Stella Rose introduced her debut album Eyes of Glass in 2023 on the heels of two well-received singles, Muddled Man and Angel (GR), establishing her as a poetic force and powerful singer. ‚ÄúPassionate and dissolute, Muddled Man recalls Nick Cave at his Biblical best‚Äù (Clash). Its opposing reflection, Angel with ‚Äúwarm, folksy croon swells into a room-filling climax‚Äù (Paper Magazine). Eyes of Glass, recorded in Los Angeles and produced by Yves Rothman, combines the poetic soul of Stella Rose‚Äôs lyrics with the serpentine sound she and Rothman have developed ‚Äì feeling like a piece in conversation with its artistic predecessors.


Quarters of Change
Anchored by a mutual predisposition for unpredictability, Quarters of Change fuse together a signature hybrid of nineties-style alternative hooks, crunchy space rock soundscapes, and strutting seventies grooves. The New York City quartet of Ben Acker (guitar, bass, synthesiser), Attila Anrather (drums), Jasper Harris (guitar, bass, synthesiser) and Ben Roter (vocals, guitar) crafts a rich exhibition of emotion on their aptly titled 2023 second full-length offering, Portraits (300 Entertainment).


Saturday, November 16
Doors 7 pm / Start 8 pm

event_name: This is Techno Jazz: Aki Himanen & Aleksi Kinnunen (Live Concert), Gianluca Petrella (Dj Set)
lineup: Aki Himanen & Aleksi Kinnunen, Gianluca Petrella (DJ Set)
information:
Come dance with us in our show on Sunday, November 17 at Kantine Am Berghain, where we will have the pleasure of hosting a live concert by Finnish duo Aki Himanen and Aleksi Kinnunen and Italian Jazz legend Gianluca Petrella, this time behind the turntables.

Aki Himanen & Aleksi Kinnunen - Live (Trumpet, Electronica, Drums, Fx):

Trumpeter Aki Himanen and drummer Aleksi Kinnunen form an explosive duo that fuses Scandinavian jazz with the pulsating rhythms of techno music. They are constantly searching for new ways in which man and machine can create a real dialogue. Improvisation, spontaneity and musical communication are at the heart of their work.
The music is dark, intense and a poetic mix full of hypnotic mental images. It is reminiscent of Scandinavian landscapes where nature and technology gently merge. A suspenseful night drive somewhere between futuristic mountains where dawn is setting and darkness fades away in a slow and wonderful way.

Gianluca Petrella (DJ Set):

Gianluca Petrella is a jazz trombonist who has collaborated with internationally renowned musicians such as Enrico Rava, Carla Bley, and Steve Coleman. His career has included performances at major festivals and collaborations with prominent jazz figures.

Petrella is also very active in the field of electronic music. He has worked with artists like Ricardo Villalobos and Max Loderbauer on the Re: ECM project and with Moritz von Oswald. He has collaborated with electronic groups such as "9lazy9" and "Matmos" and has explored new musical territories with DJs Nicola Conte and Ralf.

For this very special performance, Gianluca will debut at Kantine Am Berghain selecting his vinyl collection of black music and deep house.

__________


Jazz-O-Tech is a label that draws on the rich heritage of two of music's most visionary and experimental genres: jazz and techno. Inspired by the creative and free-form nature of these two musical worlds, the label's artists mix tradition with modernity, improvisation with experimentation, and create a new sound known as techno-jazz.

lineup: Svaneborg Kardyb (Gondwana Records/DK) *live*
information:
Svaneborg Kardyb sind Nikolaj Svaneborg ‚Äì Wurlitzer, Juno, Klavier und Jonas Kardyb ‚Äì Schlagzeug, Perkussion. Mit Einfl√ºssen aus der d√§nischen Volksmusik und skandinavischem Jazz, darunter Nils Frahm, Esbj√∂rn Svennson und Jan Johanssons Aufnahme ‚ÄúJazz P√• Svenska‚Äú, ist ihre Musik eine exquisite und fr√∂hliche Verschmelzung von sch√∂nen Melodien, zartem Minimalismus, eing√§ngigen Grooves, subtilen elektronischen Vibes, nordischen Atmosph√§ren und organischem Zusammenspiel ‚Äì  alles getragen von der reinen Freude am gemeinsamen Spiel.

Ihre Musik ist auf den ersten Blick einfach gehalten, entwickelt und entfaltet sich aber beim H√∂ren, mit viel Raum f√ºr Erkundung, Reflexion und Improvisation. Ihr Ziel ist es, Musik zu schaffen, die so ehrlich und intim wie m√∂glich ist, ‚Äúmit Melodien und Rhythmen, die so stark sind, dass wir nur noch die √úberbringer sind‚Äù, wie sie sagen. Und ihre ausgezeichnete musikalische Chemie erlaubt es ihnen, sich wenig Gedanken √ºber musikalische Einfl√ºsse zu machen. Das verleiht ihrer Musik einen fesselnden Charme.

Svaneborg Kardyb stammen aus Aalborg in J√ºtland, im Norden D√§nemarks, wo sie sich 2013 begegneten. Sechs Jahre sp√§ter fingen sie an gemeinsam Musik zu machen. Wie ihre neuen Labelkollegen Vega Trails sind Svaneborg Kardyb ein Duo, ein Format, das ihnen viel Raum gibt, den sie besetzen ‚Äì oder auch leer lassen k√∂nnen.

Svaneborg Kardyb haben bei den Danish Music Awards Jazz 2019 gleich zwei Preise gewonnen: New Artist of the Year und Composer of the Year. Bisher haben sie drei Studioalben ver√∂ffentlicht: Knob (2019), Haven (2020) und Over Tage (2022) sowie die Ver√∂ffentlichung der At Home (An NPR Tiny Desk Session) EP (2023). Die Tiny Desk Session schaffte den internationalen Durchbruch und seitdem ist die Band in 13 verschiedenen L√§ndern ausgiebig getourt. Gl√ºcklicherweise haben sie die Zeit gefunden, ihr viertes Album aufzunehmen, das im Herbst 2024 auf Gondwana Records erscheinen wird.

event_name: TAYLOR EIGSTI feat. Gretchen Parlato, Casey Abrams & Ben Wendel *live
promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: Taylor Eigsti feat. Gretchen Parlato, Casey Abrams & Ben Wendel (US) *live*, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
Taylor Eigsti ist ein amerikanischer Pianist und Komponist. Als Komponist integriert er eine Vielzahl von Stilen und Einfl√ºssen, seine Kompositionen reichen von einf√ºhlsamen Balladen bis zu energetischen Fusion-St√ºcken, die alle ein tiefes Verst√§ndnis der Jazztradition zeigen. Sein Klavierspiel zeichnet sich durch eine beeindruckende Mischung aus technischer Brillanz, melodischer Sensibilit√§t und kreativer Spontaneit√§t aus. Taylor Eigsti ist in der Lage, musikalische Geschichten in Echtzeit zu erz√§hlen und dabei innovative melodische und harmonische Wendungen zu entwickeln.

Anfang des Jahres erschien sein neuestes Album ‚ÄúPlot Armor‚Äú, ein abwechslungsreiches und reich instrumentiertes Album voller stilistischer Wendungen, aufgenommen mit absoluten Stars des amerikanischen Jazz, darunter der Saxophonist Ben Wendel und der Ausnahmegitarrist Julian Lage, die beide schon bei uns im Gretchen aufgetreten sind. F√ºr seine Europatournee hat Taylor Eigsti ebenfalls ein Starensemble zusammengestellt, darunter die S√§ngerin Gretchen Parlato, sowie Casey Abrams und Ben Wendel, der auf diesem Weg auch wieder zu uns kommt. Klingt wie gemacht f√ºr unser Gretchen.

Taylor Eigstis Biografie liest sich wie die Geschichte eines Wunderkindes: Mit vier Jahren begann er Klavier zu spielen, mit acht Jahren hatte er seinen ersten √∂ffentlichen Auftritt im Vorprogramm von David Benoit, mit vierzehn ver√∂ffentlichte er sein erstes Album. Seitdem feiert er Erfolge als Solok√ºnstler und als Begleiter gro√üer Pop- und Jazzk√ºnstler*innen, von John Mayer und Sting bis zu Dave Brubeck, Esperanza Spalding und Joshua Redman. ‚ÄúPlot Armor‚Äú erschien auf GroundUp Records, dem Label von Snarky Puppy-Frontmann Michael League.

event_name: Oddkins (Felicity Mangan & Merche Blasco) + Luisa Pereira
lineup: Oddkins (Felicity Mangan & Merche Blasco) , Luisa Pereira
information:
silent green presents: 

Oddkins introduces a debut collaboration between Felicity Mangan and Merche Blasco alongside Luisa Pereira's customized Machine Learning powered tool. Through an electroacoustic performance with custom-made instruments, Mangan and Blasco will combine live processing of field recordings with biophonic hybrids generated through the aid of Pereira‚Äôs musical software, transporting the audience into imagined sonic realms inhabited by fruitful couplings among animals, plants, and technologies, inviting contemplation on the possibilities of symbiotic relationships in the face of environmental challenges.

lineup: La Yegros (AR) *live*
information:
La Yegros: Die K√∂nigin des Nu-Cumbia ist mit neuem Album zur√ºck.

Die argentinische S√§ngerin La Yegros kommt aus Buenos Aires, dort klingen die N√§chte nach Dancehall und elektronischen B√§ssen, ihre Eltern jedoch stammen aus Misiones, einer Provinz an der Grenze zu Brasilien und Paraguay, wo die B√§lle mit den Kl√§ngen von Chamam√©, Carnavalito und kolumbianischem Cumbia gef√ºllt sind. Diese Einfl√ºsse sind von ihr auf mittlerweile drei Alben verschmolzen und zu einer speziellen Version von Nu-Cumbia entwickelt worden.

Jetzt ist es Zeit es f√ºr ein neues Repertoire. Ihr neues und inzwischen viertes Album ‚ÄúHaz‚Äú hat La Yegros mit dem Team aufgenommen, das bereits f√ºr ihr erstes Album ‚ÄúViene de M√≠‚Äú verantwortlich war: Produzent King Coya, ein Pionier der synthetischen Experimente in der traditionellen Musik und der Komponist Daniel Mart√≠n, der es versteht, Melodien zum Tr√§umen und Hymnen zum Mitsingen zu erfinden.

F√ºr La Yegros geht es nicht darum, immer das gleiche zu machen und vorgefundene Kl√§nge zu reproduzieren. Sie erfindet ihre eigene Folklore, indem sie neue Rhythmen zusammenstellt und mit Fagott, Querfl√∂te und Flamenco-Gitarre originelle Kl√§nge integriert, w√§hrend die urbanen Elemente die Tanzfl√§chen mit Ankl√§ngen an Reggae und Funk auf den Kopf stellen. Dabei entwirft sie ihre Alben immer mit Blick auf die Live-Pr√§sentation. Uns erwartet eine fantastische Mischung, in der akustische Instrumente auf Samples, Synthesizer und live gespielte Electronica treffen.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: by Landry

____________________________________________


La Yegros returned to the stage in 2022 to celebrate an anniversary: the 10th anniversary of Viene de M√≠, her hit from the album of the same name, released worldwide in 2013, which catapulted her to international fame. We discovered a singer as rooted in the traditions of her country as she is in the most contemporary trends. Her parents come from Misiones, a province bordering Brazil and Paraguay, where balls are filled with the sounds of Chamam√©, Carnavalito and Colombian cumbia. But she herself is a native of Buenos Aires, whose nights are alive with the dancehall and electronic bass.

These influences have fused in two further successful albums, Magnetismo (2016) and Suelta (2019), followed by whirlwind tours during which La Yegros has been able to display her generous nature, inexhaustible energy, exuberant personality and infectious enthusiasm. La Yegros relaunched its dance machine in front of audiences as wild as ever, with a tried and tested repertoire that no dancer can resist. But it was also time for a new repertoire. To record their fourth album, La Yegros put her trust in a winning team, already responsible for Viene de M√≠. On the one hand, producer King Coya (Gaby Kerpel), a pioneer of synthetic experimentation applied to traditional music. On the other, composer Daniel Mart√≠n, who knows how to come up with melodies to dream about and hymns to sing along to. Inseparable and complementary, the trio continue to concoct this fantastic mixture where acoustic instruments meet samples and the rolling of machines.

But La Yegros, crowned queen of Nu-Cumbia, has never rested on her laurels. Her new productions continue to draw on popular music, but they are breaking away from over-defined genres. La Yegros invents her own folklore by knitting together new rhythms and integratng original sounds (bassoon, transverse flute, flamenco guitar, etc.), while the urban elements promise to turn dancefloors upside down with echoes of reggae and funk.

La Yegros never conceives an album without imagining how it will perform live. And although her show is a benchmark for the venues and festivals, she went into residency to beef up her formula. In additon to her usual line-up of guitar, accordion and percussion, a musician handles synthesizers and machines to play all the electronic elements live ‚Äì a risk-taker as much as a doubling of possibilities. In any case, you can count on the singer to assert her increasingly clear-cut character with each new project. And, above all, to never give up. La Yegros is back and her batteries are fully charged!

lineup: Shalosh (ACT Music) *live*
information:
Eing√§ngige Melodien gepaart mit verbl√ºffenden Improvisationen und ausgepr√§gtem Storytelling: Shalosh aus Tel Aviv geh√∂ren zu einer Generation von Jazzbands, die ein breites Publikum erreichen - im Jazz und dar√ºber hinaus. Ihre Musik ist rau, akustisch und progressiv, kontrastiert fr√∂hlich Stile und Genres und ist viel zu wendig, um sich kategorisieren zu lassen. In klassischer Jazztrio-Besetzung (Piano, Bass und Schlagzeug) gehen Shalosh ihren eigenen Weg und schaffen eine einzigartige und faszinierende Synthese aus so unterschiedlichen Einfl√ºssen wie Jazz, Rock, Klassik, Electronica, afrikanischer und nah√∂stlicher Musik.

Im letzten Jahr ist ‚ÄúTales of Utopia‚Äú erschienen. Ein Album, das w√§hrend der Covid-Pandemie entstand und sich inmitten chaotisch gewordener Zeitl√§ufte einer friedlichen Utopie widmet. ‚ÄûWir hatten die Zeit, uns mit unserer Herkunft zu besch√§ftigen. Wir lasen Geschichten aus der Bibel oder aus Tausendundeiner Nacht und vielen anderen Mythologien‚Äú, sagt Pianist Gadi. Und wieder sind es der eing√§ngige Groove und die ausgepr√§gte Melodik, gepaart mit einem ausgepr√§gten Storytelling, die den typischen Shalosh-Sound definieren. Aufgenommen unter Live-Bedingungen, ohne Kopfh√∂rer und Verst√§rker, ist hier eine ganz eigene, raue und eindringliche Dynamik entstanden.

Das Trio interagiert auf h√∂chstem Niveau und kommt ohne instrumentale Schaul√§ufe oder melodische Dominanz aus. Diese Ausgewogenheit erreichen sie durch einen einfachen Kniff: Das Ensemble wird nicht von einem Leader gef√ºhrt, sondern alle drei sind gleichberechtigt beteiligt. So k√∂nnen sie ihre gemeinsame k√ºnstlerische Entwicklung genie√üen und Musik ohne Ego entwerfen. Shalosh schaffen virtuos den Spagat, sich selbst als Musiker und K√ºnstler herauszufordern und gleichzeitig zug√§ngliche und anspruchsvolle Musik f√ºr ein breites Publikum zu machen.

Die Geschichte von Shalosh begann in Jerusalem, wo Matan Assayag (Schlagzeug) und Gadi Stern (Klavier) die Band ‚ÄúEnoma Elish‚Äú gr√ºndeten. Nach der Aufl√∂sung der Band setzten die beiden ihre musikalische Partnerschaft zwischen Israel und New York, wo Gadi damals lebte, fort. Anfang 2014 beschlossen sie, Shalosh zu gr√ºnden und engagierten den Bassisten David Michaeli. Seit der Ver√∂ffentlichung ihres Deb√ºtalbums ‚ÄûThe Bell Garden‚Äú im Jahr 2014 haben sie in der internationalen Musikszene tiefe Spuren hinterlassen.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Zohar Ron

____________________________________


SHALOSH is an instrumental piano trio, that belongs to the current generation of cross genre jazz groups able to reach a wide spectrum of audiences, in the Jazz world as well as in other genres. Their music is raw, acoustic and progressive, crossing stylistic boundaries and defying definition.

Despite its classic jazz trio format (piano, bass and drums) and the band members‚Äô deep roots in jazz and improvised music, SHALOSH‚Äôs music weaves its own path and creates a unique and fascinating synthesis out of such varied genres as Rock, Classical, Electronic, African, and Middle Eastern music.

SHALOSH has set itself the goal of creating music that is both accessible and sophisticated, performing with great alacrity the balancing act of challenging themselves as musicians and artists, while leaving the door open for as wide an audience as possible, striving to break the distance screen that intellectual music may create. Their music comes from an emotional and raw place, the band‚Äôs reaction to today‚Äôs cold urban jungle.

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.  

Photo: Zohar Ron

lineup: Gidge
information:
Gidge, das Duo bestehend aus Jonatan Nilsson und Ludvig Stolterman, hat seine Wurzeln in der schwedischen Stadt Ume√• und kommt im November nach Berlin. Ihre elektronische Musik ist gepr√§gt von Field-Recordings der Natur und eignet sich sowohl f√ºr die Tanzfl√§che als auch f√ºr eine entspannte Umgebung. Jeder einzelne Track von Gidge schafft seine eigene Atmosph√§re und Emotion. Ihr Werk entwickelt sich auf nat√ºrliche Weise und baut sich oft aus einem ruhigen Break, der mit Vocal-Samples und neoklassischen Einfl√ºssen verfeinert wird, zu kraftvollen H√∂hepunkten auf. 

 

Die Musik von Gidge, die f√ºr ihre Inspiration aus dem Wald, der Natur und dem Norden Schwedens bewundert wird, ist in der Tat von absolut internationalem Kaliber und wird von Menschen aus der ganzen Welt geh√∂rt. Gidge haben auf ihrer Clubtournee in London, Amsterdam, Paris und Stockholm ausverkauft und auf Festivals in Mexiko, Georgien, der T√ºrkei und Thailand ihr Live-Set vor gro√üem Publikum gespielt. Blogs wie Pigeons & Planes, A Closer Listen und Ransom Note schrieben √ºber ihre Musik - Pitchfork-Mitarbeiter w√§hlten Gidge zu ihren Lieblingsk√ºnstlern, die sie an verschneiten Tagen h√∂ren wollten - XLR8R-Leser w√§hlten Gidge 2015 auf Platz 1 der ‚Äûbesten neuen elektronischen Acts" - Bandcamp hob ‚ÄûLNLNN" 2017 als ‚ÄûAlbum des Tages" hervor.  

 

Die Diskografie von Gidge umfasst das Album ‚ÄûAutumn Bells", den Kurzfilm ‚ÄûLulin" (in Zusammenarbeit mit Lampray), das Minialbum ‚ÄûLNLNN" und die Deb√ºt-EP ‚ÄûFor Seoul". Am 6. November 2021 erschien ihr neuestes Album ‚ÄûNew Light", das ebenfalls von der Kritik gelobt wurde.

information:
Welcome to LIBIDOH, a pulsating mix of...
... ... ...

Curious to know what really defines us?

-- COMMUNITY
We have a sexy, open-minded, and close-knit community that extends far beyond the usual forms of social media. Pre and after-parties are usually part of the overall experience.

-- CLUBS & VENUES
Clubs/Venues are regularly changed, shaping the long nights to be specially tailored to the location and differing in our specials and lineup.

-- ARTISTS & SPECIALS
We invite special artists & performers to our parties or create space for new extravagant ideas in our world. Keep an eye out for specials on our flyers or in social media. We make a point to always prepare something unique.

-- EXCLUSIVITY
The audience depends on the event; we make our selection on-site, sometimes online, and check the dress code at the door. You can be sure that we have developed a sense of who brings the right mindset.

-- MEANING
It's not just about sex - it's about a feeling, a relaxed mindset that we prefer. We come to celebrate, to connect, and to find out what our Libido(h) wants to do with us. Those who come only for the F-word should stay outside.

-- PRIVACY
No-photo policy, not even by photographers.


And what else?

-- SAFETY & CONSENT
Of course, we also take care of your safety. An awareness team is deployed for every event, security is present, and our rules are highlighted. You can find them on our website as well.

-- ACCESSIBILITY & INCLUSIVITY
A platform for newcomers and a meeting point for the scene. We want to ensure that the right characters have access to our world. So don't hesitate to ask questions and give feedback, whether in person at the door, in the club, or online. If you're uncertain about the dress code, we can gladly provide recommendations.

Clarissa Connelly + Fine (UK)
information: Born in Scotland, artist Clarissa Connelly relocated to Copenhagen as a child, where the cultural landscape has continued to fuel her creativity. For years, she has explored the sacred sites, mythology, and music of Nordic culture, finding enduring inspiration in Celtic traditions. For her latest album, The Voyager (2021), she wandered through the Scandinavian landscape, channeling melodies from ancient pre-Christian sites. // The soundscape of singer/songwriter and producer Fine is meant to evoke the feeling of a nighttime drive through the desert in a David Lynch film. Her angelic voice sounds like cherry-colored half-speed funk or what it would be like if Dolly Parton played alternative rock.

WohnzimmerTechno = living room techno (English)  

And that‚Äôs exactly the vibe we are creating at our events. We want everyone to feel comfortable, welcome and supplied with the most amazing artists of the scene.  

There is a consistently rising hate between the different genres of electronic music which we want to stop because it has nothing to do with the ORIGIN OF TECHNO.  

We‚Äôre here to lift each other up and create a night that will stay in our minds forever.

lineup: Jessica Pavone ‚Äì viola , , Matsuno/Parkins/Filippou/Black:, , Keisuke Matsuno ‚Äì guitar, PureData, Andrea Parkins ‚Äì accordion, amplified objects, processing, Evi Filippou ‚Äì vibraphone, percussion, Jim Black ‚Äì drums
information:
Violist and composer, Jessica Pavone, explores the tactile and sensory experience of music as a vibration-based medium. Over the past twenty years, she has been developing solo music based on the pitches of the open strings intended to accentuate the natural sympathetic resonances of her particularly loud viola. Although her primary training was in classical music, Jessica Pavone has dedicated her practice to exploring alternative avenues for creative musical expression and ‚Äúhas made a career of redefining the possibilities for her instrument‚Äù (Steve Smith, National Sawdust Log). Recently What Happens Has Become Now has been released, Jessica Pavone‚Äôs fifth solo viola album and her fourth for Relative Pitch Records.

Keisuke Matsuno is a guitarist who employs sound processing techniques, including live sampling, controlled feedback, and real-time manipulation. Born and raised in Berlin, he later relocated to Brooklyn, where he has spent a decade honing his craft. Keisuke Matsuno has been part of Jim Black's band for nearly 10 years, working on music ranging from John Zorn to Hildur Gu√∞nad√≥ttir, collaborated on improvisational sets with Andrea Parkins, and recently joined Evi Filippou's band. For this performance, the four join forces to deliver an explosive set that fuses their individual influences into a unique blend of glitch, cut-and-paste, noise, and ambient.

Supported by Berlin Senate Department for Culture and Social Cohesion.

information:
As winter approaches and the lights turn up, one corner of Europe and the UK will keep its summer glow this November as the inaugural Banana Ball comes to town. Devised by ITDEVENTS in partnership with Nymphia Wind the winner of RuPaul‚Äôs Drag Race Season 16, mark your calendars now for an unforgettable celebration of artistry, authenticity and sheer talent of the sort rarely seen.

Nymphia Wind, whose name is inspired by the beloved Pok√©mon Sylveon, embodies beauty and whimsicality. The ‚ÄúWind‚Äù in her name reflects her aspiration for freedom and her desire to be "invisible like the wind," showcasing the grace and power of individuality. Nymphia has captured the hearts of drag fans worldwide with her astounding performances, sharp fashion sense, vibrant costumes and her ability to grow and evolve, capturing our hearts like few before her.

In keeping with her Drag Race debut, tonight‚Äôs your chance to deck yourself out in Nymphia‚Äôs signature yellow, embracing the joyful spirit of the Banana Ball and adding a splash of sunshine as winter approaches. Nymphia says dressing in yellow symbolises positivity and connection, inviting everyone to shine their brightest.

The highlight of our Banana Ball will feature a dazzling live performances by Nymphia plus a bevy of local Queens and DJs to keep you and your crew Poppin all night, plus best dressed and runway competitions. 

Join us to celebrate Nymphia Wind's extraordinary journey and her remarkable impact on our drag community. At the least, trust us when we say she goes bananas!

promoters: Good Day Berlin Kultur und Veranstaltungen GmbH
lineup: √Äb√°se (Analogue Foundation & Oshu Records/HU/D ) *live*
information:
√Ä‚Äéb√°se ist ein Bandprojekt unter der Leitung des Keyboarders und Produzenten Bogn√°r Szabolcs. Das Wort ‚Äû√†b√°se‚Äú stammt aus der westafrikanischen Yoruba-Sprache und steht f√ºr Zusammenarbeit: f√ºr kollektive Anstrengungen, Kollaborationen und einen gemeinschaftlichen Vibe. Als Ideengeber dieses Projekts bringt Bogn√°r Szabolcs K√ºnstler*innen zusammen, um in kollaborativer Arbeit einen Sound entstehen zu lassen, der traditionelle westafrikanische und afro-brasilianische Musik mit Jazz, Hip-Hop und Clubkultur verbindet.

In diesem Jahr ist mit ‚ÄúAwakening‚Äú das zweite Album von √Ä‚Äéb√°se erschienen. Das Album wurde in vier Tagen in den Berliner Brewery Studios mit einem Ensemble aus engen Mitarbeiter*innen aufgenommen und vereint √Äb√°ses vielf√§ltige musikalische Einfl√ºsse und Bezugspunkte (klassischer Lagos Afrobeat, traditionelle ungarische Folklore, Yoruba-Rhythmen, House und Techno, Hip-Hop und vieles mehr.) mit der exquisiten modalen Improvisation, die durch Szabis Selbstbeobachtung angeregt wird.

Nachdem er bereits von BBC Radio 6 Music's Gilles Peterson, Soulection, Okayplayer, Worldwide FM, Stamp The Wax, Earmilk, Complex und KEXP unterst√ºtzt wurde, ver√∂ffentlichte √Äb√°se 2019 seine lang erwartete Deb√ºt-EP ‚ÄûInvocation‚Äú √ºber HHV Records und Cosmic Compositions und Anfang 2021 die ‚ÄûBody Mind Spirit‚Äú EP, eine gemeinsame elektronische Erkundung mit dem Schlagzeuger/Produzenten Ziggy Zeitgeist. Ende 2021 erschien das gefeierte Deb√ºtalbum ‚ÄûLaroy√™‚Äú, das komplett w√§hrend einer f√ºnfmonatigen Reise nach Brasilien aufgenommen wurde und dem Projekt weltweite Anerkennung einbrachte.

Als ausgebildeter Keyboarder ist Bogn√°r seit vielen Jahren in der vielseitigen Musikszene von Budapest aktiv. Er hat mehrere erfolgreiche Acts geleitet, darunter Solqlap Budapest und The Mabon Dawud Republic, ein vierzehnk√∂pfiges Afrobeat-Orchester, das die Felabration Budapest veranstaltete und mit K√ºnstlern wie Dele Sosimi und Pat Thomas auftrat. Nach Aufenthalten in Paris, Lyon, New York, Accra, Rio de Janeiro und Salvador lebt Bogn√°r heute in Berlin, wo er neben seiner Solokarriere auch als Keyboarder f√ºr den nigerianischen Souls√§nger Wayne Snow, das lokale Kollektiv Sonic Interventions und den australischen Jazz-Schlagzeuger Ziggy Zeitgeist's Zeitgeist Freedom Energy Exchange arbeitet. Sein Engagement in der internationalen Musikszene f√ºhrte zu Studio- oder B√ºhnenkooperationen mit so unterschiedlichen K√ºnstlern wie Immanuel Wilkins, Elzhi, Guilty Simpson, Phat Kat, Etuk Ubong, Moses Yoofee, Petter Eldh oder Patti Smith.

Artwork: @ √Äb√°se

_____________________________________


On a quest for cosmic grooves of unity, √Äb√°se is the imagination of Hungarian producer and keyboardist Szabolcs Bogn√°r. Creating an exquisite blend of jazz, West African, Brazilian, hip-hop and electronic music, he set to release his second album ‚ÄòAwakening‚Äô in collaboration with Analogue Foundation in summer 2024.

Created following a move to Berlin, marriage, new parenthood, and the inevitable interrogation of mortality that takes place when a loved one has transitioned, the album demonstrates a deep understanding of music‚Äôs ability to cross time and geographic boundaries, conveying a message of unity, dialogue and self-reflection.

Recorded in four days at Berlin's Brewery Studios with an ensemble of close collaborators, the album coalesces √Äb√°se‚Äôs varied musical influences and reference points (classic Lagos Afrobeat, traditional Hungarian folk, Yoruba rhythms, house and techno, hip-hop et al) with the exquisite modal improvisation spurred by Szabi‚Äôs introspection. His work as an artist has drawn widespread critical acclaim. Debut album ‚ÄòLaroy√™, recorded entirely during a five- month trip to Brazil, found global praise from the likes of The Guardian, BBC Radio 6, Selection, KEXP and Complex. As a keyboard player, Szabi has collaborated with the likes of Wayne Snow, Dele Sosimi, Pat Thomas and Zeitgeist Freedom Energy Exchange.

Ihre genre√ºbergreifende Fusion aus Disco, Shoegaze und psychedelischen Kl√§ngen haben sie zuletzt auf ihrem zweiten Album ‚ÄúAlive‚Äú (2022) zu einem neuen H√∂hepunkt gef√ºhrt. Live haben sie die F√§higkeit, auf gro√üen B√ºhnen intime Konzerte zu spielen und schaffen es genauso, auch kleinere Hallen in gro√üe S√§le zu verwandeln. The Flabbies erschaffen in ihrer Performance die ideale Kombination aus Licht, Bild und frei streunenden Noten und entwickeln ihren dynamischen Sound mit jedem Auftritt weiter.

The Flabbies wurden 2015 von den Jugendfreunden Oƒüuz Kont und Sarp Daƒülar ≈ûahin gegr√ºndet und brachten ihre EP ‚Äú2015‚Äú heraus. Mit ihrem Deb√ºtalbum ‚ÄúBack in Town‚Äú erlangten sie internationale Aufmerksamkeit. Von der Pandemie lie√üen sie sich nicht ausbremsen, sondern arbeiteten eben online zusammen, so entstand ihre Single ‚ÄúUnder the Sun‚Äú. Mit Can S√ºrmen am Schlagzeug wurden The Flabbies 2022 zu einem Trio und schlugen mit ‚ÄúJungle‚Äú im April 2022 ein neues Kapitel auf, den Schwung nutzten sie, um ‚ÄúAlive‚Äú aufzunehmen. Founded in 2015 by childhood friends Oƒüuz Kont and Sarp Daƒülar ≈ûahin, The Flabbies, emerged with their EP "2015." As Istanbul-based trailblazers of instrumental shoegaze and post-rock in T√ºrkiye, they gained both local and international recognition with their debut album "Back in Town," leading to a feature in a 2018 FIAT commercial. Renowned for their serene melodies and ethereal soundscapes, they evolved into a trio in 2022 with the drummer Can S√ºrmen and released their second album, "ALIVE", a genre-bending fusion of disco, shoegaze, and psychedelic sounds. From intimate venues to big festival stages and with a new EP on the horizon before their European Tour, The Flabbies continue to explore and innovate, inviting listeners on an exciting journey through their evolving musical landscape.

lineup: Ryoji Ikeda, Pyur
information:
The grounding of aesthetic production in the emergent formal properties of fundamental mathematical elements has been a major theme in the development of contemporary art. In this tradition Japanese artist Ryoji Ikeda stands out as the preeminent exponent. Berlin Atonal, in collaboration with silent green, is proud to host the German iteration of Ikeda‚Äôs latest major audiovisual project ultratronics [live set]. The new performance is based on the universalist principles laid out in Ikeda‚Äôs latest album ultratronics which was his first release in over a decade when it came out in 2022 and contained material designed between 1989 and 1999, along with more recent compositions developed between 2013 and 2022.

ultratronics [live set] is the culmination of Ikeda‚Äôs career long obsession with data-driven research and the ways in which the perceiving subject experiences sonic and visual phenomena, particularly when they are driven to their extremes. His audiovisual shows are operations of a particular mathematico-symbolic structure which exist as temporal artifices constructed out of the universe of pure tones, sine waves, white noise¬†and light.

Supporting the show is German artist Pyur, aka Sophie Schnell, whose electronic compositions focus on condensed, pulsating forms that are minimal in structure and expansive in emotional texture. Her work explores the raw interplay between inner turbulence and the chaotic beauty of the external world through meticulously layered and precise sound design, pushing the boundaries of frequency and dynamic range to create immersive, multidimensional sonic environments.

Warning: this show will contain loud-noises and strobing light effects and is not recommended for people that may be sensitive to these phenomena.

information:

This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night long. And since there‚Äôs no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It‚Äôs Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,  

Komm in deinem besten Techno-Outfit oder einfach so, wie du dich am wohlsten f√ºhlst. Das Wichtigste ist, dass du bereit bist, die Nacht zu erleben und dich der Musik hinzugeben. Der Techno Mittwoch ist eine Feier der TECHNO Kultur, die die Grenzen des M√∂glichen √ºberschreitet. Es ist eine Einladung, in eine Welt einzutauchen, in der die Zeit stillsteht und die Musik regiert. Sichere dir jetzt deine Tickets und sei Teil dieser elektrisierenden Nacht!
