lineup: Curses¬†, Nuovo Testamento, Franz Scala
information:
CURSES:
Romantic post-punk and body music from Berlin. Luca Venezia on vocals and guitar, and Dame Bonnet on bass brings the  Curses ‚Äòlive‚Äô to stage, threading the visceral connection between 1980‚Äôs inspired dark- melancholic pop to the DIY energy of early E.B.M. With 2 full length albums on Dischi Autunno, Curses has also released a limited edition LP on Paris fashion brand, Saint Laurent, and music in video campaigns for Dior, and Raf Simons/Calvin Klein. A new album is on the way, soaked in the signature Curses‚Äô ghostly guitars and haunting vocals.

NUOVO TESTAMENTO:
Nuovo Testamento is the Los Angeles & Bologna-based trio lighting up the dance floor with their uniquely dark italo disco-flavored pop hits. Following the release of the coldwave cult favorite Exposure EP in 2019 on Avant! Records, their widely acclaimed full length New Earth exploded onto the dance floor. Including instant synthpop staple ‚Äúthe Searcher,‚Äù alongside Hi-NRG homage ‚ÄúMichelle Michelle‚Äù and goth-tinged hits like ‚ÄúGolden Boy,‚Äù New Earth is widely considered across genres to be one of 2021‚Äôs best underground albums of the year.

Support: Franz Scala

Weaving smoothly between Italian Dance, Psychedelic Disco and Proto House, Franz quickly turns the dance floor into a vignette-tainted retro nostalgia rave fueled only by his music.

lineup: @Floating Points
information: The new album from acclaimed British producer Sam Shepherd, Cascade, is a continuation of sorts. In late 2022, the composer ‚Äì renowned for drifting between genres as freely as his stage name, Floating Points, implies ‚Äì found himself in the Californian desert working on something new. Mere Mortals, his first ballet score, created with the San Francisco Ballet, was to be a collision of sound and dance exploring the ancient parable of Pandora through the prism of technology. ‚ÄúIt was one of quite a few left turns I was taking around that time,‚Äù recalls Shepherd, who can say that again: Promises, his multiple end-of-year-list-topping previous record, released in 2021, had seen him swap his typical modular synth tapestries and intricate drum patterns for airy dreamscapes, crafted with late legendary saxophonist Pharoah Sanders and the London Symphony Orchestra. It was a collaboration so popular, a Mercury Prize nomination and sold-out show at the Hollywood Bowl in September 2023 followed. Between these projects and an upcoming anime score for Adult Swim, from the outside it might have seemed as though Shepherd was departing the dance floor for good. But as he wrote his ballet score by day, at night he found himself longing for the sweaty communion of the club; for the pulse-racing abandon of electronic music once more.

lineup: Juan Evangelista, Lewis Fautzi, MELATRONIX, The Brvtalist, , DJ Zur√ºckbleiben Bitte, Marit, Multifuse
information:
‚ñÜ  About the Expeditions
The Expeditions series was founded in spring 2018 with a clear vision of breaking out of the monotony that defines most pure Techno nights in Berlin. The concept is to create a clear musical distinction between the different parts of the night, while remaining loyal to the classical and traditional aspects of Techno: from Detroit groove to hypnotic and atmospheric storytelling. We emphasize energy and progression. We strive to create a clear beginning and a decisive end. We believe in Techno as a journey, designed for the dance floor, rather than for podcasts. Following this principle, we curate the second floor with classic, warm, chord-led interpretations of House music, that serve as a perfect contrast to the main floor program. Occasionally, you might even find a third floor hidden in the vast garden of :// about blank. Explore, that's what the Expeditions is about.

‚ñÜ  What to expect
‚¶ø A Power Deck with well curated interpretations of pure Techno music. No minimalism, no sophisticated preaching. 
‚¶ø A Comfort Deck with a contrasting program, curated with the finest House music: classic Chicago House, Soulful and New York Garage, and Berlin contemporary touches.
‚¶ø DJs at eye level, musically educated audience and Berlin underground at its best. 

‚ñÜ FAQ

lineup: Floating Points
information: The new album from acclaimed British producer Sam Shepherd, Cascade, is a continuation of sorts. In late 2022, the composer ‚Äì renowned for drifting between genres as freely as his stage name, Floating Points, implies ‚Äì found himself in the Californian desert working on something new. Mere Mortals, his first ballet score, created with the San Francisco Ballet, was to be a collision of sound and dance exploring the ancient parable of Pandora through the prism of technology. ‚ÄúIt was one of quite a few left turns I was taking around that time,‚Äù recalls Shepherd, who can say that again: Promises, his multiple end-of-year-list-topping previous record, released in 2021, had seen him swap his typical modular synth tapestries and intricate drum patterns for airy dreamscapes, crafted with late legendary saxophonist Pharoah Sanders and the London Symphony Orchestra. It was a collaboration so popular, a Mercury Prize nomination and sold-out show at the Hollywood Bowl in September 2023 followed. Between these projects and an upcoming anime score for Adult Swim, from the outside it might have seemed as though Shepherd was departing the dance floor for good. But as he wrote his ballet score by day, at night he found himself longing for the sweaty communion of the club; for the pulse-racing abandon of electronic music once more.

lineup: Marcin Pietruszewski, Maxime Denuc
information:
The AGGREGATE Festival is back with two days of hyperorgan music presenting works for computer-controlled organ and electronics on two of Berlin‚Äôs most beautiful organs. With Marcin Pietruszewski, Maxime Denuc, Arnold Dreyblatt and gamut inc.

The Berlin ensemble gamut inc (Marion W√∂rle and Maciej ≈öledziecki) presents the fourth edition of the AGGREGATE Festival at the Auenkirche and the Kaiser-Wilhelm-Ged√§chtniskirche Berlin on November 29 and 30. There will be new works for pipe organs by Marcin Pietruszewski (Auditory Distortion Synthesis for Organ and Computer-Generated Pluriphonic Sound) and Maxime Denuc (Nachthorn +) in the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and by gamut inc and Arnold Dreyblatt in the Auenkirche.

Together with outstanding composers from the fields of electronic, electro-acoustic and experimental music as well as new music, gamut inc will develop pioneering artistic strategies between acoustic and electronic music on internationally renowned organs as part of the AGGREGATE series. Thousands of notes and parameters are prepared, generated and manipulated using composition programs. The pipes are controlled by the computer, but the sound comes from the pipes as in traditional playing.

Maxime Denuc is an electronic music composer based in Brussels. For some years now, his solo work has focused on church organs. He will perform Nachthorn, an entirely acoustic dance music piece with the organ as sole actor. Oscillating between dub techno and harmonic locked grooves. Nachthorn proposes a hypnotic music piece whose lines sketch the outline of an imaginary warehouse. The record was critically acclaimed, notably by Boomkat which selected it in the ten record of the year 2022. It has also been chosen as the soundtrack for the Chanel Spring-Summer 2023 Haute-Couture show.

Marcin Pietruszewski is a composer and researcher, he is engaged in sound synthesis and composition with computers, exploring specific formal developments in the tradition of electroacoustic music and contemporary sound art, as well as extra-musical domains of auditory design, computational linguistics and psychoacoustics.

event_name: African Acid is the Future 10 Year Anniversary
lineup: GLOBUS STAGE, Fulu Mizik¬†live concert
information:
Fulu Miziki, the up-and-coming ‚ÄöAfrofuturist‚Äò collective, who make their own instruments out of garbage, have astonished the world with their innovative sound of industrial soukous-inspired punk, electronic music!

Fulu Miziki roughly translates to ‚Äúmusic from garbage‚Äù which is an accurate description of the thrillingly chaotic Eco-Friendly-Afro-Futuristic-Punk-Ensemble of artists who come straight from a future where humans have reconciled with mother earth and with themselves.

This multidisciplinary collective of artists is based in the heart of Africa, in the Congolese capital city Kinshasa. For several years now, it‚Äôs members have spent their time conceptualizing an orchestra made from objects found in the trash, constantly changing instruments, and always in search of new sounds. Making their own instruments, performance costumes, and masks is essential to the approach of Fulu Miziki‚Äôs musical core ideology.

Their unique sound supports a pan-African message of artistic liberation, peace and a severe look at the ecological situation of the Democratic Republic of Congo and the whole world. For Fulu everything can be recovered and re enchanted.


Stamp allows access to klubnacht afterwards.

lineup: Black Decelerant + modalities
information:
silent green presents: 

Black Decelerant, the duo of Khari Lucas, aka Contour, and Omari Jazz, explore spiritual jazz traditions through contemporary tone and texture, fostering sonic meditations on themes of Black being and nonbeing, life and mourning, expansion and limitation, and the individual and collective. Their self-titled debut album, and the collaboration‚Äôs core intention, inspires a space for listeners to find stillness and solace, while providing a basis for a movement beyond ‚Äúthe moment‚Äù.

modalities is a new collective entity comprised of Alias Error and Oscar Atanga. Setting themselves apart from the dominant club scenes in their current home city of Berlin, the duo provide sonic curation via hybrid DJ sets, live performance, music direction and bespoke composition with a focus on downtempo, ambient and experimental music. Having explored the intersections between music, contemporary art, film and fashion individually for the last few years, the two artists and good friends came together to focus on music and sound design.

lineup: Ben B√∂hmer
information:
Neuer Track, Neues Album, neue Live-Shows: Ben B√∂hmer kommt mit seinem neuen Album ‚ÄúBloom‚Äú im November im Rahmen seiner Tour ‚ÄûBloom Live‚Äú f√ºr drei Shows nach Berlin. Au√üerdem erscheint die erste richtungsweisende Singleauskopplung ‚ÄûBest Life‚Äú, die zusammen mit dem Berliner Duo JONAH aufgenommen wurde. 

 
Ben B√∂hmer sorgt auch in diesem Jahr daf√ºr, dass alle den Atem anhalten. Nach einem kometenhaften Aufstieg ohne Gleichen besteht inzwischen kein Zweifel mehr daran, dass er sich als einer der wichtigsten zeitgen√∂ssischen Tastemaker in der elektronischen Tanzmusik etabliert hat. Unter Garantie wird das neue Album Bloom im September und die zugeh√∂rige Tournee den globalen Hype um ihn weiter entz√ºnden und befl√ºgeln.    

 

Tanzmusik, mit viel Groove, aber noch viel, viel mehr Gef√ºhl. Ben B√∂hmer steht f√ºr tiefe, komplexe, vielstimmige Emotionen, umh√ºllt von Melodien und Rhythmen, die Massen weltweit gleicherma√üen zu Tr√§nen r√ºhren und in ungehemmte Euphorie verfallen lassen.  

Sein Deb√ºtalbum ‚ÄûBreathing‚Äú und der Nachfolger ‚ÄûBegin Again‚Äú haben neue Standards gesetzt. Dazu war die eigene Welttournee restlos ausverkauft. Dementsprechend hoch sind die Erwartungen an den Nachfolger ‚ÄûBloom‚Äú, der auf dem legend√§ren Label Ninja Tune erscheinen wird, das schon Giganten wie Bonobo oder Bicep gro√ügezogen hat.   

Die Geschwindigkeit und der Impact, mit dem Ben B√∂hmer die gr√∂√üten B√ºhnen dieser Welt gest√ºrmt hat, l√§sst wenig Vergleiche. Doch der K√ºnstler hat trotz all des Ruhms und Erfolgs nicht vergessen, wer er ist und von wo er kommt. Das neue Album ‚ÄûBloom‚Äú verk√∂rpert sowohl R√ºckbesinnung als auch Aufbruch. Die neuen Tracks spiegeln die anf√§ngliche Liebe f√ºr Experimentelles und Improvisation und dennoch er√∂ffnen sie ein g√§nzliches Neues Kapitel in der Karriere des jungen K√ºnstlers: Wir erhalten Einblick in eine innere Welt, die reifen und sich festigen konnte. Aus dem resultiert eine k√ºnstlerische Vision, die an Weitl√§ufigkeit, Facettenreichtum und Entschlossenheit alles Bisherige in den Schatten stellt.   

 

Ein weiteres Zeugnis f√ºr das Genie des Ausnahmek√ºnstlers ist die Zusammenarbeit mit einer ganzen Riege an namhaften G√§sten auf der neuen Ver√∂ffentlichung, darunter Lykke Li oder Enfant Sauvage von The Blaze. Nach Shows als Headliner auf dem SONAR oder dem Lollapalooza wird im November die neue Tour starten. Diese besteht aus acht europ√§ischen Shows, darunter drei Konzerten in Deutschland und eine Show im legend√§ren Alexandra Palace in London.

lineup: King Kong Kicks
information:
King Kong Kicks bringt dir den kollektiven Abriss, sprengt Genregrenzen und kreiert seinen eigenen Hype um deinen Vibe - slightly verschwommen, wie die Pics aus deiner Einwegkamera und genauso unique. 
King Kong Kicks ist das Augenzwinkern in deiner Playlist und der Geschmackskompass, der im perfect timing auch mal durchdreht und nuts geht. 
Lass zusammen ausbrechen, einen energetischen Tripp erleben und Hand in Hand dem Wort Party eine ganz neue Bedeutung geben und kopflos, aber herzig das Leben feiern.

Sounds like: Ennio, Berq, Fred Again, Marlon Hoffstadt, Dilla, Giant Rooks, Edwin Rosen, Mando Diao, Mayberg, Kasi, Florence and the machine, Brutalismus 3000, Paulwetz, Royel Otis, Paula Carolina, Bibiza, Southstar, Ski Aggu, Arctic Monkeys, Blond....

lineup: Arnold Dreyblatt, gamut inc
information:
The AGGREGATE Festival is back with two days of hyperorgan music presenting works for computer-controlled organ and electronics on two of Berlin‚Äôs most beautiful organs. With Marcin Pietruszewski, Maxime Denuc, Arnold Dreyblatt and gamut inc.

The Berlin ensemble gamut inc (Marion W√∂rle and Maciej ≈öledziecki) presents the fourth edition of the AGGREGATE Festival at the Auenkirche and the Kaiser-Wilhelm-Ged√§chtniskirche Berlin on November 29 and 30. There will be new works for pipe organs by Marcin Pietruszewski (Auditory Distortion Synthesis for Organ and Computer-Generated Pluriphonic Sound) and Maxime Denuc (Nachthorn +) in the Kaiser Wilhelm Memorial Church and by gamut inc and Arnold Dreyblatt in the Auenkirche.

Together with outstanding composers from the fields of electronic, electro-acoustic and experimental music as well as new music, gamut inc will develop pioneering artistic strategies between acoustic and electronic music on internationally renowned organs as part of the AGGREGATE series. Thousands of notes and parameters are prepared, generated and manipulated using composition programs. The pipes are controlled by the computer, but the sound comes from the pipes as in traditional playing.

Arnold Dreyblatt (b. New York City, 1953) is an American media artist and composer. He has been based in Berlin since 1984. Dreyblatt is the Vice-Director of the Visual Arts Section of the Akademie der K√ºnste in Berlin. One of the second generation of New York minimal composers, Dreyblatt studied music with Pauline Oliveros, La Monte Young, and Alvin Lucier and media art with Woody and Steina Vasulka. He has invented a set of new and original instruments, performance techniques, and a system of tuning.

lineup: TOYTOY x Umberto Echo (Oneness Rec./D) *live, , Sean Steinfeger (Opening DJ-Set/D)
information:
TOYTOY: Vier Musik-Virtuosen auf einem energetischen Haufen. Zusammen bilden die Hamburger einen Katalysator f√ºr Einfl√ºsse von Frank Zappa und Weather Report bis zu J Dilla und Terrace Martin. Gleichzeitig atmen sie die Wolken einer jungen globalen Jazzszene. Beschleunigt durch die unb√§ndige Energie ihrer Liveshows kreieren die vier auch im Studio ihren ganz eigenen Vibe.

Bass Hitze, Percussion-Sound-Megapalette, Schlagzeug-Frechheit, Hypnose-Gitarre. Ganz nach dem Vorbild amerikanischer Musik-Kollektive wie Soulquarians oder The Roots sehen sich TOYTOY als kreativer Impulsgeber und M√∂glichmacher f√ºr die Fusion aus Jazz und Urban Music wie Soul und Rap.

TOYTOY haben sich in den letzten Jahren in der deutschen Jazz- und Groove-Szene einen Namen gemacht mit ihrer Konzertreihe ‚Äûre-jazzed‚Äú, in der sie ikonische Hip-Hop-Alben dekonstruieren und zu den Wurzeln der urspr√ºnglich gesampelten Jazz-Klassiker zur√ºckf√ºhren. Es folgten diverse eigene Ver√∂ffentlichungen, u.a. mit der NDR Bigband und Giovanni Weiss.

Gemeinsam mit Produzent und Dub-Wizzard Umberto Echo, der die Gruppe seit ihren Anf√§ngen als ambitionierte Teenagerband in den sp√§ten Nullerjahren kennt, wagen TOYTOY nun auf ihrem neuesten Album ‚ÄûSurprise Surprise‚Äú den Sprung in bisher ungewohntes Terrain. Mit illustren G√§sten aus Umberto Echos Oneness Records Kosmos wie Gentleman Keyboarder Frank Pollak und Dub Inc. Bassist Moritz von Korff verschmelzen die hyperkreativen Hamburger ihren eklektischen Stil mit karibisch-britischen Reggaegrooves und Dub-Kl√§ngen.

Die Releasetour zum Album im Herbst 2024 wird von Umberto Echo live abgemischt und verspricht ein Fest f√ºr Audiophile wie Tanzw√ºtige gleicherma√üen zu werden. Als G√§ste am Keyboard werden abwechselnd Friedrich Paravicini und Yannis Anft mit dabei sein.

Umberto Echo: Nach Remixen f√ºr Abdullah Ibrahim Anfang der Nullerjahre geht es f√ºr den M√ºnchner Sound Professor dubbend um den Globus. Es entstehen zwei weltmusikalische Dub-Jazz Alben f√ºr das renommierte Label Enja Records mit Jojo Mayer, Josh Roseman, Peter Apfelbaum, Barney McAll, Jean-Louis Matinier, Justin Brown, Ambrose Akinmusire und vielen weiteren Mitstreitern. 2010 erscheint ‚ÄûDub The World‚Äú auf dem Echo Beach Label mit UE-Remixen von Sly&Robbie, Gentleman, Seeed, Steel Pulse feat. Damien Marley, Stereo MCs etc. Zwischen den eigenen Projekten schraubte Umberto an √ºber 300 Alben f√ºr K√ºnstler wie Quadro Nuevo, Jazzrausch Bigband, Silvan Strauss, Lisa Wulff, Dub Inc, Sara Lugo, Dub Spencer & Trance Hill und Produktionen f√ºr sein eigenes Reggae Label Oneness Records mit S√§ngern wie Alborosie, Junior Kelly, Sizzla, Capleton, Luciano. Um ab und zu an die frische Luft zu kommen hat Mr. Echo seit 1999 √ºber 1500 Livekonzerte gemischt.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: David Paris

For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. lineup: COMA
information:
Due to acoustic construction work in arkaoda, we need to postpone this concert to December 4th. We apologize for this change!
All purchased tickets stay valid for December show or can be returned. We hope to see you in December. 






Cologne-based electronic pop duo COMA, aka Marius Bubat and Georg Conrad, are back with a new single and tour dates for next year.

The world is getting colder, but COMA are bringing some warmth into our lives. COMA's melodic innovations between indie and electronica have always been incredibly accessible, unafraid of neither hooks nor emotions, and expanding the scope of what club music can be from album to album. ‚ÄúThe Same‚Äù is therefore the next logical step - away from the dancefloor, closer to life. 

COMA fuse dance music with an indie sensibility rich in melody and melancholy. They may have their roots firmly planted in Cologne's legendary club scene, but their effervescent, groovy synth-pop blurs the boundaries and pushes far beyond. After a series of releases on Kompakt Records, Marius Bubat and Georg Conrad released their latest album "Voyage Voyage" on City Slang in 2019. The album featured songs with verse, bridge and chorus - a first for COMA, and yet: it pulsated and immediately captivated the listener. The new song structures are also firmly rooted in club culture. After the album and the successful single "A Train", further singles followed, including the hit "Start/Stop/Rewind" (2022) and "Beyond You and Me" with Dillon (2022).

event_name: THE CASSANDRA COMPLEX - CX40 TOUR // Urban Spree, BERLIN
lineup: The Cassandra Complex LIVE, SJ√ñBLOM LIVE
information:
Legendary post-punk group The Cassandra Complex will celebrate their 40 year anniversary with an extensive world tour spanning Europe and the Americas.
Originating in the mid-eighties, The Cassandra Complex swiftly garnered attention for their distinct fusion of electronics, post-punk aesthetics, guitar-driven soundscapes, and the commanding vocals of Rodney Orpheus. Tracks such as "Moscow Idaho," "One Millionth Happy Customer," and "The War Against Sleep" catapulted them to fame across Europe. Extensive tours solidified their position as one of the foremost post-punk bands of their time.
Rodney Orpheus has also worked in the field of music technology helping to create and promote much of the tech that musicians around the world use today, particularly VST (Virtual Studio Technology) which revolutionized the music industry. He has worked with artists as diverse as Kevin Godley (10cc, Godley & Creme), Sinead O‚ÄôConnor, The Sisters of Mercy, Die Krupps, and Future Sound of London.

lineup: MonoNeon (MonoNeon/US) *live*
information:
Dywane Thomas, Jr., aka MonoNeon, ist ein Bassist und experimenteller Musiker aus Memphis, Tennessee. Der musikalische Hintergrund des Autodidakten ist stark von Southern Soul, Blues und Funk beeinflusst. Sein Bassspiel findet sich in Aufnahmen von Mac Miller und Jacob Collier, seine Mitwirkung am 2020er Nas-Studioalbum "King's Disease" brachte ihm einen Grammy ein, er spielte mit Ghost-Note ‚Äìdem Funk-Jazz-Spin off von Snarky Puppy- und war einer der letzten Bassisten von Funk-Gro√ümeister Prince. Flea von den Red Hot Chili Peppers bezeichnete ihn als "the greatest fucking electric bass player". MonoNeon ver√∂ffentlicht st√§ndig eigene Musik, einen Song nach dem anderen, ein Album nach dem anderen, und alles was er macht, ist gro√üartig.

Orientiert an der √§sthetischen Moderne des 20. Jahrhunderts, beeinflusst von der klassischen Avantgarde eines John Cage und den Readymades von Marcel Duchamp, ist nicht nur seine Musik avantgardistisch. MonoNeon erschafft sich selbst als Kunstwerk. Mit extravaganter Kleidung, geh√§kelten Masken, schrillen Brillen und mit einem ebenfalls kost√ºmierten Instrument erscheint er beinahe als Pop-Art Comicfigur. Bei Fender gibt‚Äôs inzwischen sogar eine exklusive MonoNeon Kollektion, dazu geh√∂rt auch der MonoNeon Jazz Bass V Signature.

Manche K√ºnstler‚Äôinnen erstarren hinter ihren Alter Egos, Masken und Inszenierungen, andere befreien sich. MonoNeon, das l√§sst sich mit Sicherheit sagen, hat sich f√ºr die Freiheit entschieden und besitzt einen ausgezeichneten Humor, der sich auch musikalisch ausdr√ºckt. Wer MonoNeon noch nicht kennt, sollte sich seinen YouTube Kanal ansehen. Hier ist jedes Video ein Manifest, alles wird Funk. 

"Write your own vision and read it". ‚Äì MonoNeon

"Natural limitations don't seem to apply to MonoNeon, aka Dywane Thomas Jr." - NPR

"When FLEA refers to you as ‚Äúthe greatest fucking electric bass player,‚Äù you know you‚Äôve done something right." - Rolling Stone

Photo: Kii Arens

______________________________________

‚´∏ English

‚´∏‚´∏ ABOUT FOUR PLAY ‚´∏‚´∏
Imagine a party in which you're not just moving your feet on the dance floor. Imagine a place full of color and fantasy, in which you are welcomed to take part in the action.
In 2016, the Four Play project was born in order to breach the all-too-serious walls of those days' Berlin kinky and fetish scenes, and to allow the young and the inexperienced to experiment with many aspects of the kinky lifestyle and their own sexuality.
In the mean, Four Play has become one of Berlin‚Äôs most beautiful sex-positive and kinky parties, offering not just an uncompromising musical lineup, but also an incredibly rich program of performances and workshops, all designed for our guests to interact and become an active part of the night.

‚´∏‚´∏ WHAT TO EXPECT ‚´∏‚´∏
‚ñª High-end Techno journey on the Main Floor, happy modern interpretations of House music in the Dragon Floor, and Downtempo to Soft-Tech in the basement.

lineup: Alessandro Cortini + Agnese Menguzzato
information:
silent green presents:

Alessandro Cortini is an Italian musician, producer, composer, and instrument builder. Cortini is one of the foremost figures of contemporary electronic music, best known for his haunting, atmospheric work. Alongside being a longstanding member of Nine Inch Nails, he is highly prolific and has released a steady stream of his own heady music on luminary labels including Mute, Hospital, and Important Records for the past decade. Throughout his shadowy rise to fame, he has collaborated with the likes of Lawrence English, Daniel Avery and Merzbow (to name a few). Balancing dark ambience with smokey, pulsing rhythms, his compositions are perfectly restrained, textured and mesmeric. Cortini was inducted into the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame in 2020 through his work with Nine Inch Nails, making history as the only Italian musician to have ever been honored with this recognition. 

Agnese Menguzzato is a Berlin-based composer and musician. Based on her training in violin and Renaissance lute, she has forged her own musical path by playing at the interface between past and present sounds, often utilizing the tonal potential of the lute.

Innovation meets tradition, precision meets rawness, techno meets ballet.

Forget everything you ever thought you knew about ballet and let yourself be seduced anew in "A Techno Ballet Odyssey." 

Well-known Berlin techno DJs, Belgrade techno DJ Marko Nastiƒá, and the Berlin Ballet Company collaborate in this techno-party-performance and will jointly rock Kraftwerk.

Start the evening with a pre-show party featuring renowned Berlin DJs. Then, experience a contemporary ballet performance about an individual's odyssey-like search for self and new paths. The show takes place in the heart of the audience, fueled by the sounds of DJ Marko Nastiƒá.

After the performance, Kraftwerk will stay open for another two hours. Enjoy more live techno music, drinks, street food, and of course, lots of dancing, so don‚Äôt plan to go home too early. ;)

Come and join us whenever you like and feel free to stay until midnight when the Tresor next door opens its doors. There‚Äôs only one rule: don‚Äôt ever stand still!

information:
It‚Äôs time to celebrate and let your inner Berlin Party Bear loose as Berliner.Party marks its first incredible year! Over the past twelve months, we've built a vibrant community of party-goers, united by our love for Berlin's electrifying nightlife. From our humble beginnings to becoming a beacon for Berlin's clubbing scene, we've achieved so much together. Join us for this milestone celebration where the music will soar, the energy will pulse, and we‚Äôll reminisce about the nights that turned into mornings. Get ready to dance, as we have a fantastic lineup of top-notch local DJs and plenty of surprises in store.

As the beats drop and the night unfolds, experience the true spirit of Berlin techno with us. We are curating a selection of Berlin's finest DJs, whose tracks resonate with the soul of the city and embody the rhythmic heartbeat of our culture. This night is not just a party; it‚Äôs a tribute to the techno roots that have shaped our community. From the first record spin to the last echo, each moment promises to be a burst of joy and unity on the dance floor.

And because we believe in making every celebration special, the first 100 visitors will receive exclusive goodie bags packed with treats that echo our love for Berlin's nightlife. These bags are not just gifts; they are tokens of appreciation to our community for their vibrant energy and support. Whether you're a seasoned Berliner or a new friend just joining the fray, this party is where memories will be made. Don‚Äôt miss out on this night of celebration, music, and unity‚Äîcome and party like a true Berliner!

lineup: @L Imp√©ratrice
information:
The French sound tinkerers around pianist Charles de Boisseguin and singer Flore Benguigui have finally returned with a new single called "Me Da Igual" - their first release this year. And there they are again: the elegance, the style, the French chic or even the grandeur that characterize L'Imp√©ratrice. 

There are even rumors that the band members have a disco ball spinning in the glow of the spotlights where their hearts usually beat, but these are just rumors. The fact is: After the strong album "Tako Tsubo" from 2021, "Me Da Igual" manages a nice balancing act between the sound DNA of L'Imp√©ratrice and new ideas. The track is light and driving at the same time, a single relaxed dance between this unique groove, vintage synths and these strangely floating melodies. The band themselves say they want to make the intensity of the clubs and sleepless nights palpable, to feel the strobes and disco balls, to create night images that are forever imprinted on the body and mind. 
 
This year, L'Imp√©ratrice will finally release a new album, which will also include "Me Da Igual". They will present it to their fans at an exclusive, sold-out residency in Berlin in March - performances in which art and music will merge with each other as a matter of course. They will then return at the end of the year to continue their tour in other cities.

lineup: Organza Ray, , Eleni Poulou ‚Äì synthesizer, voice, Hilary Jeffery ‚Äì trombone, electronics, , Brique, , Bianca Iannuzzi ‚Äì voice, Eve Risser ‚Äì piano, Luc Ex ‚Äì Bass, Francesco Pastacaldi ‚Äì drums
information:
Organza Ray are Hilary Jeffery and Eleni Poulou, working together since spring 2022. Early improvised soundtracks to spontaneous storytelling have transformed into future folk songs. Their work includes collaborations with many other musicians and artists, live and in the studio, connecting pathways of knowledge through sound. Their primary form of artistic practice is a form of musical conversation which they have evolved together and with others over the past two years. Their music is contemporary in the real sense in that it connects to many different styles and forms of music. Both Hilary Jeffery and Eleni Poulou have an immense experience of playing music in many contexts from new music to rock, improvised music to art installations. This broad palette provides a deep creative source which they crystallise into their own distinct and recognisable music.

Born out of a long-standing collaboration between four improvising musicians, Brique plays with construction and deconstruction like a post-punk Russian doll, toying with the codes of song format. Shamelessly fusing multiple influences, from rap to romanticism, classical harmonies and lyrical flights to hammered lyrics, the accident is never far away, often throwing the writing into disarray.
The cut-up, the practice of collage in writing, gives the vocals a punchy character while the instruments are ready to pounce at any moment. While each track has its own colour, the whole repertoire is united by the slightly overflowing energy and exaggerated expressionism of the performers. 

Supported by Berlin Senate Department for Culture and Social Cohesion.

we are very happy to host Le√¶ther Strip once again for an intimate extended club show at Urban Spree and are looking forward to the pogo mob!

does he really need an introduction?

well.. here you go:

LEAETHER STRIP is the solo-project of the legendary Danish electronic industrial artist Claus Larsen. First signed by the German Electro Label Zoth Ommog in 1989, LEAETHER STRIP quickly built a buzz as one of the most exciting emerging acts in Europe in the early 90's. LEAETHER STRIP has been and still is a big inspiration to many of todays younger acts and is still one of the most productive and most busy live acts in the scene. LEAETHER STRIP concerts are very uptempo and energetic, and he plays lots of his classic hits like "Strap me down", "Dont tame your soul" and so many more. First release 1989. "Japanese Bodies", and over 30 + albums has been released since then. LEAETHER STRIP perfomances are known worldwide for their massive industrial energy and powerful stage presence.

lineup: @Bad request , @Reebone
information:
Welcome to the Hottest Kinky Throwback party in Berlin !

Join us for a party where we're turning back time to the glorious 90's-00's era.
It's a night of pure nostalgia, freedom, and self-expression!
Get ready to dance like no one is watching because we're bringing you not one, but TWO dance floors of non-stop beats!

Main Dance Floor: Spice up your life!
Get ready to move and groove to the unforgettable Hip hop & pop hits, Euro trash, pulse-pounding beats that defined an era. This dance floor is where the magic happens, and we want to see you own it!

Second Dance Floor: Rock Your Body right!
For those who crave the raw energy of rock, metal, grunge, and indie vibes, our second dance floor is where you'll want to be. Let loose, head bang and embrace the rebellious spirit of the 90's and 00's.

Be Yourself - All Genders & Orientations are Welcome
No matter who you are or who you love, you're welcome here!

Consent is Sexy - No Means No!
Respect is our golden rule. Remember, consent is not just essential; it's downright sexy!
No means no! and we're here to ensure everyone feels safe and respected. If you're looking to take things up a notch on the dance floor or beyond, just remember to ask first. Seeking consent is the key to keeping the party vibe consensual and the night unforgettable!

Unicorn Awareness Team
Our Unicorn Awareness Team is here for you! If you need assistance, have questions, or just want to chat with someone, look for our friendly Unicorn team members - they have LED horns.

Welcome Shots, Candies, Play Areas & Whirlpool
Start the night with greetings & welcome shots at the entrance (between 22:00-00:00), enjoy the candies, explore playful areas designed for grown-up fun, and take a fun dip in the whirlpool.

Dress to Impress: Colorful, Icons, Kinky, Sexy, Neon
Do your most daring and dazzling outfits inspired by the vibrant 90s-00s era. Think colorful, channel your favorite icons, embrace the kinky and the sexy or shine bright in neon! Let your wardrobe be as bold as your dance moves.

Capture the Moment!
If you'd like to capture memories from this night, our photographer will be there for that, you can ask them to take a photo of you. The photographer will only capture photos after you have given your consent; no photos will be taken without consent.

Get ready for a night of liberation, self-expression and pure unadulterated fun.
Flashback Friday is the place to be! we can't wait to celebrate with you!

address: Im U-Bhf. Schlesisches Tor; 10997 Berlin; Germany
lineup: Komfortrauschen
information: Forget what you think you know about live techno. Forget drum machines. Forget laptops. Forget pre-made loops. Komfortrauschen is a live band that looks and sounds like no other. The German trio brings mechanical rhythm, acid guitars and thundering bass with the precision of a German factory but the hedonism of a Berlin basement. There is nothing polite or organic about what they do. A Komfortrauschen show is full of raw, pure and unadulterated techno energy that is designed to make you sweat.

lineup: Tba
information:
"Kinky Alternative" ‚Äì The Party for Everyone Who Seeks Something Special!

Do you love expressing yourself freely in a sex-positive, kinky atmosphere, but you're tired of the same old techno and electro music at most parties? Then "Kinky Alternative" is the perfect place for you!

Expect a unique mix of independent and alternative music that perfectly matches a night filled with desire, freedom, and self-expression. From indie rock to alternative beats and powerful guitar riffs ‚Äì here, the music takes center stage, bringing an energy that truly moves you and fills the space with something special.

"Kinky Alternative" is more than just a party ‚Äì it's a place where like-minded people come together to live out their fantasies in a safe, respectful, and creative environment. Whether you're a beginner or experienced, you're welcome to be exactly who you are with us.

Let the unique vibe and diverse sounds sweep you away for a night unlike anything you've ever experienced. Here, kink meets indie, and alternative celebrates its wild side ‚Äì and you're right in the middle of it!

Get ready for a night you won't forget anytime soon.

**"Kinky Alternative"** ‚Äì for those who love it differently.

Get ready for another intense midweek session for Berlin's most dangerous day of the week to rave - WEDNESDAY Lose yourself at AVA Club in the heart of Berlin - underneath the Train Tracks of Warschauer Str S-Bahn Station. This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night. And since there‚Äôs no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It‚Äôs Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,  

Komm in deinem besten Techno-Outfit oder einfach so, wie du dich am wohlsten f√ºhlst. Das Wichtigste ist, dass du bereit bist, die Nacht zu erleben und dich der Musik hinzugeben. Der Techno Mittwoch ist eine Feier der TECHNO Kultur, die die Grenzen des M√∂glichen √ºberschreitet. Es ist eine Einladung, in eine Welt einzutauchen, in der die Zeit stillsteht und die Musik regiert. Sichere dir jetzt deine Tickets und sei Teil dieser elektrisierenden Nacht! Lass den Alltag hinter dir und tauche ein in die Welt des Techno. Wir sehen uns auf der Tanzfl√§che!  

YOLO! DON'T FORGET: ARRIVE BEFORE MIDNIGHT, EACH TICKET HOLDER IS ELIGIBLE TO BRING ONE FREE GUEST!    

No Sexism, No Racism, No Homophobia.

lineup: Alexander Kowalski¬†, Any Mello¬†, Michael Klein, Vani Vachi¬†, , Anna Schreit, Babxi, Caren Callas
information:
‚ñÜ  About the Expeditions
The Expeditions series was founded in spring 2018 with a clear vision of breaking out of the monotony that defines most pure Techno nights in Berlin. The concept is to create a clear musical distinction between the different parts of the night, while remaining loyal to the classical and traditional aspects of Techno: from Detroit groove to hypnotic and atmospheric storytelling. We emphasize energy and progression. We strive to create a clear beginning and a decisive end. We believe in Techno as a journey, designed for the dance floor, rather than for podcasts. Following this principle, we curate the second floor with classic, warm, chord-led interpretations of House music, that serve as a perfect contrast to the main floor program. Occasionally, you might even find a third floor hidden in the vast garden of :// about blank. Explore, that's what the Expeditions is about.

‚ñÜ  What to expect
‚¶ø A Power Deck with well curated interpretations of pure Techno music. No minimalism, no sophisticated preaching. 
‚¶ø A Comfort Deck with a contrasting program, curated with the finest House music: classic Chicago House, Soulful and New York Garage, and Berlin contemporary touches.
‚¶ø DJs at eye level, musically educated audience and Berlin underground at its best. 

‚ñÜ FAQ
 ‚¶ø Is there a dress-code? - No, the Expeditions doesn't have a dress code, but we do encourage you to be creative when choosing an outfit for the party., and to leave your everyday behind.
‚¶ø Is taking photos inside the club allowed?
- No. The Expeditions, and :// about blank have a strict no-photo policy. We also strongly encourage you to check in your phone at the cloakroom and lose the feeling of time. This is, however, not mandatory.‚¶ø Is the Expeditions a safe space for minority groups?
- The Expeditions, and :// about blank in general, are a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism, antisemitism, or homophobia will not be tolerated. In addition, you are requested to familiarize yourself with the principles of consent, and to respect the personal space of any fellow guest. In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our staff at the entrance immediately.

information:
ALL-INCLUSIVE NEW YEAR'S EVE CELEBRATION IN A HISTORIC SETTING WITH HIDDEN BUNKERS AND BREATHTAKING HALLS - AN UNFORGETTABLE EXPERIENCE FOR YOU!
Welcome the year 2025 with us in an exclusive location, normally reserved for film shoots and photo shoots. Bring your loved ones and friends and experience the turn of the year in a unique setting, accompanied by fascinating video visuals.
At midnight, you can experience the spectacular fireworks at Alexanderplatz up close from both Volkspark Friedrichshain and Greifswalderstra√üe.

Immerse yourself in a captivating journey through the world of visual video art and be enchanted by the surrounding ambient music. The magnificent columned hall will be transformed into a lovingly designed gallery lounge to offer you an unrivalled experience.

Live pianist

You can also look forward to refreshing premium spirits. To satisfy your appetite, we have prepared a selection of delicious finger food, tasty canap√©s and tempting pastries. And at the turn of the year, delicious pancakes await you in the Berlin tradition - with a little twist: mustard for every 100th guest ;) Please note: The finger food should not be confused with extensive catering, but rather serves as a tasty addition.

information:
Der Hamburger Produzent und Schlagzeuger Silvan Strauss ist eine Ausnahmeerscheinung und ein herausragender Vertreter einer neuen Generation, die sich m√ºhelos zwischen Jazz und urbaner zeitgen√∂ssischer Musik bewegt. Jazz, Hip-Hop und Beatmaking flie√üen bei ihm wie selbstverst√§ndlich ineinander und verschmelzen zu einem unverwechselbaren Stil. Wer seine Videos gesehen hat, in denen er schwingende Mikrofone und kippende Milchk√§nnchen in seine improvisierten Drumsets integriert, wei√ü, mit welcher Begeisterung er bei der Sache ist.

In Kempten geboren wuchs er mit deutschen Radio-Bigbands, Punkrock und Hip-Hop-Alben aus der goldenen √Ñra auf, spielte schon als Kind auf allem Schlagzeug, was er in die Finger bekam und wirkte im Bayerischen Landesjugendjazzorchester mit. Zwischen den Proben produzierte er eigene Beats, wechselte zwischen Punk- und Hip-Hop-Bands, und studierte schlie√ülich an der Hamburger Musikhochschule. Sein Eintauchen in Hamburgs Livemusikszene brachte ihm 2021 den Hamburger Jazzpreis ein.

In den letzten Jahren arbeitete er mit Gr√∂√üen wie Maria Jo√£o, Soweto Kinch, Omer Klein, Guinga, Farhot, Jazzrausch Bigband und Till Br√∂nner zusammen. Den immensen Input aus all den verschiedenen Kollaborationen l√§sst Strauss in das Projekt Toytoy einflie√üen, wo er produziert und eng mit seinen Bandkollegen an einer Vision von experimenteller Groove-Musik arbeitet.

Strauss ver√∂ffentlicht seine eigene Musik bei Kabul Fire Records, wo er die organische und analoge Seite des Beatmakings repr√§sentiert. Ende 2024 wird er sein zweites Studioalbum FLUKIN‚Äò mit beeindruckenden Gastauftritten wie Oscar#Worldpeace, Salomea, Joe Armon-Jones, Farhot oder Mehdi Qamoum ver√∂ffentlichen.

 

Reuben James, Singer-Songwriter und Pianist aus Birmingham, bewegt sich zwischen Soul, Funk, Jazz, R‚Äôn‚ÄôB, Hip-Hop und mehr. Der oft √ºberstrapazierte Begriff ‚ÄúEklektisch‚Äú trifft in seinem Fall durchaus zu, so frei flie√üt seine Musik zwischen den Genres, so anspielungsreich und gehaltvoll sind seine Improvisationen, so gekonnt lotet er die Grenzen zwischen Jazz und Popaffinit√§t aus. Nicht zuletzt deshalb, aber auch wegen seiner virtuosen Jazztechniken und seiner einf√ºhlsamen Stimme geh√∂rt er zu den spannendsten und kreativsten K√ºnstler*innen der letzten Jahre.

Bevor er 2019 mit seiner ersten EP ‚ÄúAdore‚Äú und seinem Deb√ºtalbum ‚ÄúChampagne Kisses‚Äú (2023) solo f√ºr Furore sorgte, hat er sich seine bunte Klangpalette in jahrelangen Kollaborationen erarbeitet. Im Elternhaus von Blues, Jazz und Gospel inspiriert, spielte er bereits mit 17 Jahren im Quartett des Trompeters Abram Wilson. Sein Stipendium am renommierten Trinity College of Music in London brach er gegen den Rat seiner Eltern vorzeitig ab, um stattdessen lieber mit Sam Smith auf Tour zu gehen, der seiner Meinung nach damals vor dem Durchbruch stand. Reines Bauchgef√ºhl und er lag goldrichtig damit. Er begleitete Sam Smith nicht nur auf seinen Tourneen, sondern schrieb auch an dessen Erfolgsalbum ‚ÄúThe Thrill Of It All‚Äú (2017) mit und arbeitete mit Musiker*innen aus den unterschiedlichsten musikalischen Welten zusammen, darunter Joni Mitchell, Stormzy, Bonnie Raitt, Herbie Hancock, Elton John und Disclosure.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photos: Silvan Strauss: Emerged Agency / Reuben James: Zac Mahrouche.
__________________________________


For this event we offer discounted tickets to give people with less money still access to culture. These quotas are limited and only available at TixforGigs. We trust in your self-assessment: If you can, please book standard tickets and leave the reduced tickets to those who have to save money at the moment.

information:
Oscar ‚ÄòSholto‚Äò Robertson ist ein Schlagzeuger, Instrumentalist, Produzent und Komponist aus London. Aufgewachsen mit einer Liebe f√ºr Jazz, Soul, Kraut und Soundtracks der 60er und 70er Jahre, dr√ºckt seine Musik eine warme Palette von Farben, analogen instrumentalen Grooves und euphorischer Sentimentalit√§t aus. Ende letzten Jahres pr√§sentierte er seine Deb√ºt-EP ‚ÄûThe Changing Tides Of Dreams‚Äú.

Inspiriert von Soundtrack-Komponisten der 1950er bis 1970er Jahre wie Piero Umiliani und David Axelrod, bezieht sich ‚ÄûThe Changing Tides Of Dreams‚Äú auf die Art und Weise, wie sich unser Leben und unser Selbst st√§ndig ver√§ndern, lernen und wachsen, ohne jemals vollst√§ndig geformt oder zufrieden zu sein. Das Projekt, das w√§hrend einer Zeit der pers√∂nlichen Transformation von Sholto geschrieben wurde, verbindet unverf√§lschte √§therische Texturen mit einem tiefen Gef√ºhl von Nostalgie und Sehnsucht, indem es auf Disziplinen aus der Welt des Films und der klassischen Musik sowie auf Jazz und experimentelle Arrangementtechniken zur√ºckgreift. 

Seine Musikkarriere begann 2013, als ihn ein Plattenvertrag nach LA f√ºhrte und er mit Produzenten wie Nick Waterhouse (Allah-Las) zusammenarbeitete, bevor er nach Gro√übritannien zur√ºckkehrte und mit Leuten wie Inflo (Cleo Sol) und Dan Carey (Wet Leg, Squid) zusammenarbeitete. Er ist auch die eine H√§lfte des Produktionsduos Sunglasses For Jaws. Sholto wird au√üerdem von Gr√∂√üen wie Gilles Peterson, Deb Grant, Jyoty und Tony Minvielle unterst√ºtzt.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. information:
NORLYZ: Handmade Electronic Dance-Jazz

Die elektroakustische Live-Band verbindet die W√§rme und Fragilit√§t akustischer Instrumente mit der Pr√§zision und Energie elektronischer Musik: tanzbar und nuanciert zugleich, inspiriert von Techno, Weltmusik und Jazz. Die facettenreichen Arrangements lassen Raum f√ºr Improvisation und nehmen das Publikum mit auf eine Reise durch Parallelwelten, mystische Orte und cineastische Klangdimensionen.

Im Jahr 2022 ver√∂ffentlichten sie ihr Deb√ºtalbum ‚ÄúFirst Dawn On Planet B.‚Äù. Auf ihrem eigenen Label NORLYZ Music sowie auf 3000Grad Records und Best Works sind eine Reihe von Singles, Trailern und Live-Videos erschienen, darunter Remixe von Andr√© Lodemann, JPattersson und Mollono.Bass. Seit ihrer Gr√ºndung spielte die Band u.a. auf der Fusion und Festivals wie Detect Classic, Elbjazz und 3000Grad sowie zahlreiche Clubshows.

Paul David Heckhausen ist als Gr√ºnder, Produzent, Komponist und Live-Musiker die treibende Kraft hinter NORLYZ. Der Schlagzeuger und Pianist kommt aus der Rock- und Jazzmusik und studierte Komposition und Musikproduktion in den Niederlanden. Um elektronische und akustische Musik zu verbinden, gr√ºndete er das Projekt ‚ÄúSchattenspiel‚Äù, aus dem NORLYZ mit neuer Besetzung und neuem Sound hervorging.

Der ungarische Cellist G√°bor Harty√°ni war bereits 2019 bei Schattenspiel involviert und hat eine Vorliebe f√ºr Groove, Weltmusik und Jazz.

Der Trompeter Philipp P√ºschel und der Saxophonist Lasse Golz haben sich w√§hrend ihres Jazzstudiums in Hamburg kennengelernt. Sie spielen unter anderem in der Space-Jazz-Band ROCKET MEN und regelm√§√üig mit der Techno-Marching-Band MEUTE.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Lukas von Loeper.

___________________________________________


NORLYZ: Handmade Electronic Dance-Jazz

The electro-acoustic live band unites the warmth and fragility of acoustic instruments with the precision and power of the electronics: captivating grooves rich in fine sonic details, inspired by techno, world music and jazz. Guiding the audience NORLYZ embarks on a journey through parallel worlds, mystical lands and cinematic soundscapes. While following an intricate dramaturgy, the project leaves space for creative improvisation between the 4 musicians aiming to elevate each other and the overall experience.

Since their start as NORLYZ in June 2022, the band has played several shows, including Fusion, Detect Classic, Elbjazz and 3000Grad Festival, as well as club shows at Sisyphos Berlin and Knust Hamburg, among others. On November 18, 2022, the band released their debut album "First Dawn On Planet B.", which is also available as a limited double vinyl since June 2, 2023. In addition, a number of singles, trailers and live videos were released: via their own label NORLYZ Music, 3000Grad Records and Best Works Records including remixes by Andr√© Lodemann, JPattersson and Mollono.Bass.

Just as multifaceted as the music are the backgrounds of the 4 musicians: Paul David Heckhausen as founder, producer, composer and live musician is the driving force of NORLYZ. As a drummer and pianist he comes from rock and jazz music, traveled and drummed for a year in Brazil and finally studied composition and music production in the Netherlands. After a phase as a DJ, he followed up on his urge to play more live again and to combine electronic with acoustic music. So he founded Schattenspiel, the predecessor project which is known today in a new line-up as NORLYZ.

Cellist G√°bor Harty√°ni comes from Hungary, lived and studied in the Netherlands, and has a penchant for groove, world music and jazz. He has been playing with Schattenspiel since 2019.

Trumpeter Philipp P√ºschel and saxophonist Lasse Golz met while studying jazz in Hamburg. The two play together with Paul in the space jazz band ROCKET MEN, among others, as well as regularly with the techno marching band MEUTE. Philipp and Paul know each other from their time together in a big band in Hannover.

New line-up, new music, new visual identity, and a brand new live show. Following the success of the album ‚ÄúPlay This at My Funerals‚Äù and a sold-out tour across Europe, Kadebostany is ready to embark on its 2025 tour.

Under the flag of the conceptual Republic of Kadebostany, Kadebostany rapidly captured attention far and wide with its singular brand of pop music, unique visual identity, and colossal live performances. Kadebostany‚Äôs songs cumulates over 1 billion streams on Youtube, has dominated the charts in over 30 countries, they performed over 700 live shows in more than 25 countries the latest years, and have been praised by international press such as Vice, GQ, Spin, American Songwriter, CNN, Rolling Stone, Vogue, MixMag, EDM.com, Run The Trap, Time Out, Marie Claire, and more.

Kadebostany draws a modern vision of pop music, best described by its leader as ‚Äúsophisticated music with mass appeal‚Äù.

lineup: Beardyman (Sunday Best/UK) *live*
information:
Die BBC nennt ihn ‚ÄûKing of Sound, Ruler of Beats‚Äú, und das ist keine Untertreibung. Er ist zweifacher UK Beatbox Champion, MC, b√ºhnenpr√§senter Comedian, begnadeter Improvisator, Produzent und Pionier des Live-Loopings. Wer ihn einmal live gesehen hat, wird dieses Spektakel nie vergessen.

Bekannt wurde der Brite Darren Foreman vor allem durch seine einzigartigen Live-Sets. Dort lotet er die Grenzen des Human Beatboxing aus, indem er alle Sounds live erzeugt, sie gleichzeitig durch Loop- und Effektger√§te jagt und daraus komplette Songs entstehen l√§sst. Sein Werkzeug: Mund, Nase, Rachen - Ger√§uschimitationen und Stimmeffekte in perfekter Abstimmung. Um Spontaneit√§t und Kreativit√§t nicht an der Technik scheitern zu lassen, hat er mit Beardytron das weltweit wohl umfangreichste und freieste Live-Produktionssystem aller Zeiten entwickelt, um seine Echtzeit-Workflows und Live-Improvisationen auf der B√ºhne in Studioqualit√§t produzieren zu k√∂nnen.

Ber√ºhmtheit erlangte er auch als beatboxende Super-Hausfrau in ‚ÄûKitchen Diaries‚Äù auf YouTube. Der Clip ist etwas √§lter, aber immer wieder f√ºr ein Revival gut. Sensationell war seine Show ‚ÄúOne Album per Hour‚Äú, bei der er live auf der B√ºhne aus vom Publikum erfundenen Songtiteln ein brandneues Album kreierte. Sein Deb√ºtalbum nannte er kurzerhand selbstironisch ‚ÄûI Done A Album‚Äù. Darauf versammelt: Ein unfassbares Spektrum disparater Tracks aus schr√§gen Electronica-Experimenten, die sich von Dubstep √ºber Funk und Drum‚Äôn‚ÄôBass bis hin zu psychedelischem Dub in alle Gefilde vorwagten.

Was Beardyman auf der B√ºhne macht, ist f√ºr Uneingeweihte nur schwer zu erkl√§ren - man muss es erleben. Er ist mehr als ein Musiker oder MC, er ist ein Wanderer zwischen den Welten des Hip-Hop, der Aktionskunst und der Comedy. Seine bisherigen Auftritte im Gretchen sind unvergesslich. Wir sind gespannt auf die neuen √úberraschungen des Beatbox-Meisters.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Emerged Agency

_____________________________________


Of all the beatboxing personalities, there is still only one who sets the tone, and that is Beardyman. He is a two-time UK beatboxing champion, an MC, a stage-present comedian, a producer and a gifted live improviser.

The Briton Darren Foreman is particularly known for his unique live sets at festivals such as Glastonbury, Sonar, Reading and Roskilde. He explores the boundaries of human beatboxing - mostly improvised - by creating all sounds live and simultaneously chasing them through four Korg Kaoss Pads loop and effect devices to create complete songs. His tools: mouth, nose, throat - sound imitations and voice effects in perfect harmony.

He gained fame especially as a beatboxing super housewife in "Kitchen Diaries" on the internet. He unceremoniously titled his debut album with the self-deprecating "I Done A Album". Gathered on it: An unfathomable spectrum of disparate tracks from weird electronic experiments, Balkan dubstep and world music flair to township funk, drum'n'bass, psychedelic dub and IDM.

His past performances at Gretchen are unforgettable, especially because Beardyman places a high value on improvisation. We look forward to the latest surprises from the beatbox master.

Achtung Menschen! Hier ist HENGE.
Wir sind nicht von dieser Welt.
Wir bringen euch Musik von fernen Planeten.
Wir bieten dieses Geschenk zur Erbauung der Menschheit an... damit eure Spezies irgendwann dem Krieg ein Ende setzt und eine neue Heimat im Weltraum findet.

Die au√üerirdischen Spa√ümacher HENGE begeistern das Publikum in Gro√übritannien und Europa, seit sie vor neun Jahren auf dem Planeten Erde gelandet sind. Ihre schillernden Live-Auftritte brachten ihnen den Titel ‚ÄûBest Live Act‚Äú bei den Independent Festival Awards ein, und seitdem haben sie ihren Ruf mit drei hochgelobten Alben, zahlreichen Tourneen und regelm√§√üigen Auftritten auf den gro√üen Festivalb√ºhnen gefestigt.

Ihre Musik entzieht sich jeder Definition und bewegt sich in der Sph√§re zwischen Rave und Prog-Rock, von dem niemand wusste, dass sie existiert. Sie ist energiegeladen, subversiv und belebend spielerisch und betritt auf fr√∂hliche Weise Neuland. Letztendlich verbreiten diese unerschrockenen Kreaturen eine Botschaft der Hoffnung, die das Publikum am√ºsiert und aufmuntert.

Attention Humans! This is HENGE.
We are not from this world.
We bring you music from distant planets.
We offer this gift for the edification of humankind‚Ä¶ so that eventually your species may put an end to war and set up new homes in space.

Extra-terrestrial joymongers - HENGE - have been delighting audiences in the UK and Europe since they landed on Planet Earth nine years ago. Their scintillating live performances earned them ‚ÄòBest Live Act‚Äô at the Independent Festival Awards and they have since cemented their reputation with three acclaimed albums, numerous tours and regular main-stage festival appearances.

Their music escapes definition, but occupies a space between rave and prog rock that nobody knew existed. It is energetic, subversive and invigoratingly playful, jovially breaking new ground. Ultimately, these intrepid creatures are spreading a message of hope which leaves audiences feeling amused and uplifted in equal measures.

lineup: USA Nails, TV Cult
information:
Crunch Tapes presents:

USA Nails (UK / One Little Independent)

London noise rock quartet USA Nails released their new album ‚ÄòFeel Worse‚Äô on March 22nd 2024. The band have forged a considerable reputation since their formation in 2013 from their South London base, comprising of members of Kong, Future Of The Left, Blacklisters, Death Pedals and Silent Front. 

‚ÄòFeel Worse‚Äô explores schadenfreude ‚Äî the pleasure derived from another person's misfortune. With this, they use new material to attack austerity and UK authoritarianism, consumer culture (particularly the consumption of quick fix reality TV and hyper-capitalist agendas), youth culture and bullying, and more. They do so with their intense and unmistakable brand of abrasive, chaotic post-hardcore. There‚Äôs a raw and uncompromising energy to USA Nails, and ‚ÄòFeel Worse‚Äô is their most powerful and vital album to date. 

The band have toured with Sub Pop‚Äôs Metz and UK noise rock legends Mclusky. They have completed numerous US and European headline stints, as well as supporting the likes of Future Of The Left, Mission Of Burma, No Age, Cocaine Piss, Viagra Boys, Hey Colossus and Unsane.

‚ÄúA truly bracing racket‚Äù ‚Äì The Wire

‚ÄúSonic titans‚Äù ‚Äì The Quietus

‚ÄúPunishing brute force‚Äù ‚Äì Loud And Quiet


TV Cult (UK/DE)

TV Cult are an eighties inspired Post-Punk band from Cologne. With brooding and dominant bass lines, cold and frantic guitars, powerful drums, and vocals iterating between crooning goth and DC hardcore, TV Cult create a sound that is both reminiscent of bands like Joy Division, Black Flag and Idles; yet is truly unique.

lineup: Nubya Garcia¬†(Concord/Jazz Re:freshed/UK)
information:
Nubya Garcia kommt mit ihrem aktuellen Album ‚ÄúOdyssey‚Äú nach Berlin.

Nubya Garcia l√§sst sich nicht so leicht in eine Schublade stecken. Ist es Jazz? Sicher, die in London geborene Saxophonistin, Komponistin und Bandleaderin wuchs in diesem Genre auf und studierte bei der ber√ºhmten Jazzpianistin Nikki Yeoh. Doch wer ihre beiden Alben ‚ÄúSource‚Äú (2020) und jetzt ‚ÄúOdyssey‚Äú h√∂rt, entdeckt eine genre√ºbergreifende Kreativit√§t, die sich aus dem Wunsch speist, alles in allen Disziplinen zu machen und sich √ºber s√§mtliche Schubladen hinwegzusetzen.

Ihr gerade erschienenes Album ‚ÄúOdyssey‚Äú mischt orchestrale Arrangements mit R&B, Jazz, Broken Beat und Dub. Eine gro√üartige Platte, sehr pers√∂nlich und nuanciert, luftig und himmlisch, ohne den Groove zu vergessen.

Damit kn√ºpft sie nahtlos an den Vorg√§nger an. ‚ÄúSource‚Äú erschien beim renommierten Label Concord Jazz, wurde prompt f√ºr den renommierten Mercury Prize nominiert, von Pitchfork als ‚ÄûBest New Music‚Äú und vom Rolling Stone als ‚ÄûAlbum des Monats‚Äú ausgezeichnet und machte sie schlagartig international bekannt. Die New York Times beschrieb das Album als ‚Äûein mitrei√üendes Set aus Jazz mit afro-karibischen Einfl√ºssen, das die Erfahrungen eines ganzen Lebens in einer Stunde H√∂rgenuss b√ºndelt‚Äú.

Nubya Garcia geh√∂rt zu den Gr√ºndungsmitgliedern der Londoner Jazz-Szene, die das Genre modernisiert und einer j√ºngeren Generation zug√§nglich gemacht hat, indem sie die Jazztradition mit tanzbaren und clubtauglichen musikalischen Einfl√ºssen der britischen Jugendkultur verbindet.

Pr√§sentiert von: ByteFM & hhv
Photo: @ Emerged Agency

______________________________


Nubya Garcia is coming to Berlin with her brand new album "Odyssey".

Nubya Garcia isn‚Äôt an artist you can easily classify. Is it jazz? Sure, the London-born saxophonist, composer and bandleader grew up studying the genre under the noted pianist Nikki Yeoh at Camden Music. But it isn‚Äôt until you listen to albums like 2020‚Äôs Source and 2024‚Äôs Odyssey that you hear broader creativity shining through: It‚Äôs jazz, classical, dub, R&B and whatever else Garcia wants to convey. It all comes from a place of exploration and self-study, of wanting to do all the things across all disciplines while ignoring arbitrary boxes that don‚Äôt fit. Garcia‚Äôs sophomore album Odyssey, out in September 2024 via Concord Jazz, is a majestic feat on which she blends orchestral arrangements with R&B, jazz, broken beat and dub, resulting in a grand, nuanced record that feels airy and celestial without sacrificing the groove. It‚Äôs a deeply personal offering about her trek to falling back in love with musical composition over the past four years.

Source, her 2020 debut album, was released via Concord Jazz to massive critical acclaim, an NPR Tiny Desk (Home) Concert, a Pitchfork ‚ÄúBest New Music‚Äù review and a Rolling Stone ‚ÄúAlbum of the Month‚Äù mention. In a profile, The New York Times called Source ‚Äúa sweeping set of jazz with Afro-Caribbean influences that funnels a life‚Äôs worth of experiences into an hourlong listen.‚Äù Also upon release, the album entered the UK charts in the Top 30, and she was just one of three artists selected to perform live at Glastonbury‚Äôs 2020 Experience, which aired on the BBC to thousands of viewers. Source was also nominated for the Mercury Prize, a prestigious award given to the best albums from the UK or Ireland.

In 2022, Garcia toured the US in support of Khruangbin, performing in sold-out venues including Radio City Music Hall in New York, the Ryman in Nashville and the Met in Philadelphia. She then headlined her own tour in the UK and US, performing at various festivals including Glastonbury, Love Supreme, Pickathon and Newport Jazz.

Flash! Trip! Kick! Sich eine Dr√∂hnung Botticelli Baby live zu geben, hei√üt schwei√ünasses Haar, Muskelkater am n√§chsten Tag und Dauergrinsen in der Fresse! Wie bereitet man sich darauf vor? Gar nicht! Man kommt wie man ist und l√§sst die Sau raus!

Um dem wilden Sound das zu geben, was man als eine Mischung aus Jazz, Punk, Blues, Folk und Pop beschreiben muss, ben√∂tigt es genau sieben verschiedene ingredients. Und zwar in Gestalt von Musikern und in Form ihrer Instrumente!

Es ist ein Rausch, ein einziges Fest, wenn die Band auftritt. Die sieben Typen wirken wie fest zusammengef√ºgtes Material, unverw√ºstlich und doch extrem chaotisch. Jedes Instrument bringt seine individuelle St√§rke mit und schiebt den gesamten Karren damit auf Mission Ekstase auf irgendeinen fremden Planeten! Wo genau der ist, wei√ü man nach dem Konzert dann auch nicht mehr‚Ä¶

Und dann macht‚Äòs mit einem mal Peng! ‚Äì und es beginnt ein fruchtiges Klang-Chaos, das sich dann pl√∂tzlich zu einer Allianz zusammenschlie√üt und vor Kraft strotzend in die sowieso schon heruntergefallenen Kinnladen des ebenfalls schwei√ünassen Publikums geschleudert wird. Punktgenau, wie ein gezielter Golfschlag ins Loch. Klingt √ºbertrieben? Mag sein, aber wer das mitgemacht hat, wei√ü wovon hier die Rede ist!

Die Band vermag es, eine Art gesunden und lange vermissten Schmutz in die Jazzmusik zur√ºckzuf√ºhren. Und das Publikum reibt sich gerne damit ein ‚Äì und zwar von der Tschechischen Republik √ºber Deutschland bis nach Spanien! Bandintern und f√ºr das zweite Album namensgebend, nennen die Sieben ihren Sound √ºbrigens ‚ÄúJUNK‚Äù. Und ob man sich damit jetzt einreibt, es im Ganzen verschlingt oder sich mitten hineinwirft, ist einem selbst √ºberlassen ‚Äì ein Booster f√ºr das eingeschlafene Tanzbein ist es in jedem Fall!

lineup: Sammy Virji
information:
Breakthrough UK artist Sammy Virji has swiftly made his mark on the electronic music space, proving to be both a pioneer and innovator of the UKG renaissance. Over the last eight years, he‚Äôs crafted an ever-growing discography and unmissable live show which has propelled him to the forefront of the dance music space.The last 12 months have been nothing short of exceptional for Sammy following the release of his iconic single ‚ÄòShella Verse‚Äô with Flowdan and seeing unprecedented growth following his viral DJ Mag stream. Fresh off his sizzling new record ‚ÄòIf U Need It‚Äô and collaboration with Chris Lake ‚ÄòSummertime Blues‚Äô, the exponential growth of his fanbase shows no sign of slowing down and a great testament to several years of hard graft on the live circuit. Now, Sammy truly is one of the hottest artists in dance music as he continues to pioneer UKG to the wider world whilst also continuing his evolve his own sound with the signature Sammy production.

lineup: El Khat (Glitterbeat/YE/IL) *live*
information:
El Khat f√ºhren jemenitische Melodien auf selbstgebauten Instrumenten in eine funkig-psychedelische Zukunft und uns in ekstatisch begl√ºckende Trancezust√§nde.

El Khat, die in den Garagen und Lagerhallen von Jaffa gegr√ºndete und heute in Berlin ans√§ssige Band, ver√∂ffentlicht nach ‚ÄùSaadia Jefferson‚Äù (2019) und ‚ÄùAlbat Alawi Op.99‚Äù (2022) in diesem Jahr ihr drittes Album ‚ÄùMute‚Äù. Das Album t√§uscht √ºber seinen Titel hinweg, denn es dringt mit rauer Intensit√§t zu uns durch. Skitternde Trommeln und Bl√§ser, eine zerkl√ºftete Orgel, hypnotische jemenitische Melodien und einzigartige DIY-Perkussion- und Streichinstrumente verschmelzen zu einer ansteckenden, berauschenden Klangwelt. Mal wild und rau, mal √ºppig und einh√ºllend.

Die Idee zu El Khat hatte der Autodidakt und Multiinstrumentalist Eyal el Wahab. Aufgewachsen in der j√ºdisch-jemenitischen Diaspora von Tel Aviv, stie√ü er auf die Compilation ‚ÄúQat, Coffee & Qambus: Raw 45s from Yemen‚Äù, schmiss daraufhin seinen Job als Cellist beim Jerusalem Andalusian Orchestra, lernte Arabisch, begann Instrumente aus Fundst√ºcken zu bauen, wie sie in den 60er Jahren im Jemen gespielt wurden, und gr√ºndete El Khat. Seither arbeitet das Trio an einer Sammlung arabischer Melodien jemenitischen Ursprungs. Treibende Kraft dahinter ist der Wunsch nach kultureller Erkundung, gespeist aus der Migrationserfahrung der jemenitischen Juden und der Losgel√∂stheit von einem Land oder einer Flagge, wobei das Herz und das Erbe ihrer Musik im Jemen verwurzelt sind.

Ihr neues Album ‚ÄùMute‚Äù erforscht Distanz und Sprache - und deren Abwesenheit. Es handelt davon, aus einem Land vertrieben zu werden und im anderen nicht verstanden zu werden, stumm zu sein. In den Liedern, sagt el Wahab, geht es um ‚ÄûBeziehungen und den Kampf darum, zwei Seiten als ein Ganzes zu sehen, nicht als etwas, das mit Stumpfsinn und Konflikt endet.‚Äú  Klanglich ist es ein berauschender, retro-futuristischer Trip zu el Wahabs jemenitischen Wurzeln und zur√ºck.

F√ºr diese Veranstaltung bieten wir erm√§√üigte Tickets an, um auch Menschen mit kleinerem Portmonee Zugang zu Kultur zu erm√∂glichen. Diese Kontingente sind limitiert und nur bei TixforGigs verf√ºgbar. Wir vertrauen auf Eure Selbsteinsch√§tzung: Wenn ihr k√∂nnt, bucht Standard-Tickets und √ºberlasst die erm√§√üigten Kontingente denjenigen, die gerade sehr sparen m√ºssen.

Photo: Puschen

_______________________________

Starting in 2019, El Khat began to hone their sound in garages and warehouses. Through experimenting with DIY homemade instruments as a means to life minimalism philosophy it has led to the three-piece creating an endless collection of Arabic tunes of Yemeni origin.
Detached to a land or to any flag is the driving force behind the group, with the heart of their music and their heritage rooted in Yemen. The constant division that has been created by wars and immigrations have pushed out an identity. With 2 albums behind and a third to be released in 2024 El Khat is on a constant move sharing their art globally mainly in the US and the EU.
El Khat‚Äôs 3rd album mute belies its title as it careens out of the speakers with a raucous intensity. Formed in the garages and warehouses of Jaffa and now based in Berlin, the group‚Äôs ever- expanding vision makes a defiant stand against complacency, conflict and division. Skittering drums and brass, a jagged organ, hypnotic Yemeni melodies and one-of-a-kind DIY percussion and string instruments, all meld together into an infectious, heady soundscape.

Okvsho ist eines der interessantesten und vielversprechendsten Projekte der europ√§ischen Modern Jazz Szene. Hinter Okvsho verbergen sich die beiden Br√ºder Christoph und Georg Kiss aus Z√ºrich. Die beiden lassen ihre musikalische Herkunft aus Beatmaking und elektronischer Musik in die Kl√§nge der jungen und lebendigen europ√§ischen Jazzszene einflie√üen und beschreiten dabei neue Wege. Im Zusammenspiel mit lokalen Jazzmusiker*innen entstand ihr Live-Band-Projekt Okvsho +experience, das Improvisation, Spontaneit√§t und Jazz als Tanzmusik zelebriert.

Okvsho is one of the most interesting and promising projects in the European modern jazz scene. The two brothers (Christoph & Georg Kiss) from Zurich, Switzerland who form Okvsho let their original musical background in beat-making and electronic music flow in with the sounds of the young and vibrant European jazz scene and discover new grounds at the same time. Through playing with local jazz musicians their live-band project Okvsho +experience emerged, which celebrates improvisation, spontaneity, and jazz as dance music.

lineup: Black Doldrums (UK), Aftershow DJ
information: Kevin Gibbard and Sophie Landers produce a dark psych, contemporary form of gothic post-punk under the name Black Doldrums. Their songs contain hook and lead tribal drums and euphoric guitar textures that frame lyrics about purpose and introspection. The duo have been building up a devout following since their self-released ep on a limited number of cassettes ‚ÄòExit City Lights‚Äô before their first official signing to independent shoegaze label Club AC30 in 2018, releasing two sold out vinyl ep‚Äôs in 2018 and 2019, ‚ÄòSad Paradise‚Äô and She ‚ÄòDivine‚Äô. Black Doldrums collaborated with electronic duo ‚ÄòTVL‚Äôs Jared Artaud, producing their debut album with grammy award winner Ted Young. In early 2021 Black Doldrums recruited Matthew Holt on bass guitar. In March the same year, Black Doldrums signed to psych/post-punk giant Fuzz Club Records who released the band‚Äôs debut album ‚ÄòDead Awake‚Äô on 11th March 2022.

Der Sound hat seine Wurzeln in vielen Genres, vor allem aber in Funk, Reggae, Library Music, Psychedelic Rock, afrikanischer Musik und Folk der 1960er und 70er Jahre. Skinshape is the studio project of British musician and producer William Dorey. Skinshape grew out of a love for old music and the way it sounded. The sound has roots in many genres, but in particular 1960s-70s Funk, Reggae, Library music, Psychedelic Rock, African music and Folk. William was also a founding member of the band Palace (2014-2017) and has been running his own reggae record label called Horus Records since 2014. The 5-person live band will be playing Skinshape's works, both new and old.

event_name: NATURAL pres PROJECT ICARUS + ENRICO TIBERI (Ambient + Experimental Sounds)
lineup: Enrico Tiberi, Project Icarus
information:
(Deutsch unten)

Project Icarus wedges dark ambient themes into harsh noise and industrial ritualistic soundscapes.

The project is born from the mind of Giuseppe D'Addurno, Berlin-based italian multi-media artist, who creates alchemical performances and re-enacts magical rites on stage.

From his first experiences with death-metal bands, the musician has composed both music and lyrics that reflected a bleak vision of society.
In his dystopian vision, the suburbs of cities and the silent country-side lands are inherently imbibed with a quiet darkness, a silent unrest, a black tranquility.

On the other hand, Enrico Tiberi after studying Conservatorio in the center of Italy, his homeland, gets to sing, play guitar, piano, synths in several bands and projects (The Shell Collector, Resurrecturis, Tapewhore, Brain, Edenshade, Eyehate).

In the meanwhile sets up his own studio to work as a producer and mixing engineer, and studies with Tchad Blake (The Black Keys, Peter Gabriel, Arctic Monkeys, Pearl Jam), gets to work with artists from all over the world. (James Labrie from Dream Theater, Uli Kusch by Halloween among the others).

His passion for Telefon Tel Aviv, Aphex Twin, Amon Tobin, Bj√∂rk and many more bring nrec's coming out to happen to the world of electronica. In 2015 his first EP "Spaghettitronica", very dark electro sounding. In 2016 his first LP "Signals", very highly reviewed and well acclaimed.

Starting at 19:00

Please come 10 minutes before the music performance starts to secure your place.

IMPORTANT! Members who have confirmed their attendance and do not show up will be removed indefinitely from the group.

Free entry. (Suggested donation for the house utilities 5-10‚Ç¨)

Limited capacity.

///////////

Das Projekt Icarus verbindet dunkle Ambient-Themen mit hartem L√§rm und industriellen, rituellen Klanglandschaften.

Das Projekt entspringt dem Geist von Giuseppe D'Addurno, einem in Berlin lebenden italienischen Multimediak√ºnstler, der alchemistische Performances kreiert und magische Riten auf der B√ºhne nachstellt.

Seit seinen ersten Erfahrungen mit Death-Metal-Bands hat der Musiker sowohl Musik als auch Texte komponiert, die eine d√ºstere Vision der Gesellschaft widerspiegeln.

In seiner dystopischen Vision sind die Vororte der St√§dte und die stillen Landstriche von einer stillen Dunkelheit, einer stillen Unruhe und einer schwarzen Stille durchdrungen.

Auf der anderen Seite gibt es Enrico Tiberi, der nach seinem Studium am Conservatorio in seiner Heimat Italien singt, Gitarre, Klavier und Synthesizer in verschiedenen Bands und Projekten spielt (The Shell Collector, Resurrecturis, Tapewhore, Brain, Edenshade, Eyehate).

In der Zwischenzeit baut er sein eigenes Studio auf, um als Produzent und Mixing Engineer zu arbeiten, und studiert bei Tchad Blake (The Black Keys, Peter Gabriel, Arctic Monkeys, Pearl Jam), arbeitet mit K√ºnstlern aus der ganzen Welt zusammen. (James Labrie von Dream Theater, Uli Kusch von Halloween u.a.).

Seine Leidenschaft f√ºr Telefon Tel Aviv, Aphex Twin, Amon Tobin, Bj√∂rk und viele mehr bringen nrec's coming out to happen in die Welt der Electronica. 2015 erschien seine erste EP ‚ÄûSpaghettitronica‚Äú, ein sehr dunkler Elektro-Sound. Im Jahr 2016 seine erste LP ‚ÄûSignals‚Äú, sehr hoch bewertet und hoch gelobt.

Beginn um 19:00

Bitte kommt Ihr 10 Minuten vor Beginn der Musikperformance, um euch euren Platz zu sichern.

WICHTIG! Mitglieder, die ihre Teilnahme best√§tigt haben und nicht auftauchen, werden auf unbestimmte Zeit aus der Gruppe ausgeschlossen.

Der Eintritt ist frei. (Empfohlene Spende f√ºr die Hauswirtschaft 5-10‚Ç¨)
Begrenzte Kapazit√§t.

***

information:
OMG IT'S HAPPENING AGAIN? LOWKEY STARS! 

A freshly born event series that highlights the hottest newcomers in Berlin's scene.
The concept is simple - community building instead of headliner mentality. We encourage new faces in the scene to apply and DJ in a professional environment. Find the appliaction link in our Instagram bio. <3

lineup: @QOA koa , @Primeiro , @Nicolas Teubal, @Camila Nebbia , @Diane Barbe, @Don Jegosah , @Ariel Schlichter , @Megan Jowett , @Comunidad Sikuris Berlin , Opening: @Fluid Ecotonalism
information:
"Feed the River" consists of a series of concerts that will take place simultaneously on the boat Hosek Contemporary and the surrounding shores of the Spree River. Each artist will perform their set while interacting with the other nearby performances.These overlapping concerts will create a unique sonic atmosphere in the area.
The project is based on the concept that rivers are living beings and like all beings they need to be nourished, inspired by the concept of Animism. The project allows us to re/approach our relationship with the bodies of water and the Climate Crisis, it will encourage Berlin¬¥s Ambient Music ecosystem and the artistic careers of musicians with migration backgrounds.

Da wir am 03.08. schon nice in unsere neue Veranstaltungsreihe ‚ÄöUnchained‚Äò gestartet sind, wollen wir gar nicht lange warten, um mit euch ‚ÄöUnchained Vol II‚Äò zu feiern!

Die erste Party war schon ein geiler Anfang, aber wir denken: Da geht noch was! <3

Also lasst uns den Vibe vom letzten Mal mitnehmen und noch eine Schippe draufpacken.

Musikalisch wieder nach dem Motto ‚Äöall killer - no filler‚Äò in Richtung Trance/Hard Bounce/Ghetto/Hard Techno, sowie Tech House auf dem zweiten Floor!

Am Start f√ºr euch sind Esca & Leah, sowie Isang Load und Sobrii, um ordentlich abzureissen!

Also, packt eure Feierbuddys ein & let‚Äòs gooooo! Wir sind ready!
